title: Hacked and customer service no help
review:
Update** Three days later and the hackers are still attempting to use my daughters account, despite our reporting to Current the issue, and changing passwords several times. I had to have my parent side of the account removed completely to stop the scammers from trying to deposit money from my end. The scammer also tried to scam my younger daughters card as well. Lucky for us she had ignored the calls/texts before anything happened. 
Original review: The card we have for our kids got compromised. The hackers/scammers were very smooth. Had all of us fooled. The company isn’t being very helpful at this moment about returning the money, either. And even after contacting them about the fraud, somehow these scammers are still trying to use my account to steal money through my kids’ compromised account. I can’t remove the linked checking. Can’t pause it from making Deposits. It should only be allowing access via my Face ID, yet they still got in again. Looks like this is a new frequent issue for current users with these scammers yet no warning was sent out about this new scams. I  do NOT recommend anyone use Current cards for your kids. They need to do better about security and be better about returning fraudulently stolen money and about earning customers when new scams are on the rise. We’ve been working with them for over two hours and there’s still no real resolution

title: Easy but not helpful
review:
Current is ok only reason I’m writing three stars is because customer service is honestly garbage. And they promote that there was $100 overdraft which honestly that’s not true at all.
But back to my original complaint about customer service I had an unauthorized use and someone used a little cash out of my account and when I contacted support they basically said it would take three to six months to get that payment back after I fill out a mountain of paperwork and all that they could do is cancel my card and send me another one, but in the process they canceled the wrong card so I was stuck out and they did not ship the new card faster they basically told me to deal with it or use another Bank to link a virtual card so I can pay for stuff for my kids .they were not helpful and honestly I won’t be with them for much longer .only good thing is you will get your paychecks faster and tax return fast but outside of that it’s really nothing good.
And if you change your phone number it is basically impossible for you to get back into your account even if you have an email link to it and they did nothing to help my wife she is still locked out of her current and the money is still sitting in there so basically they said deal with it so Hope this helps dudes
developerResponse: {'id': 21693395, 'body': "Hi there, thank you for your review. Customer service is incredibly important to us here at Current & we apologize that we were unable to provide you with exceptional service.  Customer feedback is valuable to us as we continue to grow & improve the products & services we offer. Should you still need help with any of the issues you mentioned or if you have additional feedback you'd like to share with our team, feel free to contact us reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account. \nSincerely, \nSupport@Current", 'modified': '2021-03-16T21:43:10Z'}

title: So rude, and they lie and work together on the lie
review:
I have had the worst experience with a bank that you can have and it was with his bank. 
I have two cases where my car was really stolen and they swiped as a credit card and they did nothing normally it takes like a 30 to 90 days for a bank to get back to you they contacted me the very next day denied it did not care about any of the evidence I had when I ask him about theThe reason they always tell you to contact the disputing the disputing when I tell you never reaches back out I sent multiple emails opening up multiple cases nobody ever reach back out I have lost hundreds of dollars in his bank account because they were fused to do investigations whenever I asked him to be transferred they have will never change for me I am going to upload evidence of just just some of the evidence but please just know I have a lot more 
Oh and I also have a case build up against him with the Better Business Bureau I screenshot all of my conversations and they will be handled 

they won’t let meUpload the pictures but basically when they send me the email of the dispute they created they basically lied in the whole email and they basically say I said things that I never once said I still have my original copy of the email I sent them every day when I sent it to them do you know the people still never say anything for to me in a basically justify the actions in lying of the employees

title: Not pleased
review: To first start out I’ve had a bad experience with Current. This is my first debit card and I am not pleased with it at all. First things first I tried transferring money into the account and after about a week it never went through so I tried to dispute it and NEVER got my money back (this was months ago) so I decided to stop using it because after that I didn’t want to lose any more money. I’ve finally decided to start using it again as I’m looking for a job and it’s currently the only debit card I have and I went to look at my account inform and Current has signed me out of my account on both of my phones. I’ve tried signing back in but it literally makes me create a whole new account which I don’t want to do and the support email for current is no longer in use and I never reach anyone when calling. I don’t see anything about a sign in issue on the website and what to do if you can’t sign in at all so I have no clue what to do. There is literally no sign in option on the app only a “get started” option as if to open a new banking account with Current. Are you really that desperate for new customers that you try to make them open up a new account if they can’t sign in to an existing one? I’ve received no help from anyone despite trying and like I said never got my money back from the first time and now I can’t access my account. Do better
developerResponse: {'id': 19625747, 'body': "Hi, we're sorry to hear that and we would love to help you out. Please reach out to our customer support team at reviews@current.com. Sincerely, Support@Current\n\n", 'modified': '2020-12-08T17:15:29Z'}

title: Deceitful
review: We have been huge Current fans for the last couple of years. We’ve recommended Current to countless friends and neighbors.  Until, my daughter received a fraudulent charge on her account. She notified Current within minutes, blocked her account and awaited her new card and a refund of her hard earned money. She received the new card and notice that Current did not agree with the dispute and that Current would not refund her money. I then spent 90 painful minutes typing away in their app (there is no phone service) being cut off several times if I wasn’t typing quickly enough, only to be again told that her $ would not be refunded and there was nothing I could do. So, I requested that all the money in our accounts be refunded and the accounts closed. I then spent another 30 min trying to withdraw my money to face constant “errors”. My very helpful “chatbot” suggested I use the debit cards to withdraw the funds from an ATM - which would still leave Current with money in the bank since atms don’t give less than $20 and certainly not 50 cents. I am down to being owed $19+ (plus the bogus charges they allowed someone to steal from us) and will have my attorney follow up. My recommendation is to stay away from this operation.  All is well until it isn’t, and once it’s not, it unravels quickly.
developerResponse:
{'id': 22986664, 'body': "Hi there, thank you for taking the time to leave a review & we're terribly sorry to hear about your experience with us. We take fraud seriously and our Disputes Team investigates all claims using industry standards and research. However, the outcomes of these disputes are final & we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience this has caused. 

We would be more than happy to look into the remaining balance you mentioned in your review & issue you a refund check for the amount remaining in your account. Please contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address associated with your account & let us know if you have any other questions or concerns. 

We look forward to hearing back from you!

Sincerely,
Support@Current", 'modified': '2021-05-24T21:45:57Z'}

title: Do NOT bank with these crooks!
review: I had my card information used on a transaction and, at the time they were my financial institution. I locked my card and instantly contacted Current. To be told that I’d have to file a dispute which turned into a 6 month long battle. I have since switched banks to a regular big name. For $21 a month I was charged for them to take my money elsewhere. I canceled my account 81 days into the dispute. They had no idea when a “dispute representative” would call me. Even after they said by end of day each day I contacted them. The phones route you to the app support which if they don’t want to answer a question they just end the chat and refuse to answer again. The best description for this bank is: if you like stressing out over why your funds are being taken, this bank is the bank for you. I have since found a stress free banking team at Citi Bank. Back to the 81 days into the dispute. At 101 days they email me saying the dispute was complete that they refunded the money. Now, after all that they won’t respond to my support emails asking to reactive to transfer my funds out. Go figure right? They have had to do this to others. They have got the science to screwing people down. Day three of waiting for a response on them letting me get my funds out, still no answer. They do not even deserve 1 Star!

title: The Current is Currently Perfect!
review: Funny true story. The payroll company that pays me uses a service that if I pay a fee they give me an advance on my paycheck. Well I signed up for it because the first time was free. Well when they go into the account to pull the funds to give me an advance they say I don’t have any money. Now I’m confused and a little upset but ChaChing here comes Currents notification! My finds are already available! You just know I had to tell that other company that they’re fixing to go out of business and some think that’s rude but I call it “get your crap together, know that in these times you must stay on your toes because their will always be better!” Thank you Current I appreciate you! Please know there’s another one coming down the pike and the sooner I see it the better in these times you know we could all use it. God bless you thank you so much.I look forward to a long lasting business relationship with you. I love saying I love my Current because they are ahead of current and there is currently money in my account!

title: Needs work
review:
It’s a good app all together, I do have an issue with the customer service. It takes forever to connect to a representative & once you do it doesn’t notify you so the representative usually just ends the chat if you don’t respond in a few minutes so you have to wait all over again to finally get connected to a new one. Also, if you need to dispute a charge that also takes forever. 30-45 business days I believe which is normal but I should at least be able to get my money back before that especially if it was fraud.
I also don’t like the gas holds feature, say for example you only want to put 20 dollars in your tank & that’s all you have in your account, the gas station will try to charge you 100 bucks instead of 20. So it just declines at the pump and you have to pay on the inside.
If you want to go to a bank atm to withdraw money, the atm already has a 2-3 dollar fee since it’s a different bank, but on top of that this card charges you another 2-3 bucks so all in all your fee is 5.50 or something like that which is way too much. It’s just little things I have issues with but other than that like I said, it’s a good working app.

title: THIS APP IS ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE!
review: I wouldn’t even recommend this app even if someone held me hostage and forced me to. I never wanted to cuss out a customer service agent so bad. They are clueless and can’t do anything and clearly don’t know how to communicate with customers or each other. They give you a virtual card to use while your waiting on your physical one to arrive in the mail..what they don’t tell you is that you can’t even use it!!!! I tried to use my virtual card with the Apple Pay feature and it didn’t even work. I contacted customer support asking them if the virtual card works at any stores that accept Apple Pay and they told me that I can use my virtual card at any store I can have to accept “credit” instead of “debit” since my virtual card doesn’t have a pin. IT DID NOT WORK. Then I talk to someone else and they tell me that my virtual card is only accepted by merchants who accept virtual cards...after I just tried to use Apple Pay, with a merchant, WHO ACCEPTS VIRTUAL CARDS. I was so over it completely. THIS BANK WON’T LET YOU DO ANYTHING WITHOUT YOUR PHYSICAL CARD. Mind you I ordered my card 7 days ago..and it’s still not here. This bank restricts you of YOUR MONEY. I am not able to access it in any way all because I don’t have the actual physical card. THIS APP IS A COMPLETE WASTE OF TIME. USE AT YOUR OWN RISK!

title: Don’t Waste Your Time.
review: If you want to have someone steal money from you through card fraud and have Current give you back the money and then take it back months later causing your account to be in debt because they all of a sudden decided there was no proof then this online bank is for you. If you would like to form a dispute with credible proof of scam tactics and it take months for them to dispute it even after the date they said it would be done then this online bank is for you. If you would like to have to wait in a hold without even being able to call anyone just talk to people on the app and have people close the conversation without getting you your help then this online bank is for you. Do you see where I am going with this? Do not let them try to butter you up with how much they seek to have to offer. It’s all fun until it gets down to the nitty gritty in which case they are very unreliable and have barely any communication skills. Your better off just getting Chime. I’m going to a brick and mortar bank, preferably Chase, so that I can have easy access to help whenever I need it and I can account for everything that I have. Don’t Waste Your Time. ✨🕊
developerResponse:

However, it sounds like we've done the exact opposite here & want to offer our help, should you need it. 

Please feel free to reach out to us at reviews@current.com if you have any questions or concerns about your account, recent disputes, or anything else! 

Sincerely, 
Support@Current", 'modified': '2021-04-02T22:29:22Z'}

title: DO NOT MESS UP
review:
I was somewhat enjoying having the app as a teenager, but it was impossible to do anything without an adult supplying the money. Then once I turned 18 it locked me out until I could provide proper identification. I put in the wrong stuff and they locked me out permanently. I emailed them and they didn’t even respond to my question. I guess they have default responses when it detects certain words because I said ‘information’ maybe twice and the email back was about “sorry you’re concerned with the information we take”. Um, what? Nice to know they don’t read it until the second email. So it took me 2-3 days to figure out I have to find a new application and there was nothing they could do for a mistake——it took less time to receive appointment approval for a mammogram during COVID. You might think, oh can’t you make a new account? No. Never. You can only make an account via the app and you can only sign in with the same details after that so the apps useless on my phone now.

In conclusion: Don’t get it as a teenager unless you have someone willing to give you money, DO NOT mess up an ounce of information or you’ll lose everything in your account, and expect your questions to take at least 72 hours for a proper response.

Our goal is to offer a premium banking service that's accessible to all. Part of that is making sure our users have seamless interactions with our support team & that their issues are taken care of as quickly as possible. It sounds like we provided you with the exact opposite of this & we sincerely apologize. 

If you still need help or have any questions/concerns please contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account.

Sincerely, 
Support@Current", 'modified': '2021-03-19T23:45:31Z'}

title: Do not get it!!!!
review: Get ready because your about to hear a long story as to why I gave this app and a very generous one star. Least start off by saying at first it was fine when using the teen account when my parent would send me money if your only going to use it for that your fine. But DO NOT i repeat DO NOT use it for direct deposit ITS TERRIBLE. I put money on my card and noticed that it was not showing up on my spending balance so I contact the support people. Mind you THEY HAVE NO PHONE LINE. It’s all through text. And they tell me that on their end it’s showing up that I have money on there. I explain to them I can’t purchase anything because it’s saying my balance is zero. they couldn’t do anything for me so I had to wait 3-4 DAYS. Thankfully it came but not in a timely manner. So I have them a second chance. I used direct deposit I got paid two days ago with still nothing in my account I gave them some time because Veterans Day was the other day. But today I decided to contact them to see what’s going on after 15 mins she tells me that my money arrived in another account HOW IN THE WORLD DID MY MONEY ARRIVE IN ANOTHER ACCOUNT. I only have one account so what other account is there.......... and that’s why you should NOT USE CURRENT FOR ANY DIRECT DEPOSITS OR ADDING MONEY

title: So far, so good
review: I was skeptical about Current at first because when I reached out to their customer service, the representative was very rude and didn’t answer my question so I left the chat. I decided to still give it a chance and set up my direct deposit. I received my first direct deposit from my second job today and it wasn’t deposited until 11:30AM. I was happy that I got paid two days early but I wasn’t happy about the late deposit. Nevertheless, the good part about Current is the fact that they send you balance updates when you make a purchase. The updates include the amount you spent and the remaining balance on your card. I also like that you can tap your card to pay. That’s a pretty cool, fast, and efficient feature as well. So far, I haven’t had any major issues with Current. I gave them 3 stars because of the late deposit and the rude customer service rep. I may come back and update my review over time if positive changes occur. So, as of now I would say give it a try. If you’re a skeptical and untrusting person like myself, you can take my review as a guidance for making the decision to create a bank account.

title: Horrible Customer Service
review: I have been locked out of my account for over a month, they say 24/7 chat availability but what good is that if your locked out of the app, I have sent multiple emails and have received zero helpful assistance, I have had no issues until now but since this has happened it’s cost me a large sum of money so that being said I would highly recommend a bank that you can contact atleast by phone and speak to a real customer service rep. Rather than Current’s automated call center and faulty mobile app as well as extremely slow and embarrassingly poor customer service assistance for a so called “Bank!” I’m not one to complain but I rely on my checks weekly and when you have no access to control your funds for this long and no shown actions to assist your customer with a crucial issue, I felt the need to alert others that it’s obvious you have no concern for your customer’s needs, especially a “Choice Card Holder” You would think paying the extra for the better checking account might help get quicker assistance or any assistance period! I will absolutely be closing my primary account and will make sure to inform anyone interested in Current to look elsewhere for a more reliable banking option!

title: I still am suspended and I haven’t even used it.
review: I haven’t used the app fully or even at all all because I tried to make a new account for someone else on my phone and it wouldn’t let us and when I tried to sign in, it suspended me for suspicious activity. I STILL SEE YOU HAVING SOCIAL MEDIA INFLUENCERS GETTING SPONSORED TO ADVERTISE THIS WHEN YOU CANT EVEN RESPOND TO SIMPLE EMAILS OR DO ANYTHING TO HELP! You send generic emails that are all the same. Get customer service because a coffee shop and literally every other bank card has this figured out 100x better. I barely signed in for more than maybe a total of 5 minutes of use at most and “suspicious activity” is something a robot decided because I tried to make a new account for someone else on the same device! I still have your physical card too! Can’t use it. I’m sick of seeing the app on my phone and not ever getting an email response. Don’t bother using current. Read the reviews where people have no customer service because I rarely complain about anything let alone apps you can delete. I haven’t spent a dime or entered a dime into this account and I’m here to tell you to look elsewhere unless they can provide simple service.

title: Way better options
review:
Update: response from developer is that checks may take 3-5 business days to clear. I understand the policy. I don’t understand why it takes them 3-5 times longer than every other bank I’ve ever dealt with either professionally or personally.

I’ve banked with Simple for yrs but recently found out they would be closing. I found Current and thought it would be similar to Simple and set up an acct. I added money to my Current acct from my Simple acct which took around 5-6 days for the funds to be available for me to use. I then tried to use the photo check deposit. It took 4 days, 6 if you count the wknd, for my funds to become available to use. I don’t have the option to use direct deposit, because I work for a small business that doesn’t offer it as an option. Never in my life have I ever used or heard of a bank taking this long to make funds from a deposited check available for use. With Simple if I had my photo check deposit submitted before 4:00pm on Friday, my funds were available by 2:00am on Saturday. I guess the point of this is if you don’t mind waiting a week to have deposited funds available for use then this is the bank for you.

title: It’s great
review: For me the free atm is right by my old bank which was charging me hidden fees in the middle of this pandemic when I need my money more than ever. I decided to make the switch to current with little to no knowledge of it based on other people’s reviews I decided on current. It’s my first month using it I ordered my card in a Tuesday and received it the following Monday. So, not bad timing and they have a virtual card you can use in the meantime if you need your money now that works with Apple Pay if you need to use it in a store. There are somethings the virtual card doesn’t work for but it got me by until the hard one came. No hidden fees everything matches up, and they even allow overdraft up to a certain amount based on the individual and they fed my family one night and there is no overdraft fee just simply pay back what they allowed you to overdraft. I suggest it, very easy to use as well

title: THEFT
review: this service is ridiculous. my roommate “banks” with them and owed me money a couple months ago, she sent me the money from her bank account and current added my card to her account without any authorization. i have all my accounts at another bank and have NEVER banked with them or even heard of them. well fast forward a couple months after she sent me the money, every charge she was making with her card was coming out of mine. i had 300 dollars taken from me. we called current bank to ask what was going on and they said they had been having this issue and then said they’d fix it. they then had the audacity to ask if i wanted to bank with them after they essentially stole my card information ?? we said no and then told them we were going to be removing all the funds and banking somewhere else and then to NOT put her card on hold. 20 minutes later they call to confirm with us we wanted to put the card on hold, we then said for the second time we DIDNT want the card on hold and then the next day find out they put the card on hold anyways. this is an awful service and you are better off banking with a real bank.

title: Update
review: So i got a new phone, and i cant log in. i used current on my old phone and lost it, and used an tablet to use current. i deleted current off the tablet cause i thought it wouldn’t be that hard to log back in my account on my newer phone. and random subscriptions are coming off my card, that im not paying for anymore. i need to log back in on my new phone so i can hurry up and put my spending money in my savings, cause every time my mom sends me money i automatically pay for the subscriptions im not paying for anymore. that is why i dont like Current. UPDATE: I was able to log back in my current account on my laptop, but i’m still locked out on my phone. I try deleting the app and downloading it back but i’m stuck on the “link to parents account or invite your parent” screen. if you have anyway to fix this problem please let me know.

title: Customer service
review:
I have went online to contact Current thru email and the number provided. My work schedule conflicts with me getting to speak to a representative so I asked if I could be contacted before 12pm. Well they did one time after that I have not received any help trying to access my Current account or get a new card. I have asked repeatedly for assistance. I have stated to them that my son has also tried to access my acct because the number that was attached is no longer in service or he no longer has that number. It’s been over 2 weeks and I have yet received a response by email nor by phone call. I thought this was a good card and it’s seems to be but how when you can’t even get a Customer service agent to assist in getting you back into the app to request for a new card and update your information. I have sent over 10 emails I have called almost 10 times leaving messages for HELP. And guess what no response. Can Someone Please Help Me get back into my Current Acct.    
           Another week which makes 3 weeks and still no response by email nor by telephone.

title: Not recommend
review:
I decided to try this app because I have a teen with a job, and thought this would be a good way to start their “banking lessons” without the penalty of overdraft fees from an actual brick and mortar bank( Wells Fargo, bank of American...). From a distance this look great!
Not so much, you can not add cash to your teens card because it’s not allowed!?!? But then you can’t add cash to the parent side either your forced to link it to another bank. Customer support work around was to delete the app and then reinstall it. Which I did and nothing changed, Super annoying! 
When you transfer money from your actual bank to the current app it takes a full day to post even though it’s already cleared /deducted from my bank account.
Then when you mobile deposit a check (my teen’s payroll check to be specific) it takes 5 business days. Five days is a little ridiculous especially for a payroll check, and no where on the app does it tell you checks take 5 days to clear until after you endorse the back of the check🤬
Other then that it’s pretty user friendly, just not what I was expecting it to be.
developerResponse:
{'id': 19146899, 'body': "Hi there, thanks for leaving a review. We're sorry to hear about your experience and appreciate your feedback. Our team would be happy to look into what happened and provide additional information on how our services work. 

Feel free to reach out to us at reviews@current.com. 

Sincerely, 
Support@Current", 'modified': '2020-11-16T21:15:54Z'}

title: Thank you mr beast
review: I have been with about 4 other cars like this also a few banks and I have never received anything from not one of the subscriptions. Right from the start with this account I was already been given some prizes for applying and out of the goodness of Mr. Beast heart he also gave me a present that helps out a lot for a single father.I’m not saying that you will receive the same things as I did but what I do know is that you will be well taken care of as an individual not just a number like the others. Thanks again  mr beast and current card.. so what are you waiting for sign up and start feeling Better about your finances.. I am not a paid actor or am I getting anything for taking the time out of my life to Wright a review. Just a regular dad that’s trying to make it through COVID-19 with  less stress about where my money is at. Every Dollar counts these days!!!!

title: Worst banking app EVER
review: I had my direct deposit set up on this app, I received it but it was pending and I googled it and said it would be several days so I reluctantly upgraded to premium, which still did not release my funds. It took about two days which wasn’t too bad. But now when I went to go use my card I can’t because they canceled it to send me my premium card... so now im going on day 5 with no access to my ENTIRE PAYCHECK. I’ve tried hooking up to cashapp with the “virtual card” cashapp said they didn’t accept this. I tried paying someone through apple pay to try to get my money off, the app won’t let the payment go through. I have no way to pay my bills, no way to get myself gas or food, the money is just stuck o the account. Not to mention I tried to reach customer service and all they have is the chat option and the person did nothing to help me whatsoever. I tried routing the bank account to cashapp as well, does not work. Why would they cancel the card I have to send me the premium card???? I am stuck with no money and no way to get it out of the account. DO NOT DO IT.

title: Terrible Don't Use
review:
I been using current for maybe a week but within that week they have stolen 60$ from me then tell me i can verbally talk to anyone on the phone instead they end the chat on me and ignore everything i was asking them 
I'm still waiting for my 36$ bank transfer that i did literally the day after i activated my card then i tried to order food and it took off the payment twice and they are still holding my money. I don't understand this company and i've seen a lot of reviews on instagram about how they are scamming people and stealing money i will be sure once i can finally figure something out about my pending money and my missing 36$ to cancel my account and make it my life mission to help other young adults like myself not use this app for all this guys just use venmo they are the greatest i have no issues with venmo and it's basically like current just a lot better. so please whoever is reading this DO NOT USE THIS APP NOR CARD it's a scam and they are going to steal your money in a blink of an eye and ignore you and act like it's your fault.

title: Don’t Understand The Bad Reviews
review: I Started using Current because it has the feature for adding another card for your Teen. I got him his own card that he got to design & he uses for his games an so on. I liked using Current so much that after 8 yrs with Amex Serve card I completely switched over to Current. U can Pause/ or UnPause your  card in seconds & even Block certain companies from taking any money. Plus my company pays us on Fridays but Current drops my Direct Deposit 3 days early. I Freakin Love the card, I have no idea why people give it bad reviews but it definitely deserves my 5 Star Approval. My Wifey & Daughter now use Current as well which they love due to the fact I can transfer them funds in seconds. It also seems that they are adding new & improved features all the time which is great!

title: Current card is not a good debit card
review: I would not recommend anyone to get connected with current due to the fact that money was withdrawn from my account without my consent and when I called customer service they basically told me that they couldn’t do anything about it that I will have to call to whoever took the money so they could put it back that they were unable to do it themselves that they would have to do an investigation within three days so that my money can be reimbursed back they talk about no hidden fees which they do have they talk about that they’re on able to do anything or give me my money back and it was not only the first time that it was done I definitely think that I will not give you no stars due to the fact that they never resolve my problem with returning the $110 that was taken from and every time you would do direct deposit they would take a percentage so the whole paycheck was not going through advice to everyone if you do not want to lose your money do not connect an account with current

title: Great for adults but the teen app is amazing!
review:
The developers did a great job with the feel and flow of the interface.  The Current debit card is also nice because it is NFC/Tao enabled - even the big banks haven’t been doing that until very recently.  
The teen app is even better than I expected it to be.  For my kiddo I was looking for something that functioned like a real checking account with an associated debit card.   The Current product does this and it’s software is amazing!   I can setup chore lists, my daughter can setup savings “pods” for the things that she wants.  I can monitor all of her activities and even have the ability to restrict where she spends at.   
Great job on the app guys!  I look forward to watching your product and offerings grow.  It would be neat to be able to move ALL of my banking needs to you!

title: Current is the Bomb!
review: From The Virtual card that’s accessible from the app to use if yours comes up missing to the blocking features and the ability to build budgets and the ability to create savings accounts from the app, makes this card superior to almost every app based prepaid account that I’ve used before! Plus their customer service call center goes over and beyond the standards for great customer care and issue resolutions that really does get resolved quickly and effectively without the struggle of constantly sitting on an annoying customer service caller waiting list for hours just for them not to pickup the phone for you anyways! They truly are remarkable and above average in comparison to others! Try them out and see!

title: Make funds available
review:
Having your funds deposited earlier is a good idea in theory but it’s pointless if you put a hold on the funds for a day or two making them unable to be used anyway. It defeats the purpose of you guys doing the deposit a few days earlier than expected...I will likely be closing my account as I shouldn’t have to wait days to be able to spend my money due to my funds being in my account but not being available to use every time I get a direct deposit

ETA: in response to the developer, even with other companies when a deposit is shown as pending it is still applied to your balance and the funds are made available for use, unlike with you guys. I shouldn’t be left stuck waiting and unable to use my fund from my paycheck for days, even when the deposit is put in my account a day or two earlier than the actual deposit date for my job. I also shouldn’t have to pay extra for a premium account just to be able to use my own funds sooner

title: Not Happy
review: I gave an initial rating however after 3 months of using I am not very happy. For the most part it is good but I do not like being “tricked” “mislead” and that’s exactly how I am feeling very mislead!! I had a normal bank I was overdrawing and being charged crazy rates well Current comes along advertising we will cover you up to 100 dollars with 0 fee just be a prime member and get $500 plus monthly in direct deposits ….. well here I am in month 3 with around $600 a WEEK in direct deposits guess what my over draft capabilities are? $25 dollars! Big help a whole $25 dollars they say they periodically review you for a updated amount I asked? When does that happen? Customer service didn’t know. Other than that it’s been a good card I’ve even gotten  $50 added to my card from Mr Beast but I am very upset about being mislead about the overdraft because that’s what lured me to leave my bank and get this to begin with
developerResponse: {'id': 23313005, 'body': 'Hey there, we apologize for the frustration! We would be happy to review your account for an Overdrive increase! Please reach out to us via live chat in the app or send us an email at reviews@current.com. Thank you!', 'modified': '2021-06-10T17:29:20Z'}

title: Worst bank Ever
review: Signed up to this bank think it was a great bank to be With but  I get slapped in the faced because as soon as I put money into the account the locked my account say it’s under review. It’s been 3 weeks since I was able to use my money and be struggle because of this bank. I tried to contact someone at support but no luck . No professional person to speak with on this matter at all just automated voices and emails with they don’t even reply to. I pleaded to just let me take my money out and leave the bank but I can’t because they are stealing my money and refuse to let me take my funds. This is unprofessional and scam like banking which is not to be use. Sorry current you shouldn’t have took my money thinking you were going to get away with it. Developers what are your responses because I’m suffering from not eating and paying my bills because a bank like yours wants to lock customers account and still there money . If no answer within 3 days I will get the police involved for theft and scamming.🤷🏾‍♂️

title: Poor Customer Service
review: If you ever have an issue with your card you’ll basically never get it fixed. I’ve been a paying customer for almost a yr and just recently ran into an issue. For over a week I’ve been emailing and chatting w their customer service reps w no resolve. I was told my initial conversation over a week ago that my account would be reviewed and resolved in 24-48 hrs. We’re now a week passed and there hasn’t even been contact on their end. It’s EXTREMELY upsetting, bc prior to this incident I was really happy w their service. That being said, if an issue comes up and you’ve been dealing w it for over a week and nothing has happened it really makes me start to question having my direct deposits coming to an account where if something goes wrong... you don’t have the confidence that they’ll be able to fix it in a timely matter. I think I’m going to have to cancel my account. I guess there’s a reason why I’ve been w a credit union for so long and now I’m realizing why I need to go back.
developerResponse: {'id': 23249661, 'body': "Hi there, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review & we sincerely apologize for your experience with our customer support team. This doesn't sound right & we would like to look into what went wrong here as well as provide you with the proper assistance. \n\nPlease contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account for help & let us know if you have any other questions or concerns. We'll keep an eye out for your response! ", 'modified': '2021-06-07T21:20:44Z'}

title: Nothing but lies don’t download
review: Okay so the very first thing that interested me in the app was the 2 days faster direct deposit. Lies only 1 day faster. I also pay $5 a month for they’re premium card which is supposed to come with more advantages. Newsflash it doesn’t. They’re supposed to have $100 overdraft fee free. That’s another lie. Customer support is complete garbage they really couldn’t care less about whatever issue you call them about. They’re also supposed to give back instant gas withholds. Yet AGAIN another lie from them. Recently because of tax season I’ve used them to get back my tax return. They’re app says you get it 5 days faster than with any other bank. People around me got there’s within 3 weeks of filing. It’s been nearly over a month for me and still nothing. I plan to close my account after receiving my taxes because this is honestly ridiculous. I’ve never heard of an app or anyone lying so much just to gain customers that they don’t even take care of. Current is nothing but lies.
developerResponse:
{'id': 21995091, 'body': "Hi there, we're sorry to hear about your experience with us. We understand how frustrating this must be & apologize for any confusion & inconvenience this may have caused. 

We try to be as transparent as possible in order to ensure our customers are satisfied with us, which is why do not state that you're always guaranteed the early direct deposits or maximum Overdrive limit. We state that your direct deposits may arrive up to 2 (or 5 for tax refunds) days early, but can arrive anywhere between those timeframes. We also state that qualified members may receive up to $100 in our overdraft feature, Overdrive. This is dependent on other internal factors in addition to the required $500+ monthly direct deposit. 

Feel free to contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account for more information or if you have any questions/concerns. 

Sincerely, 
Support@Current", 'modified': '2021-04-01T13:47:00Z'}

title: Fantastic!
review:
This has been a game changer for us. We have two teenagers and keeping up with their spending was a nightmare before Current. We can all send and receive money in an instant and in real time on this thing. They both started putting money in the savings pod offered on Current to save for big purchases. 
This app has a super affordable yearly fee, it’s easy to use, it always works and we’ve not experienced any glitches in the service. I love that we can see every time they make a purchase or transfer, and we can block vendors where we don’t want them spending money. My older son is even paid by his fast food job on Current with direct deposit!  If you have teens who need a spending card with limits and oversights, this is the one for you!

title: Wish I could leave -6 stars
review:
This is the absolute worst app I’ve ever used in my life for mobile banking. I’ve been waiting MONTHS for a specific payment to be deposited into my account. Finally this deposit gets to my account and current DENIES IT and says that the information from the check doesn’t match the information on my account. Mind you, this payment is from
The GOVERNMENT. And the information on my account is the exact same information. Name, birthday, social #, address EVERYTHING. Also, I did not get a single notification from them about this issue, which would have been helpful so that I could have solved this problem right away. Now I have to wait 3 MORE DAYS to even contact anyone about it because of the weekend. Their customer service people do not help whatsoever, they aren’t even nice. Do not get any type of direct deposit sent to this useless app... you will regret it. 

Oh and if that isn’t enough to scare you away, they charge $5 for using an out of network ATM

title: Current- my two cents
review:
Current is an amazing mobile banking account that can definitely make banking SUPER simple. The savings pods are super nice but I believe there is only 3 pods (at the moment) I’d love to see upwards to like 10-15 pods. Just to diversify your savings. You can also round up purchases to your pods which is really nice. But it’s still not that known by other major services such as Experian. I tried to use Experian boost but Current was not available as a bank account. Maybe in the future. It’s overall a really good first bank for teens. 

Despite the MANY MANY MANY SCAMMERS on Instagram, it’s still a good bank. NEVER SHARE YOUR INFO WITH ANYONE NOT EVEN CURRENT THEMSELVES THEY ALREADY KNOW YOUR INFORMATION.

What I would LOVE to see is a current credit card. That would be AMAZING.

Getting paid up to 2 days faster is also nice because well who doesn’t like getting paid early? 

No gas holdings is really nice. 

Havnt tried to current rewards yet, don’t really plan to but if you’re into that go for it. 

You can talk to service reps directly through the app. 

You can cash checks with your phone which is also a really nice feature.

Overall 9/10 amazing bank.

title: Christina Bradford
review: As of now if I could give zero stars I would. It's been almost a week and I still have not heard back from customer service and I've been calling every day and emailing as well I cannot access my current account or my phones on my account and I live in Texas and just survived the winter storm that came through my family and I how to do without any resources because I was not able to access the funds in my account and customer service is apparently too lazy two get back to me and help me resolve the issue. I feel like I'm being ignored intentionally like somebody's trying to keep my money before this issue I had a good experience with current except for the instant transfer thing but other than that pretty good but this is ridiculous at this moment in time I feel like I'm being stolen from and that's not right I will update my review later and get five stars if everything goes the way it supposed to go and I regain access to my account

title: 4 stars !
review: reason for my rating is because yes the getting paid a day earlier actually helps me a lot, I get to knock off a lot of my payments before putting the rest aside for the weekend or into savings . The only thing I didn’t like was that the getting paid on wed. Is SO LATE , that it’s practically already Thursday if you think about it lol, They should work on trying to making the funds go into your account early in the morning as a usual bank would, It really would make things a lot quicker & before all of these updates the customer service use to be so quick they would respond instantly and now it takes a bit more time, but like I said not complaining the app and the bank itself works pretty dang well(: Hopefully they improve these little things along the way !

title: Mobile check deposit
review: Don’t deposit your check. I went through process to mobile deposit my stimulus just to be rejected stating they need more verification. On their site it doesn’t say there’s a limit on how much a check can be deposited until after the fact that you signed it over to current. Now with my stimulus being denied and signed to them. I’m not allowed to cash my check anywhere else. Customer service told me to contact irs and have them send me another check. Like it also says on ther site. That they verify first with issuer before funds are deposited. Why do I need to call irs? They say they did that. I know irs did not send me a bogies check. Now i can’t get my stimulus money. They are not right

title: Easy to use but not SAFE!
review: I have had current for a little while now and recently I’ve had several issues with my account getting hacked into. I contacted support which is only a 24/7 chat and they did a “dispute” only to tell me my funds were not able to be recovered. The person that hacked into my account has a current account as well and I provided all the receipts and proof they needed to get my funds back into my account but they were able to do absolutely nothing. After that I ordered a new card and got a new virtual card. Its only been a week and someone is STILL ATTEMPTING TO USE MY CARD! Smh Current needs a better security system and a phone number to talk to live representatives. A lot of information can be misunderstood through a chat. So now I have to watch out for any money that comes into my account so that I can quickly transfer it out and close this account down for good.

title: No customer service!!!!
review: My account signed me out due to session expire! This is the first time in a year I’ve been signed out of my account and I cannot get back into it! It’s saying I already have an account with current when I type in my number but it is NOT giving me an option to sign in…only getting started! I sent SEVERAL emails and they are not helping me. What is very upsetting is you guys handle my MONEY and don’t give me the option to speak to a live representative???? I want to speak to someone regarding my account!!!! I don’t want to send emails and I don’t want to wait 24 hours for a reply! I just want my account fixed! I’ve used current for a long time and always recommend them to others but I’m so upset over this whole ordeal I’m on the verg of leaving current. It’s an uneasy feeling knowing yous control my money but have zero customer service! I WOULD LIKE TO SPEAK WITH SOMEONE! I cannot get into the App to talk to a live person!
developerResponse: {'id': 23335730, 'body': "Hey there, we understand the frustration and apologize for the issue you've experienced logging in to your account! We would be happy to update the information on your account and swiftly resolve this issue! Please shoot us an email at reviews@current.com for further assistance.", 'modified': '2021-06-11T20:31:54Z'}

title: Helped me get into account ☺️
review: They helped me get back into my account after I switched phone numbers and had trouble getting back in. I messaged them on Facebook because there was no way to reach anyone when you call. You only get the automated system. Anyway, I loved how swiftly and fast they helped me get back into my account so that I could pay my bills. The only reason why I am not giving 5 stars is because I believe that there should be a better way to reach them when things like this happen. The automated system doesn’t help with anything. I also believe that there should be other ways to get into your account besides the phone number, unless I’m missing something. Overall thank you current for helping me get access to my account !!

title: Good bank until you need support
review:
I have been using Current for a year, maybe a bit longer. The app itself is helpful; however if you need assistance of any kind, this is not the bank for you. The representatives I have dealt with in the past have been nothing short of rude. Even the process to change your own billing address is quite difficult. In order to get a replacement card it took several emails before they sent one out; even lied about having it shipped and then tried to charge me for shipping that they promised was free. Just a few issues I’ve had. Now, I recently got a new phone and number, and I can’t even access my account, nor has anyone from support cared to email me back. 

Bank with Chime if you choose something besides brick and mortar.

Also: sending this review again as no one has contacted me STILL and current isn’t trying to publish this review.

title: Terrible
review: When I first started using the card I had absolutely nothing to complain about until my card was used fraudulently I called the bank and disputed the charge 10 days and I would receive a provisional credit if I qualified I never got one so I assumed I didn’t about 45 days in I called to check the status was advised I should have gotten a credit  a request was sent wait 59 hrs for response 72 hrs went by no response allied back a whole week later same thing waited another 72 hrs still no response. The. Another charge happened disputed that As well as it had been fraud waited the 10 days no credit called after 15 days to inquire same thing request sent wait 49 hrs well my first dispute was over 100 days ago no resolution after 7 requests sent no response from anyone after countless days waiting for a response this is terrible service and I will not use this bank anymore Communication is key and they do lot communicate well
developerResponse: {'id': 19498115, 'body': 'We understand this can be frustrating and would love to take a further look into this. Please send us an email at reviews@current.com so we can take a further look into your overdrive. Sincerely, Support@Current\n\n', 'modified': '2020-12-02T18:52:52Z'}

title: TERRIBLE
review: My boyfriend got this card because he doesn’t have good enough credit to get a bank account and it’s terrible. Since last week he’s had 400 dollars stolen from his account. Not only was it stolen out of his account, money also got transferred out of his savings and spent as well. We are expecting a baby in the next couple months and now we don’t have enough money for rent and food and baby stuff, so now because of this stupid card we are facing being homeless and not having everything we need for our baby. We contacted customer service about it once and they said it could take up to three months to get his money back if he even gets it back at all, now today 200 more dollars a has been taken out of his account and he only has 60 dollars to his name because of it .I don't know what we’re going to do now and it’s all this cards fault. I’ve seen other comments with similar problems. DO NOT GET THIS APP.

title: Unemployment excepted
review:
This is the only Online bank that was excepted by the NJ unemployment Labor department. And Chime and Varo were not and although I had Cash App attached to it.
From the 2nd or 3rd week of getting my direct deposits. I NEVER ONCE AGAIN, got my deposits at the same time that I use to when using The Bank of America debit card that The NJ Unemployment office originally sent me. Instead my checks started showing up between 1-8 hours after the time that I use to get them through the Bank of America debit card and the reason I switched from them is because. I couldn’t use their card through the cash app 100% of the time. Most weeks, it just would not process any of my add cash or pay request??

title: So glad I did this!!
review: So my other bank I was constantly having issues with them of trying to get money back that was taken out of my account and it’s been two years and I still never got my refund that the company gave me and sent it to them but they lost it and can’t find it to give me my money back so go figure!? So I saw the advertisement for this and I figured why not give it a try and I’m so glad I did because when I have an issueOf money coming out of my account I can contact someone there they open a dispute and they give me my money back quick!!! Anybody that is thinking about changing to another bank current should be your answer because they are amazing!

title: Much more than a sleek design
review:
Let me first say that this is the most visually pleasing banking app I’ve ever used.   The color schemes are reminiscent of neon lights in the darkness and the interactive facets of the design are smooth and perfectly responsive.  

It is so much more than aesthetics.   Early direct deposit with free overdraft, cash deposits at stores, fee free ATM’s, instantly refunded gas station holds, customizable savings pods, easily lockable virtual and physical cards, a unique cash back feature where you can buy cash for your account with points earned by swiping at stores  that have multipliers for money spent up to 8 times with an easy to use map to find where to get the most, free overdraft protection, a unique brand blocking feature, referral bonuses and spending tracking by category and brand, custodial accounts for your children and multiple budget builds make this banking app stand out in the crowd.  

55,000 free ATMs and no minimum balance are just the icing on the cake.   I would like to see an investing feature or crypto currency section in the future, but this app is at the head of the class already.    

Great job, Current.

title: Best online Checking account
review: Hi everyone I’ve been using current bank almost month and a half now and seriously I’m very very happy with this bank before current I was using a Varo bank venmo paypal and more online bank and all these bank always a problem they were always frozen my account probably 3 to 6 times a month and then I have to call them to unblock it that’s the number one issue that I had with all these bank they’re just wasting your time you know as you guys know time is money every time I was on the phone with the customer service to unlock my account take me at least one hour or more but now I don’tHave any of this problem anymore thank God

title: It was good
review: So apparently they offer a service called overdrive on there website if you meet their requirements. They will let you overdraft 100 on your account untill next payday. Which is very helpful for some. The requirements is u have to buy there  premium check and have at least 500 each month in direct deposits.  I have had this account for months and get way more then 500 each month and paid for the premium checking and still I don’t have on my account. I contacted customer service only to have someone that was completely rude tell me they won’t review my account.  Why you offer a the service then?  Is it just to lure people into opening the accounts. Seems pretty scandalous.  And another big problem is you can’t connect your bank to plaid which I hope they will fix. I would say it’s a okay bank but don’t open a account if you read that they offer overdrive. Because you won’t get it.

title: They never let you quit. Poor customer service.
review:
It was good before my son was eligible for a debit card. Some places wouldn’t accept it because they consider it a prepaid card. At times there was a delay to transfer funds to my account to give to him. The $36 annual fee stinks. Plus it’s difficult to cancel. You can only do it via chat with someone. I waited for 30 minutes and was still 10th in line. No reminder of renewal so beware!!! My husband couldn’t have access because you have to provide your Ss# and we didn’t want to give this place so much personal info. They have direct access to my bank because I was giving my son money so they have no incentive to quit charging my annual fee. 

I am now changing to a 1 star. I have been trying over a month to cancel. I was charged another annual fee. The only response I ever get is to ask why but no actual help. I have told at least 5 times why. Next week I will file a BBB complaint.
developerResponse: {'id': 3858037, 'body': "Hello- Since we are a financial product we do need your SSN to verify your identity. We do not store it. You can learn more about our security here: https://current.com/security. \n\nHowever, we'd love to take a look at your account to see what the issue is regarding the duplication of chores. Could you please email us at support@current.com from your email on file?", 'modified': '2018-06-15T17:37:50Z'}

title: Cash deposits
review: The app I have won’t allow me to access the barcode to do in app cash deposits. I’ve talked to support multiple times deleted and reinstalled the app and still has not been fixed. Other than that i love the card I would just rather be able To add money to this card rather than load onto another card and have to wait for it to transfer over.  I love everything else about the card the in app cash deposits are my only issue really. It may be my type of phone (iPhone 7 software is 14.0.1) reason to the app not being updated yet my current app version is 4.12.4 says it was updated yesterday so I’m not sure what’s going on. I will be so much happier when I am able to load my money on
developerResponse: {'id': 18150716, 'body': "Hi, we'd be happy to see what happened with your account. Please contact us at reviews@current.com. Sincerely, Support@Current\n\n", 'modified': '2020-09-28T14:10:09Z'}

title: 3.5 stars
review:
Update: 3.0 after developer response: that instant transfers may be suspended after suspicious activity. No suspicious activity has been experienced on my account for greater than one year. No timeline mentioned as to when the account will be reviewed. Tell me to reply via my review - should I just put my account info here? Also, this is different from what customer service said in our conversation. So, I like the card for the most part but if yours going to essentially run a bank, you can do better than this. 

Like the app but no longer able to make instant money transfers. I used to be able to. Customer service says accounts are “reviewed” for this function but can’t say when the review will happen. Customer service was helpful and responsive. Just annoyed with the company.

title: New User
review: So far I give 4 stars because I was easily able to get my direct deposit set up for my paycheck. No hassle at all. Secondly, I was able to set up a savings pod, which is perfect because I am saving money for an apartment. Transferring money into it took seconds and I have the option to round up my change into it whenever I make a purchase using my card. Awesome!! Third, I am able to select a store that I am going to and get points for every dollar spent at whatever store it may be. I haven’t used the full feature yet as I just got this account and haven’t even received my card yet but it also hasn’t been 2 weeks yet either lol but thank you so much for developing such an awesome prepaid card!! So far I love it!!

title: Poor customer service
review: Never get a banking company prepaid or other that doesn’t have a direct customer  number to where you can speak to someone. current makes it difficult for you to get in touch with them their only option is email and chat which  you’re always number 80 in queue and have to wait more than two hours or you have to email someone and wait 24 to 40 hours for them to respond when you’re going without food no gas and kids crying because their hungry Because you can’t access your account because current doesn’t allow you to have a online profile only a app to where you can make updates.I tried logging in my account using email option which it gives for the app to tell me I can’t use my email and wants me use the number that is no longer in service. Does that make sense

title: Best Mobile Bank!!!
review: I’ve experienced nothing but great service since signing up for premium, I was one of the first people to receive my stimulus check via direct deposit and I haven’t been hit with any hidden fees which is a big plus to me considering that two other mobile banks I’ve used always seem to charge me random fees every other week so I got every single penny without any hassles. They alert me after every transaction and the app is very easy to navigate. I would definitely recommend this app to anybody trying to open a bank account, you WILL NOT regret banking with Current... Definitely 5 out of 5 stars!!!!!

title: Poor Customer Service
review: This card service does not offer 24-hour support like they say they do. They use a chatbot to communicate with its customers. It’s very hard to get in contact with a live representative. I have been trying to get in contact with a live representative to get my card unlocked do to their fraud protection plan. My card has been locked for almost three weeks and I only heard from a live representative once. The representative told me to give them 72 hours to unlock my card but when 72 hours came my card was still locked. I tried contacting them through the app, email, and phone number and I’ve had no luck. This company is very unprofessional.  They offer a number to call but every time you call no one answers and the automated answer system keeps redirecting me to go to the app to talk to the chat bot. DO NOT open an account with this company.

title: Horrible
review: I been using them for almost two years and I am not satisfied at all with them. I don’t even qualify for the overdrive program that they have been advertising for new customers due to not being “selected” at the time. I have filed two disputes with them and lost both even though I submitted plenty of proof that I never received my goods I purchased ALSO whenever I instantly deposit funds from cash app they do not reflect immediately, I get it 3 or 4 days later!!!! When I ask why that is I get told that the funds aren’t on their end and they can not release the funds to me!! I don’t even get paid 2 days early anymore which was the point of me having this card . Customer service is rude and not helpful , they end the chat or are rude to you whenever you ask a question. This company is a joke and I will be taking my business elsewhere!!!
developerResponse: {'id': 19811482, 'body': "Hi there, we're sorry to hear about your experience and would be happy to look into this further. Please reach out to our customer support team at reviews@current.com so that we can assist you. Sincerely, Support@Current", 'modified': '2020-12-16T17:40:30Z'}

title: So good
review:
I've been with current for a few months now and they're really good. 

Pros: early direct deposit, can create multiple savings inside, can pause your card anytime and even use a VIRTUAL card, can block brands so they won't charge your account (useful for subscriptions), they even make you feel happy about the littlest things. "Hurray your direct deposit has arrived!" 

Cons: has verification problems when logging into different devices, long wait for customer support, can't call only online chat, and if you can't bypass the phone number verification you have to contact support somehow only. There's more good and bad  but i don't want to make it seem like it's bad because it's not.

title: Amazing & Good for Saving & Cashback!
review: It's amazing! They have taken a lot of time with the design of this app. Saving categories, spending and categories are involved. What makes this app special to me is that it's easy to navigate around, support is quick and handy, and you get cashback for Everytime you swipe with your card! You get points added up at places when you spend so no need to feel like there's a whole burning in your pocket because it's getting snowed back up with Current! I have premium and the benefits are definitely worth getting money two days later. Transferring money takes 1-2 days. It's awesome I swear.

title: Customer Service and Protection
review: Don’t get scammed if you’re using Current you will not get your money back no matter how much proof you have I was scammed out of $1500 provided so much proof that it was a scam and waited several months just to get my dispute denied, and you can’t reopen the case either. My second complaint is once I left Current I had a deposit sent to the closed account by accident I’ve been emailing customer support to get my money out of the closed account for the past 4 days with no response when it clearly says we typically respond in 24 HOURS!! Lastly calling the Current customer support is pointless you don’t get to talk to anyone just a bot reading a menu to you telling you to use chat. I suggest SoFi, Chime, or Oxygen. Current just isn’t quite there yet when it comes to customer support or protection.
developerResponse:
{'id': 22226972, 'body': "Hi there, thanks for the review & we apologize for your experience with us. We completely understand the importance of great customer service, especially when it comes to your personal finances . However, it sounds like we seriously failed you & want to ensure you that this is not the type of customer support we aim to achieve. 

Please contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account so that we can look into what's going on here & address any questions/concerns you may have. 

Looking forward to your response!

Sincerely, 
Support@Current", 'modified': '2021-04-13T22:02:28Z'}

title: I’m convinced
review: I was a little hesitant to open this account. I mean who banks with a bank that you only hear about from an app commercial, right. Well I’m convinced. I get my direct deposit 2 days faster. It cool because it’s not my entire paycheck, just some back up money to hold me over until Friday. Also the ease of setting up the “savings pod” is great, they round up all your purchases to the dollar and move it to your pod. Pretty good stuff the only thing I wasn’t crazy about was the policy that your first deposit cannot be a personal check. I guess they are protecting themselves from the rubber balls lol.

title: No money without a physical card
review: I received this account back last week . I’ve had money in my account since Monday it would let me send myself money or Apple Pay myself with the virtual card. So I said let me send money to my BOA account that was last night and it still not available. This card is trash . Especially the way the mail has been running in the US . Please don’t get this card I’m in dyer need of cash right now. I can’t even touch my money . This is soo frustrating I’ve never seen a card like this a least you guys could put a fee with the virtual card so that people can access their money some type of way. Don’t think that if someone you knows have current then you can access it that way you can’t until you receive your physical card and no telling how long this will be. Please Don’t Use Current EVER .
developerResponse: {'id': 21693504, 'body': "Hi there, we're sorry to hear about the issues you've been experiencing! Our user's are able to use their virtual card for any purchases online while they wait for their card to arrive in the mail. However, you aren't able to fully utilize your account's features with your virtual card for security purposes. Please contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address associated with your account for help! \nSincerely, \nSupport@Current", 'modified': '2021-03-16T21:58:29Z'}

review: I’ve been using current for a couple of months now and the only problem I have is that my card has been in review twice now. The fact of the problem is I had no suspicious activity for the first time and my card was under review over a week, it shouldn’t take over a week to review someone’s card, at that time leaving me unable to pay pills and etc. I had to call the bank that actually issues the card, just to get them to yall to finish my review. This time I can’t even open the app to see if my taxes came through or my check. When I try and call customer service it goes straight to voice mail, you’d think you should be able to talk to someone if you’re money is being withheld, can I Atleast get a notice that my card is being reviewed.

title: Currently current!!!
review: This card is alright for now I've heard some serious issues happening with the way things get done with customer service i am curious to see for myself to see how things get done.  I have a couple of issues being handled with the customer service department . I don’t like not being able to speak directly to a agent or human when dealing with a issue you have to chat 💬 with a bot ! They are willing to help but not live! However they do there best to help you! I do like the perks of the  virtual card can come in handy! Overall this card is somewhat of an asset to have in your wallet.

title: Lured with false promises
review: This is the first app review I am leaving because these people ruined my day. I was just trying to enter a sweepstakes, then found out that the rules of the sweepstakes were neither clear nor encompassing of what is required. My mom is a lawyer and I just got my math degree, so I am very good at logic and implications and there was nothing in the rules stipulating what ended up being needed. The customer service then said I had misunderstood and that the sweepstakes is only for existing members with a physical card, which made no sense. And was all around unhelpful. They even told me my account was made yesterday even though I had made it that morning (and got so fed up with it, that the account was ended the day it started). Don’t be tricked into getting this, and if you are and want customer service, be ready to essentially talk to a brick wall.
developerResponse: {'id': 23251584, 'body': "Hi there, thanks for leaving a review & we're sorry to hear about this! We would be more than happy to look into what went wrong here & answer any questions or concerns you may have about the sweepstakes you're referring to. If you still need assistance, please reach out to us at reviews@current.com from the email address that was associated with your account. \n\nWe hope to hear from you soon so that we can make this right! ", 'modified': '2021-06-08T01:14:51Z'}

title: It’s okay. Could be better.
review: I have to say I was initially very happy with current but since the last update I’ve noticed some really bad changes. Example I used to get my paychecks deposited on Wednesday now it’s Thursday. And I used to get instant money transfers now they’re holding transfers for 5 days and it says I have to earn instant transfers? What? I already had them and now I don’t? Why? Also I’m not happy with the earning money back feature because you have to allow current to access your location at all times to gain the money back benefits. Having the navigation on “always” kills my battery. I would really like to see the option to have location tracking on “only while using”.
developerResponse:
{'id': 21979980, 'body': "Hi there, thanks for the review & we apologize for your recent experience with us. Members who are eligible for instant transfers may have the feature temporarily suspended if we see irregular activity on their account. Should you qualify again, we'll be sure to notify you via email!

Customer feedback is incredibly important to us, especially as we continue to improve the products & services we offer. If you have additional feedback or any questions/concerns, feel free to contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address associated with your account. 

Sincerely, 
Support@Current", 'modified': '2021-03-31T22:40:12Z'}

title: Don’t use this card
review: My card has been locked for more than 2 weeks and I emailed over 10 times you can’t call them once it’s locked it just hangs up on you you can’t call at all they tell you to email someone finally got back to me 2 days ago basically telling me if they need anything else from me they will tell me iv asked over and over to close this account and send my money in a check and that’s the response I got ??? What do you need from me ? my deposit from work has been sitting there for a whole 2 weeks and no one will unlock my account or CLOSE MY ACCOUNT LIKE I ASKED they barley respond do not use this service if you need help you won’t get it if you ask to close out your account they will ignore you and just keep your money on the card but respond on the app’s review page but not customer service
developerResponse:
{'id': 19762562, 'body': "Hi there! We're sorry to hear about your experience and appreciate your feedback. We'd be happy to resolve this issue for you, please send us an email at reviews@current.com. 

Thank you!

Sincerely, 
Support@Current", 'modified': '2020-12-14T21:29:04Z'}

title: Love it!
review: The only issue I have is putting cash In my account, other than that I have only had one issue in the 6 months I’ve had it and when I logged into the app to see what happened I got a message that linked me to an customer rep through text that fixed my issue in under 20 seconds. I also have a 12 year old that has her own card on my account and transferring money to it is so easy and takes 5 seconds and is transferred instantly and I can control how it’s spent if you want or I can transfer it to a savings pod that we set up. I love this company!

title: Customer service
review: I've been using current for quite some time now but the customer service lacks tremendously my card info was hacked and used and my account was used in total about 250 dollars for website membership that I had no recollection of. They put a claim I waited for their response the refunded me two out of the 5 claims I put in and denied the other three. When I tried to call and find out a bot threw the chat said check my email for my answer never received a email when I tried to dispute it again the closed it out so I lost out on more than 100 bucks with no real explanation for charges I never authorized.  Current gave away my hard earned money and I still continue to use them in hopes that one day I will get my money back

title: Stressful
review:
I love how simple and user-friendly this banking app is. I loved it so much that I completely switched over from another bank. But the spending limit has gotten me into some really difficult situations. The daily limit is only $2000. On a day-to-day basis, this is fine. But I have bills and tuition to pay. It is absolutely devastating when you’re in the middle of a busy day after paying loads of bills and you hit the limit trying to buy groceries or dinner. And there’s nothing the support team will/can do to help.

Like I said, I love the app. But I’m seriously considering closing my account because of how much stress this has added to my life. 

My only other complaint is with the mobile check deposits. It always takes 5-7 days for them to process a mobile deposit. My last bank took 3 days max, and they would forward you $300 of the check until the full amount processed. Not all employers offer direct deposit! 

Honestly I’m already on the hunt for a new bank. I don’t need all of this extra stress. Some little part of me is still hoping they’ll make some changes though, because I really do enjoy the platform.
developerResponse:
{'id': 23251387, 'body': "Hey there, thanks for taking the time to leave us a review & we're sorry to hear about your experience with us! Although your spending limit for purchases made with your card is $2000, you also have a daily ATM limit that is $500. If you don't need to withdraw cash for the day, the additional $500 can also go toward your $2000 limit for a total Daily Spending Limit of $2500.

For bills & other payments, you can always link your account & routing numbers to have them withdraw the funds directly out of your checking account. These payments will appear as ACH withdrawals & will not apply towards your Daily Spending Limit. 

As for our mobile check deposit feature, your funds should settle between 3-5 business days & shouldn't take up to 7 business days to be made available. If this is a recurring issue, we would be more than happy to look into this! 

We're constantly working to improve the products & services we offer & your feedback/suggestions are incredibly important to us! 

If you have any other questions, concerns, or additional feedback, please contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account. We hope to hear from you soon! ", 'modified': '2021-06-08T00:54:13Z'}

title: Used to be a great card
review: I used to love this card for my 2 sons. I was able to  track their spending, give them money for jobs, had automatic deposits for allowance. Things were great. Unfortunately despite me trying to block a certain merchant the charges still kept going through and I would get notifications that a card was declined. Now I no longer have access to instant deposits. It’s very frustrating. Why would I want to wait 2-3 days? I need the piece of mind that I can send money to my children instantly, when they need it.
