Customer service also was not helpful. Never said instant deposits would return, said they had no control over it. You should format your app better to deal with customer issues if that is the case.

title: Still happy with this card
review: I wrote a review shortly after getting my Current account. I felt I should update anyone considering this card on my thoughts about it.I have had it a few months and I’m still very pleased with their service. Anytime I’ve had questions or concerns in regards to my account I have received fast, friendly and thorough help. I’ve never had difficulty receiving a response right away. You do need to give them a moment to review your account depending on the situation you have. I’m a relatively impatient person, and I am nothing but pleased with this service.

title: Has potential to forever change the banking game.
review: So this is my first bank account and I have to say this was easy as 123. Many banks require a sit down interaction to have an account opened up. Current makes it fast to open up and is very on top of their game. I received my card in 2 days! Current is a legit bank and is honestly the best online one. If current can keep their customer satisfaction up, they have the potential of becoming the biggest banking platform in the nation. Current makes life so much easier as well as provides many benefits.

title: Money is not safe & terrible customer service
review: Do not waste your time with this terrible app. I set up my account had fraud happen 2 days later I had not even receive a card yet and I get a notification of someone trying to use it. I reach out their useless customer department. Who told me they do not care and can’t do anything about it until the 15th to give the card more time to arrive. Clearly the card is not coming because it was stolen! Teresedad the customer service rep did nothing to help. She refused to understand or do anything. I was so mad that I told her I want to delete my account. She was quick to let me delete the account. What a waste of time. I am going to get apple to refund the money I paid for the app. Do not waste your time, money, or effort with this app. Your money is not safe. Beware!
developerResponse: {'id': 23251458, 'body': "Hi there, thanks for taking the time to leave us a review & we're terribly sorry to hear about your experience with our customer support team. We want to make this right & we'd be more than happy to look into your previous interactions with our agents & answer any questions/concerns you may have. \n\nPlease contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account. We look forward to hearing back from you! ", 'modified': '2021-06-08T01:02:36Z'}

title: Where’s my money
review:
On July 9th,2020 I tried to withdraw $500 from an ATM that’s linked to the app that’s free of charge. 
And as I was doing so the atm displayed an error message and did not dispense my money.  So I filed a dispute. I figured since I used an ATM linked to the app it be no issue and it would be solved quickly. Well it’s now November 24th. And I still have not received anything, no updates from the “dispute team” somehow the customer service can’t ever get a response from them. And you can’t even call these people. Due to covid reason that’s just an excuse. Can’t they work from home just like every other bank in the world is doing!? And every time I chat with someone I get the same response. They will email me with an update on my dispute. Which I never get. This is ridiculous. I’m starting to regret opening this account.

title: Horrible
review: This is the worst customer service I have ever received. Nobody seems to be able to help me. I have reached out several times regarding a pending amount due to a decline for a purchase for insufficient funds (even though there was enough money in my account to cover the purchase), and nobody seems to be able to assist me. I want to know why the amount is still pending. I also want to know why it takes so long for money that I transfer from my other bank to be available. The customer service is absolutely horrible and I will be closing this account. The only reason a gave you one star is because I couldn’t write this review otherwise. Shame on you for misleading yet another consumer! You deserve zero stars just based on the customer service alone.
developerResponse:
{'id': 22132297, 'body': "Hi there, thanks for leaving an honest review & we apologize for your experience with our customer support team. 

Regarding the pending charges, it can take anywhere between 10-15 business days for those to reverse back into your account, as this is dependent on when the merchant has reversed the funds.  For transfers from a funding source to your Current account, those can take 3-5 business days to deposit into your account as they have to go through the ACH network before they arrive into your account.  These are fairly standard time frames across most financial institutions & other mobile banks. 

We understand the importance of customer service, especially when it comes to your personal finances & we strive to provide top quality service in a seamless & efficient way. However, it sounds like we've failed to do that for you & we are terribly sorry about this. We'd like the chance to look into what went wrong here & how we can best assist you moving forward. 

Please contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account & let us know if you have any questions or concerns. 

Sincerely, 
Support@Current", 'modified': '2021-04-08T18:30:26Z'}

title: Locked out of account
review: I have been locked out of my account and unable to use my funds for the last 3 days! I recently changed my number. And phone I don’t have access to the last number ! When logging into my account it gives you the option  to log in with email I select that and it’s still asking me to verify the number I do not have access too! I have sent multiple emails and lef voice messages over 10 times and I still haven’t gotten a reply the funds are in my saving accounts so I need to get access to transfer ! Something so simple is leaving a very bad taste in my mouth and I’m sure after gaining access to my account I am moving all my funds to a different account cuz this doesn’t make any sense ! I have haven’t got access and my funds are being held from me

title: So far, so good!
review: I just wish they could be a bit more transparent with card advertising, what they advertise is the premium membership which will cost you a mere $4.99 a month. What I started off with was the basic membership that is free. I have no problem with the basic membership, but the premium membership is what they advertise EVERYWHERE I’ve seen. Again, I have no negative comments about the app or the company, I am only saying I wish there was more transparency with what membership you will likely sign up for when you get your account with current 😁

title: Current Rocks My Boat!
review: I have tried quite a few mobile banking options, and hands down, Current is the best in every way. First, in app customer support. No email or phone number for contact (though these are available as well). You can actually speak to a helpful agent in real time as easy as texting a friend. The interface is stunning — no outdated clunky design. You have the ability to pause your virtual card or your debit card and easily turn it back on. I could go on. I’ve found my new home bank. Thank you, Current!

title: Okay!
review: Okay so don’t get me wrong I love this app. I get paid a day sooner. But it’s some flaws. I’m unable to get the feature of the $100 overdraft, maybe because when I started they didn’t have that feature? But I don’t find that fair if I’ve been a loyal supporter and I’m unable to use that feature. Plus I’ve been waiting since August for my refund since someone got into my account and took out money. It’s about to be a new year and no one has helped me out. Which is stupid cause it’s only suppose to take 90 days. I’m kind of over it if you ask me.

title: I love this bank
review: This bank is by far in the top five in my opinion, you get paid up to 2 days early, if you have kids you can open up an account like an allowance for them to use or save if necessary. I love the fact that you don’t have to block out the whole entire card from any transactions but if you don’t want a certain transaction to come out you can block out that specific merchant to put a stop a payment. I definitely recommend it to anyone who needs a good bank account for them and their kids.

title: Actually Great
review: I’ve been a current premium customer for years and can honestly say I’ve never had any issues with them , There customer service responds fast and there 24/7 , You actually do get paid 3 days early not two as advertised , Card works everywhere the design in the app and the card looks good I actually use it as a bank only problem that I do have is it has a daily spending limit of 2,000 dollars that’s the ONLY bad thing about this bank it doesn’t let you update it neither for sum reason

title: Love+A Tip
review: This app has a lot of good ground and started off with such an easy platform to do so with. As it grows and adds more improvements to its systems I’m really enjoying the growth. Which brings me to my tip and idea. But adding easy ways to grow our own income throughout your financially system and help to generate income on a potentially significant level. Might be too big for most “glass half full/half empty people” but for us “it’s a glass with water” thinkers.  Could be a good move forward. Thanks for the continued updates and making this app actually worth the download. 😇🥰

title: Meant for children I guess?
review:
As an adult, this account just didn’t work for me. 
I see people raving that it’s good to fund their kids’ allowance.
 I signed up for the premium account, which is $4.99 a month. 
You can waive that fee by spending $500 first ONLY in specific places on the map provided (which demands to track your precise location in order to work AlWAYS). You collect points when you spend at specific locations, then you can “buy” the option for a month free. 

No interest if you decide to use savings pod. (I personally didn’t expect this feature but just in case anyone was wondering.

But the biggest problem I have with the app is the $3.50 to reload. Whaaaaat the heck is the point of the card? I might as well buy gift cards. Since it’s loaded through vanilla? 

MOBILE check deposit? NO. Don’t do it. I made a mobile deposit with a small amount first just in case and I’m glad I did so. The estimated clear date was extended one day. They lag and I have a feeling it’s on purpose. I mean god forbid a $7 check were to be wrongfully deposited. 

Support really has never answered my questions or helped me in any way whenever I ask.

title: DO  NOT USE CURRENT
review: I got current for my teenage daughter. Thought it would be a great tool to teach my teenage daughter about money. We used the card for about 6 months, I cancelled it because it just wasn’t working for us. Fast forward to over a year later, I get a fraudulent charge of $250 taken out of my bank account from Current. I got in touch with current and they were of absolutely no help. They would not refund my money and I could  never even talk with a real person. I hadn’t been on the app for over a year, current card had been shredded and they were of no help in correcting the situation. STAY AWAY FROM THIS COMPANY they have no customer service and they do not care that that the lack of security on there side is causing issues to their current and past customers!

1st off I knew nothing about Current til I had a friend tell me about it... In the beginning I was only using this card with my cash app... Then I decided to have half my paycheck set up direct deposit so that  I could get paid 2 days early.. Not the case I received a notification on a Wednesday night round 8:16pm saying that my direct deposit had hit my account that was good to know being I needed to get some medicine... Well I checked my account and the money that was deposited was now pending in my account... I still couldn’t get any money because it wasn’t available to withdraw... When it did come thru it was that Thursday night... So I still didn’t make a withdrawal til my actual payday that Friday... I refuse to sign up for the premium... today I will be unlinking my direct deposit...

title: True to what they Promise✨😭
review: With only a fee of only $4.99 a month, I received a premium checking account card and my check came two days early as promised!!! I LOVVEEE the fact that I can earn and redeem points from buying food and shopping to receive even more money on my card! I’m not gonna lie I heard about Current from a group of amazing YouTubers (RDCWorld) and I was at first hesitant to try it but I really needed a new card that wasn’t prepaid from my job and gave me problems like my old one. BUT I DO NOT REGRET MY DECISION AT ALL!!!❤️❤️❤️ I recommend it❤️✨

title: 4-5 months later into a dispute and still waiting
review: Started off as a good banking option until $675 was taken out of my account and when I realized it not even a minute after the charge appeared on my account and alerted me, I tried to reach out to customer service which is only thru text messages.. Now here it is November 20th and I still haven’t received my funds back and everytime I try to contact the customer support all I get is that they will email the dispute team because after they make the file, is out of their hands.. Not to mention when they send you a new card you have no access to your money until you receive your new card almost 2 weeks later..

title: Some issues but overall I like them
review: Super easy banking and good for now, however I had an issue with some money that got taken out of my account for a membership that was never paid. I was in contact with both the current bank and my other membership and neither of them could figure out where the money went so they basically told me there was no error and my money is just gone. The help was incredibly minimal on their end and I still have not solved this solution. Overall I don’t mind the banking itself just the customer service.

title: Bad customer service
review: Current has a great model. App and service did work fine. Now app is telling me to reverify my bank. Then it comes up and says my bank has already been been reverifed but still won’t allow instant deposit. The chat to reach what should be customer service is a joke (if you need to chat with them be sure you take a toothbrush and a change of clothes). You stay on chat for hours and then no one knows what they are doing. Then the developers ask for feedback for the app and limit the characters to about less than 3 normal sentences!! My issue still isn’t resolved, but I don’t have another 2 hours to spend waiting for a non-trained chat rep to come on the chat session. I wouldn’t recommend this app or company to a dog to use.
developerResponse:
{'id': 16153212, 'body': 'We regret to note this. Please contact us at reviews@current.com with your contact details so that we can address your concern. 

Sincerely, 
Support@Current

', 'modified': '2020-06-22T22:10:51Z'}

title: Thanks to Mr. Beast & the Current Team!
review:
I’m seriously excited to put this opportunity and genius & completely beneficial App to use! From my everyday work, bills, investments, family priorities and important obligations. This beats Chime and other bank apps by light years! 
Got my fingers crossed I win any of the Mr. Beast prizes to sweeten this amazing choice! God knows it would help immensely on so many levels and many ways. 
Highly recommend taking those few minutes to start the process and change to a better and wiser way of investing and managing.

title: Good Luck
review:
I signed up for a free trial after a friend told me to check it out. I decided they were ok but decided to cancel on Jan 2nd. I emailed support and was asked why and to email again to cancel my account. I then emailed again and said I’m not interested and want to close my account. I was told I’d receive an email in 24-72 hours. Today I was charged a fee of $4.99 on my other bank account I linked. I opened the app and did a chat. The rep closed my account and said I had to request a refund after the charge posted in 3-5 business days. I then was kicked off the app as my account was closed so I can’t even chat with support. 

This fee was taken after 4 emails requesting my account be closed. I would like it refunded now and not have to fight for it in a week!!

title: Horrible!
review: Do not bank with them they are a fraudulent company, several people have complained about their money being stolen from their account and one person even threatened by an employee. My personal experience, they are very unprofessional, there is no contact information other than the customer service number that they do not answer at all. They locked my card and did not tell me anything i have been trying to contact them for a week now and have gotten no response even tried reaching out to the founder stuart sopp and got no reply but a friend request on twitter from the banks social media page , the banks page told me to dm them with my issue and never responded. Please save yourself a headache and do drugs before you ever decide to bank with this branch.

title: MIND BLOWN
review: First let me start by saying… CURRENT, I freakin LOVVVVVVVVVVE YOU!!!!!😍 you guys are so AWESOME!!!!! After the weekend I had (just this past weekend) my phone shattering COMPLETLY, needing to buy a whole New phone, not being able to re’ activate my i-cloud for my e-mail, nor keep my phone number. Losing EVERY THING I had stored… I thought Hope was loss…😒 However, after txting with two Very Helpful… … ANGELS (Alvin & Hector)… … LIFE WAS RESTORED!!!!!👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼🥳🥳🥳 I am now able to log-in using my NEW Phone number and, have ACCESS to my “ACCOUNT”! You guys at “CURRENT” are THE “BEST”!!!!!!!!!!!! Thanks again👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼💯

title: Keep your Money!
review: I don’t know how this app has so many great reviews. Capital one didn’t even want me to work with these people. The verification process Plaid is not up to par with their standards and your information is not safe. I’d rather keep my money in a couch before letting these incompetent  people deal with my money. As other customers explained their customer service (if you can even call it that) amazes me by the lack of help they give you. Chatters use just the information that is already provided in the website. They obviously can’t even think for themselves. If they can’t answer your question they just quote that over and over without helping. Good luck, I’d recommend switching to green dot or even chime...Even cash app at this point.

title: Nice App, Great Ideas, Worlds Worst Bank Customer Service
review: I really want to like Current and if I had never had to speak with support this would be a five star review. If you choose to use this app be forewarned that they are according to them unable to perform basic banking support that Chime, Level, and One Finance have all been able to provide for me. Also should you make the mistake of paying for premium and then change your mind they cancel your debit card and mail you a new on in 10-12 business days. If you like copy and paste responses from chat support Current is the bank to choose if you want a real bank that is able to provide real customer support  choose literally any other bank including the three I already mentioned.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18717025, 'body': "Hi there! We appreciate your feedback and are truly sorry to hear about the experience that you've had with our service. We would be happy to investigate the issues that you've had further. Please reach out to our team at reviews@current.com for assistance. 

Sincerely, 
Support@Current
", 'modified': '2020-10-26T20:02:17Z'}

title: Not helpful
review: Im giving it one star because first off they false advertise the “free overdraft”, secondly the people on app support are really not helpful at all and it doesn’t make any sense that when you call the number you can’t even talk to a real person. Lastly this whole app or whatever seems useless if they cant do simple things like cancel payments, dispute charges or putting you in contact with someone who can actually HELP. I’ll be finding another bank b/c current is not the way to go worse than cashapp:

title: Incredible Service for Online Banking!
review: Current is easily the most streamlined and well-designed banking app that I have ever seen, let alone used. The functions within the app are all placed well and functions quickly and just as you would expect them to work. The design makes for easy money transfers and the ability to link PayPal and other services such as Chime and my business accounts only serve to distill further in my mind that Current is the superior application for online mobile banking.

title: wow i’m so disappointed
review: the catch to getting paid two days earlier is to become a premium card holder which costs a fee! My account was breached and $132 was taken out of my account . I filed a dispute and submitted the paperwork to support my claim , I submitted my claim back in August. I was told the investigation process could take up to 90 days which it did . Nobody every reached out to me , I kept chatting with support (no direct line to call) to figure out the status of my dispute. Just yesterday as i reached out again much after the 90 day period i was informed my dispute case was close and the amount was not credited back to my account. After waiting more than 5 months, constantly reaching out i finally got a direct answer. Very disappointed in this company

title: Customer Service is a joke!
review: I’ve been trying to dispute a charge now for 3 days and no one has gotten back to me via email as promised! The first 2 attempts were a joke bc the reps Rob and Essa were somehow amused with my inquiries and purposely had me on hold for about 15 mins before they ended my session rudely, without telling me anything. Almost as if they were joking with each other!!! This is absolutely ridiculous! Why is there a phone number for this company when it only lures and directs you to chat with customer service through the app instead to speaking to a rep? I have been with this company for a little over a year now and I think it’s time to end my relationship with them. The representatives via chat are classless and lack empathy! I’m livid! To Chime I go!

title: Lost in a financial world full of scams and traps
review: In 2021 there are plenty of options to choose from when it comes to an online bank! But during these tough times being on unemployment means you need to either go with the debit card the state send you or choose a larger bank with Current I can receive my unemployment benefits a day faster than I would with the state debit card and two days faster for federal. That aside it allows me to overdraft if I need to! This app is incredible I’m very glad I found it

title: Current
review: Current is way better than I thought it was going to be. In many cases it’s even better than the primary banks we use. Thank you current for having great service. Current makes it easier for us to take control of our finances. Current makes me feel comfortable with using them as a bank. They don’t make you feel like a child that gets an allowance when our job and our bank feels like we deserve it. Current let’s it be known that “IT’S OUR MONEY, AND NOT ONLY DO WE NEED IT NOW, BUT WE NEED IT NOW”! THANK YOU CURRENT YOU ROCK!

title: Current
review: If you don’t have a current bank account, What are you doing? Make your funds easier to spend with sorting your budget out on the App! Use your Virtually card when you leave your physical card at home or even when it’s lost it all works when your with Current it’s a Win Win situation!!! Bank with Current NOW!!!! Oh, Did you say you don’t have enough?? Thanks to current they give you a free overdrive everything is alright with current! Get your Current Card Now!

title: Useless.
review:
I downloaded this app in the hope that I’d be able to quickly transfer money to our son.  He downloaded the app too, we both got cards, and I paid the $36 annual fee for the service.  

It took five business days for my initial deposit to settle into my account, which I expected.  What I didn’t expect was that, despite the funds showing as settled and available, it would take yet more days to transfer that money from my Current account to his.  Being accustomed to  the speed of Venmo, this all seemed pretty ridiculous.

I think I’ve contacted customer service ten times about this issue, and no one seems to even understand what I’m talking about.  Customer service consistently gave advice ranging from clueless, to straight up wrong. Their own website says this:

“...if you maintain a balance on Current as a parent, you can avoid waiting for additional deposits by transferring settled funds from your balance to your teens instantly.”

Uh, not so much.  Not for me, at least.  

Hope we have better luck with the Venmo card - probably couldn’t be worse than our experience with Current.
developerResponse:
{'id': 17215087, 'body': 'Sorry for the trouble you are experiencing with our app. For further assistance, please email us at reviews@current.com.

Sincerely,
Support@Current

', 'modified': '2020-08-11T13:51:46Z'}

title: Apple pay issues becuse i do not have card
review: You should be able to spend your money if you have actual card or not just because i dont have the card i cant use apple pay unless i have the card...... and i have some stuff i need to do asap but its only been a week tht i applied for the card i CAN NOT wait another week to wait for the card and cant spend any kind of money until the card comes. Went in to and tried to get gas and it declined debit and credit

title: Worst app ever do not use
review: So my money was obtained fraudulently somebody debited their self the money out of my account they called and act like her off current number told me all of my information told me my date of birth then said OK we need to reset your account with a pin when I gave him the pin the empty my account of $1800 and what does current tell me that it’s not their problem pretty much and that there’s nothing they can do about it. Because I gave him the pin but he called off of your guys his number fraudulently went into my account they’re not gonna give me his name they’re not gonna give me any of his information but they say it’s my fault. Worst app ever steer clear they will not give you your money back if it is fraudulently stolen from you
developerResponse:
{'id': 22204473, 'body': "Hi there, we're terribly sorry to hear this happened to you. We strive to inform our members of potential fraud activity whenever possible & ways to keep your account safe. Per our Terms of Service, our members agree to never disclose their private login information as we will never ask for this information, especially the unique code used when you log into your account. 

We understand that this situation can be extremely upsetting, but rest assured we do everything we can to investigate unauthorized transactions. If you have any questions or concerns about your account or these transactions, please contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account. 

Sincerely, 
Support@Current", 'modified': '2021-04-13T01:46:58Z'}

title: Horrible customer support
review: How u even have the name current is a joke a good laugh u are not current in fact ur living in the Stone Age I’ve been locked out of my account for 80 days & counting still says same stupid message when I open the app “ will notify you of our decision “ & honestly it’s to the point where even if they offered 5000 dollars to stay I’d refuse them not professional mobile app is a complete nightmare no customer service literally non they are quick with asking u for all your information to supposedly be verified but here I am 8 weeks no response only reason I do this is because I had the brilliant idea of using them to receive stimulus check??!!!!! Absolute trash company I’ve been locked out & nobody home to help
developerResponse: {'id': 21693465, 'body': "Hi there, we're sorry to hear about this & would be more than happy to assist you. Please reach out to us at reviews@current.com from the email address associated with your original account for help ASAP! \nSincerely, \nSupport@Current", 'modified': '2021-03-16T21:53:39Z'}

title: Need help getting into my account
review: Hello , I would normally rate this app 5 starts because I just love this bank so much . I’ve recently been logged out of my account and I don’t remember or have the phone number on file and I’m unable to get in , I’ve contacted support team but they have taken over 24 hours to respond to my message and I need to get into my account before Monday or I will be evicted if I can’t get the money out of my account . I will rate the app 5 stars when this is resolved . Please help me get back into my account , I can’t use any of the money because I’ve locked my card as well . Thank you

title: Good Online Checking Account
review: Has worked really well for me so far as a alternative & Secondary personal checking account whereas there is no branch access in the location travel and work out of for the foreseeable future. only downsides so far is there is no linking to online sites via Plaid for bill pay or bonuses etc and if you have issues logging into your account or do not have a account and have a question or concern you are told to login to your account to ask it ... you can see how that could be a merry-go-round type issue.

title: First Bank
review: My come up hasn’t been the easiest. I haven’t had access to all the things I’ve needed growing up but I didn’t let it stop me. Turning 18 this year I finally got my social security, i got my ID, and this is my first bank account! Having to figure out all this stuff on my own has not been easy, however Current has made my banking experience and my first tax experience easier than I could have ever imagined. So thank you. This is the start of my journey and you’re apart of it.

title: Security is a joke
review: Someone opened an account in my name, using my email address. I started getting emails about activating my debit card so I contacted them to let them know I had not opened an account. They responded that they had found the account in question and closed it and that any funds in the account would be sent, per check, to the address on file. I ask for the name and address on file so that I could file an Identity Theft complaint and they responded that for security reasons they couldn’t give me that info, I or the police would need to send them a subpoena. What a joke, their security is good enough to protect an Identity Thief but not good enough to keep one from opening an account. I would not recommend this app to anyone.

title: Don’t give u your money back
review: This company swears they protect your money but they don’t. I filed a dispute with lovely wholesale due to them saying they delivered my clothes but I never received anything. If u look at lovely wholesale reviews and bbb reviews they have done this to many customers. I filed the dispute in October it is now December and I still haven’t received any information or my funds back which is crazy. I have never had a bank take this long ever with the process. Then when I file the dispute with lovely wholesale all the say is they can issues a 20% discount. Current need a line where u can actually speak to the representatives cause emailing is pitiful and u don’t get an actual response about the dispute. Pitiful. Worst bank I have banked with.

title: Disappointed
review: I just started my account at the beginning of this month I changed my bank info right away here it is my pay day I still haven’t received my check the two days early pay is false advertising I should’ve been received my money and there is no number to contact anybody they just have a program not that only answer certain questions I thought this would be better than my old bank card but I’m really frustrated about my money I have bill to pay so that is very inconvenient to me

title: Update phone information
review: I was skeptical after reading some reviews about the process some people went through to update phone number to log into account and how difficult it was to get in touch with customer support but honestly I’m so glad I did they got everything taken care of on my account in a very fast pace quicker than I thought it would be and they did everything to protect my account I’m very happy and satisfied with current

title: Not for self employed
review:
Wish I read reviews before opening this account I am self employed I get paid in check I have had the account 3 month haven’t made big deposit yet but the time i have made check deposit it said 3-5 days but I still waiting. They say you can get instant check deposit if you have a direct deposit but again I’m self employed I get paper checks and waiting a week to get paid is unnecessary if I can pay a fee and get it the same day I would like to use this account but they process checks like we live in the Stone Age it takes one day to process a check if that my old bank changed
 so I switch but if my account doesn’t work with the self employed I will not bank here.
developerResponse: {'id': 23249639, 'body': "Hey there, we're sorry to hear about this & we would be more than happy to look into this delay for you. As you mentioned, mobile check deposits take between 3-5 business days to settle into your account. \n\nPlease send us an email at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account & let us know if you have any other questions or concerns. We look forward to hearing back from you soon! ", 'modified': '2021-06-07T21:17:56Z'}

title: Need major fixing!
review: This app has so many interesting features but it’s been almost two months since I opened my account ordered my card and I have not received a physical card. I reordered it already and it’s been 3 weeks since that and still no card... therefore I can’t withdrawal cash. I can only spend in places they accept Apple Cash.... and every time I talk to a customer service representative they just say the same thing. “ it’s says it’s ordered... sometimes it takes longer. I can go ahead and reorder another if you’d like.” And then they offered me express shipping for 20$ more, when I’ve been waiting almost 2 months for my first card...

title: Terrible customer service
review: So I’ve had current since I’m pretty sure 2018 I always get my checks direct deposited and my taxes it’s my main bank which really confuses me to why I don’t have overdrive I’ve tried to contact customer service three different times the past few months and even tho I qualify for the overdrive feature and pay for premium they have to put me in for a review I’ve had three different people tell me this and they say I’ll get a email within 24-48 hours and I haven’t had one email or have tried to be reached out to I just don’t see why I pay for premium if I don’t get all the features. I’m almost about to switch to chime

title: Great but a major problem exists
review: I think the app is great! One problem I’m having is that every time I attempt to deposit funds from my funding source, the confirm button is greyed out and I can not deposit the funds. My bank account is a common checking account with Wellsfargo and it has funds in it and has been verified. I’ve tried contacting support a few times and after waiting almost an hour to speak with someone on the chat function, they told me to uninstall and reinstall the app. Doing that did not work either. Didn’t want to have to go through the hassle of setting up with another company but that may be my only option.

title: Great service
review: My direct deposits always come 2-3 days early. The app is also great and easy to use. One nice thing is that it also has a virtual card that is attached to your account along with your plastic card. The virtual card has its own number. Over all very pleased with this bank. Do wish you was able to talk to a live person or was able to do more when you call the number off the card other then them telling you to go through the app.

title: Mistake
review:
My Daughter had signed up for this current app, but since she been lying about her age she didn’t know that minors can use current. Meanwhile, I was making a parent account on current since on the parent account you can track down what your kids been purchasing online, but since my daughter didn’t put her real age on her current account that she made separately. Is there a way that we can delete her account? 

Please contact me if there’s anyway she can delete account! :)

title: Recommend it!
review: It’s honestly great. Card came fast and it’s so cute. Options to make a savings pod and even monthly budgets by categories. Easy to transfer money back and fourth between accounts and you can make multiple accounts within the app and move around your money how you life. Also notifies me how much I spent and where and the amount I have left on my card which I love. Hooks up to all cash apps (cashapp, venmo, etc) I would for sure recommend it and I will continue to use it.

title: BEST APP EVER
review: I'm not gone lie guys, there was one issue i did have and it was the virtual card only. Somebody mistakenly had the same virtual card as me, but once i contacted them on the app in support they helped me QUICK. They always have the answers for you too let's not forget. They direct deposit works perfectly fine! I love this app so so so much it has helped me build and save. You can also do a joint account with your child if you have one. Just download for your experience cause please !

title: Perfect app for teen pocket money
review: I have been using this app to pay my son his pocket money for more than one year. We wanted to go cashless since this also much easier for him. Current is super easy to use, the app is very user friendly and beautifully designed and the whole transfer process is painless. I can schedule the payments to be automatic and he can request payments for other expenses. This is better than PayPal (which I have been using for my older daughter). I love it.

title: My Money was stolen thru the app
review: MY FIRST TIME GETTING MONEY DIRECT DEPOSITED INTO MY ACCOUNT FROM IRS WAS TAKEN OUT MY ACCOUNT 993 THE SAME DAY IT WAS DEPOSITED INTO MY ACCOUNT I CALLED THE NUMBER THEY GOT ON FILE WENT IN THE APP TO TALK TO THIER CUSTOMER SERVICE TO LET THEM KNOW MY MONEY WAS FRAUDULENT TAKEN WITHOUT MY CONSENT I DIDN'T EVEN KNOW THE PERSON DIDN'T KNOW HOW THEY PUT THIER SELF IN MY APP AS IF I SENT THE MONEY TO THEM AN I NEVER DID NEVER GAVE MY INFORMATION TO NO ONE TO EVEN GET IN MY ACCOUNT PERIOD AN I DID EVERYTHING I WAS TOLD TO DO AS FAR AS REPORTING THAT IT WAS AN FRAUDULENT ACTIVITY AND SOME ONE AS TAKEN MY MONEY THEY TOLD ME I COULD NOT TALK TO A HIGHER PERSON TO GET IT RESOLVED SO I KEPT TRYING TO TALK TO SOMEONE THEY KEPT TELLING ME THEY WILL SEND A FOLLOW UP EMAIL NEVER GOT IT SO I KEPT TRYING THEY TOLD ME IT TAKES 10 TO 90 DAYS FOR INVESTIGATION SO I WAS HEARING THAT BECAUSE SOMEONE TOOK MY MONEY WITH ME KNOWING AN I DONT I EVEN KNOW THE PERSON SO I KEPT TRYING TO TALK TO SOMEONE SO THE PERSON IN THE APP SENDS ME A EMAIL THAT I NEVER RECEIVE SAYING SOMETHING BOUT GIVING NOT GIVING MY INFORMATION OUT AN UNFORTUNATELY THEY CAN NOT CREDITED MY MONEY BACK INTO MY ACCOUNT!!!!!! THAT CRAZY BECAUSE I HAVE NO CLUE WHO THIS PERSON IS NEVER PUT THIS PERSON INTO MY ACCOUNT NEVER SENT THIS PERSON MY MONEY PERIOD AN I HAVE MORE MONEY COMING TO THIS ACCOUNT FROM THE IRS AN IM SCARED THEIR GOIN TO TAKE ME MONEY AGAIN!!!!!!

title: Deceitful and misleading
review:
So I tried this banking system out and it’s been nothing but misleading and unprofessional. 
I first signed up because of the overdraft system of 100. Only after u gave them money. Ok whatever. Then they promote with premium get paid two days early we’ll guess what. Another example of dishonesty. I get my paystub Wednesday And the paystub is dated for Friday. My job sent u guys the funds. And I’m paying 5 bucks a month for u guys to ignore that date and pay me earlier. You didn’t do that and after further inquiry your support team pretty much said I have to wait anyway. And was also extremely rude. I have sreeanshots of the conversation along with my paystub that clear said they sent the funds to u guys two says early.

title: Linking a teen
review: Overall, the app works great. It has multiple features for saving and a button for if your child loses their card. The app is very helpful however the linking a teen option needs work. Although linking a teen is very helpful, you can not link them if they don’t have a phone number. Which means if your child doesn’t have a phone number, then they can not be linked. They can still use there account but they can easily transfer money from your account and change settings.

title: I LOVE THIS APP
review: As a high school student I’m not old enough to have my own bank account. This is really handy because I can make my own savings account, I got my own card and my parents can transfer money to me! It also shows you where and how much you spent at different stores! Overall the only thing I will say is that I wish you were able to make 2 different savings ( saving for a new car and saving for Christmas) other than that I’m in love with this app!

title: False Advertisement
review: They say if you have over $500/m in direct deposits you will have OverDrive. That is a complete lie. I’ve had my account for probably two years now, with consistent direct deposits and still don’t have OverDrive. Customer Support is some of the worst I’ve seen just give you generic *** answers that get you absolutely nowhere. I love the app and everything you guys just need to rehire your support team and not do false advertisement. I think it’s crazy I’ve been a loyal customer for over 2 years and haven’t even been considered. Reached out about it to only get the answer that the ad says. So if your looking for overdraft definitely go with another bank because you’ll never get OverDrive.

title: Great when it is working right
review: This has been perfect for my teens! It gives them independence with their money with oversight from mom. The problem is custom service is horrible. You cannot talk to anyone on the phone when you have an issue. Your only option is to communicate via chat with customer service through the app. AND then it takes forever to get them to understand what the problem is and then it usually ends up getting elevated so then you waits for days for communication via email. They do not link to all banks so it could be you can’t even use their service. It’s is a great convenience but needs ALOT of work!

title: I am marking it as 5 so you can see my comment
review: I want to place a complaint the person I spoke with in the chat was extremely rude, didn’t help me, and was a failure to my service. I ordered food off of Grubhub, they didn’t complete my order so they refunded my money. They told me the bank, Current, is denying the refund. And so I contacted the chat and was infuriated with the zero communication Joe had with me. He made rude remarks and ultimately failed at what I was requesting and refused to let me speak to his manager. I will also be figuring out who I can speak to, to report the “bank” for basically stealing my hard earned money. What a horrible thing to do during a time like this when I am a single mother of two kids. Shame on this bank

title: Best App 4 Simple Direct Deposit
review: Current is one of the best apps I have ever used for direct deposit especially as a first time user. At first I was afraid I answered my information wrong but then I have received a notification when I woke up to go to work the next day kind of sad I didn’t get paid yet like they said I would one day earlier. Getting paid one day earlier is just what they promised and from now on I will be a current customer for life. Thank you Current!!!

title: Customer service is the worst
review: This rating really is more about the customer service than it is about the app. My request was simple. One I lost my card stolen not sure. I wanted to log into the app to report it however I did not have a current password. So I tried to reset my password and it would not except a password.I have sent a photo ID copy I have resubmitted all of my personal information at least three times, and I have exchanged over 30 emails and I still cannot log into my account. The emails are friendly enough, they just aren’t helpful now all I want to do is cancel my card and find something else to use that has helpful and useful customer service
developerResponse:
{'id': 22021947, 'body': 'Hi there, thanks for leaving a review & we apologize for the lack of help on our end. Rest assured, this is not the level of customer service that we strive to achieve. Please contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account so that we can help you gain access to your account again. 

Looking forward to your response! 

Sincerely, 
Support@Current', 'modified': '2021-04-02T22:21:39Z'}

title: Look No Further For Your Banking Needs
review: Living in a rural area banking is limited so I chose to use online banking and in doing so have had other cards with other institutions but never was quite satisfied… that is until I got with Current. It is online banking at its finest and easiest with rewarding perks and wonderful customer services. So when your ready to bank with the best online banking service cut to the chase and go for the best CURRENT. I CAN PROMISE YOU THIS YOU WILL BE SO GLAD YOU DID AND WISH YOU WOULD OF SOONER.

title: So Far Really Good
review:
It’s like chime and Cash App put together.
Better benefits of chime and cash app. Free ATMs, Places to load you money on, direct deposit, checking and savings, add children, transfer and receive funds... I just need to see if I run into a problem how it handles it, but so far it checks out good. And less chances of fraud due to all the security checks. Only thing I didn’t see that I like about the cash app and chime is being able to lock your card from transactions.

title: I love this bank
review: I have had this bank for a while now and I have not ran into issues I love this bank better then chase and first convenience bank I closed my other bank accounts and stayed with this one. Not forgetting to mention you get paid faster with this one unlike chase promising you the same and still get paid fridays my check is supposed to be there on fridays and I get it on Tuesday yay!! I’m obsessed with this BANK!!! Must have bank

title: It good but then bad
review: I have current and I’m having problems because now my account say suspended when I never suspended my account now I cannot login and and I can’t even take my money out there’s not the first time someone took my money before so much going on and plus they don’t have customer service support at all I love current but then I hate it when things like this happened now I need help and no one from current email me back 🤦🏻‍♀️

title: Extremely Confusing and Slow
review:
I gave this app a true effort. My son has yet to be able to use his Current debit card without it being declined. I sent the link to his mother. She has deposited $ as well and can’t get it into his account. I believe there is $100-$150 somewhere?
Navigation is horrible. We are probably going to get debit card through local bank that has “Zelle” much easier app to work with. I though that based on my review of apps like Venmo, Current etc. that the educational features for a teen could be a positive. WRONG! There is nothing more unnerving. as a parent, than receiving a declined attempt to purchase fuel when your child is driving to school 30 miles away.

title: Horrible customer service
review:
Horrible when it comes to making a dispute and getting your money back. I put in a dispute on Aug 16th and I still haven’t got my money back yet. They give you a horrible time frame of 30-60 days which is unacceptable and when you try to talk to customer support to try and speed up the process, or at least get an update they don’t even tell you anything. They’re so bad at their job they responded to this review and told me to email them, then never responded.

So after they failed to respond to me after telling me to write them, they said that they’re was no error found in my dispute even though I told them somebody tried to scam me on eBay. DO NOT ISE CURRENT

title: A modern banking solution.
review:
Set up was quick, had my card in a couple of days, it works, it’s fast and it’s easy. This is what I want from bank and this is what I have now with Current.
The instant gas hold refunds are awesome, the fact that I have never had to pay a cent in overdraft fees is even more awesome! The pods do their job and that’s good enough for me. The only suggestion I have is work on the budgets, a lot of times it categorizes my stuff incorrectly but otherwise, stay awesome!

title: Customer service is horrible
review: I’ve reached out to this company over 10 times to regain access to my account even went as far as to dming their Instagram and writing a comment on one of their posts all I need is a simple number change and they can’t even do that when I call to speak to an agent theirs no one to talk to everything is automated I’ve sent numerous emails and still no response I’m getting really frustrated with this company NEVER BANK WITH CURRENT SO UNPROFESSIONAL

title: Worst for teenage banking
userName: There Is No Magic Unicorn Fix
review:
I have a shut-in introvert of a teenager. We decided to try current as way to start banking without having to go to a in-person bank. It has been two months and my teen still cannot access their acct. There is no log in screen, it simply asks for a password and goes to a locked screen where you get stuck. We have emailed and i used the app for support. Support is slow and just repeats to delete and re-install the app, somehow a magic unicorn is supposed to touch the app and make it work. There are no unicorns near us to change the app into working. I can access the teen acct from my end, but they cannot.
Incredibly unhelpful and a waste of time.
developerResponse: {'id': 23249741, 'body': "Hi there, we're sorry to hear this & we would be more than happy to look into what's going on here so that we can resolve this for you ASAP! Please contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account & let us know if you have any other questions or concerns. \n\nWe look forward to hearing from you! ", 'modified': '2021-06-07T21:28:36Z'}

title: Extremely satisfied client 🌻
review:
I went with Current based off of reviews and sooooo thankful I did! I have not had any issues with them at all. The app is super easy to navigate and very self explanatory. 

In fact, when my money is looking funny they spot you money to get by until payday (no interest/fees added) I receive my paycheck 2 days earlier than I normally would 🌻 I’m able to transfer money to my family and save! 

Thank you, Current

title: Current
review: I found out about your Bank a couples week ago so I am trying it’s out and I just call Today too check on my Job giving them my Work information so I can get my Money deposit in my Account so was told they didn’t see it’s at the time so I was Disappointed at that moment so I Thank the Rep and I was gonna wait until Thursday so later that’s Day my Funds was there Thank You Jesus and I like to Thanks Current also Mimi

title: Good app but terrible customer service
review: It’s a nice app and it works, it’s a nice layout & banking system. But the customer service is terrible, I was wrongfully charged for a free trial & tried to get my $20 back, first time I contacted customer service they told me they couldn’t do anything because it was a pending charge (which is fine) but once I was actually charged I tried to contact them again and they literally ended the chat in my face before they got any solution. A good bank also has good customer service so if you ever have a problem, don’t expect them to fix it.

title: Please make it easier for us to receive money
review: Current is so far so good but the most frustrating part is trying to get somebody to send u money!! Like it shouldn’t be such a hassle! There’s not a lot of options to even do so... you either have to log in into there whole bank or send a check and I don’t think it should be this hard especially for times like this is pretty rough! Please make it easier or maybe I’m just doing it wrong, but I looked it up on the website and it gives steps but the same steps aren’t on the app please fix this
developerResponse:
{'id': 16172857, 'body': 'Sorry for the trouble you are experiencing with our app. For further assistance, please email us at reviews@current.com. 

Sincerely, 
Support@Current

', 'modified': '2020-06-23T14:29:00Z'}

title: One of the best
review: Since I gave my job my direct deposit I get paid two days earlier I get paid on Wednesday mornings or nights every week I love this app it’s really colorful and  convenient i like how it keeps up with how much you spend and where you spend it and no hidden fees I mean there’s a five dollar fee for a premium account but you get overdraft starting at $25 up to 100 I haven’t reached 100 yet because I just got it but I really like this this bank

title: A very good banking app
review: I’ve had a few banking apps and so far this one is one of the bests. I’m on SSI and so I get my paycheck 5 days early, so far I have no issues with this app. Only con that I can see of is that it’s a little difficult to find a place to add cash, or find a fee free atm that works with this bank. Other then that it works great! And is especially helpful if you lose your card you have an online emergency card on the app that is super helpful.

title: DO NOT USE CURRENT
review: They make it way to easy for other people to get into your account just by using your phone number and when someone steals your money instead of them helping you they tell you to contact the fraud who stole your money. They will not help you or cancel the transaction or mark it as suspicious. My paycheck got stolen by some guy in a different state and the people at current told me to get a hold of the stranger and try to get it back because there was nothing they could do and tried telling me that I sent it to him or allowed him to do it and I don’t know who he is at all and I didn’t let him take all my money. Current is awful with helping their customers!

title: Why is THE WHOLE WORLD  “NOT” on CURRENT
review:
Seriously whoever designed the app should be in charge of designing every app IMO! The sleekest design then when I received the card for the premium checking it’s the card that definitely makes you want to pull it out and show it off almost like: 
 “as your talking to someone in a retail line, it slips out of your wallet and flashes the person behind you your talking to and they’re like, D$&* where the F$&@ is that card from I want one”

title: Weirdest Banking App
review: Let me first say that I was referred by a friend to use current. For some reason it has a limit on how much you can deposit, transfer and how much you can spend in a day. The spending limit is only $200/day, so when you have bills you have to pay online they automatically cancel your transaction which causes you to have fees. I would not recommend this banking app for an adult, but maybe an older child. The customer service is garbage too. Read the rest of the reviews and put your money in here at your own risk because you can’t transfer it out all at once you have to do it a couple of days at a time to get it all out.

title: Worst decision I ever made
review: Worst bank ever I hate everything about it should’ve kept chime 🤦🏽‍♀️. Nothing is convenient about this bank unless you have the debit card which takes a FULL two weeks to come. If you get paid weekly its no point because you won’t be able to send money to cash app. The virtual card is limited you can only make online purchases and Apple Pay no cash back at all. Again worst decision I ever made.
developerResponse: {'id': 19098847, 'body': "Hi there, we're sorry to hear that you feel this way. If you are unhappy with any of our features or need additional information about our services, you can contact us at reviews@current.com. \n\nSincerely, Support@Current", 'modified': '2020-11-13T21:27:28Z'}

title: Current Cares
review: I promise you that Current has a customer service team SECOND to NONE ! If you have any problems with the app the customer service responds almost instantly. I also love the Current to Current instant transactions similar to Quick Pay by Chase. All in all this is a bank of the future, the only thing missing is having a cryptocurrency format of some kind on the app, maybe they should create The Current Coin 😅

title: Can load my account on my new phone
review: I have tried multiple times to add my account to my new phone and for a month now I can speak to  any human there customer service is non existent on top of that I have no way of viewing my account you can’t even call to get your account balance and the icing on the cake is they have no automated service to help you and I still have not gotten a response to why this is I am beginning to think these are scams because how does it take this amount of time to speak to a live breathing person at your bank

title: Customer service is nonexistent
review: Disputing incorrect or unauthorized charges take longer than any other bank on the planet.  They have no system to cancel a pending charge before it hits your account, and even then they can’t do anything except hope they can successfully dispute a charge that will take 3-6 months.  Your card will decline at random, the limits on the card are a joke, and customer service can’t help you with anything.  This is not a banking platform, its a scam to take your money.  You pay extra every month for them to tell you they can’t help you.  Please if anyone who works for this shady enterprise sees this please email me, call me, something.

title: Love this banking experience
review: I use this for my child support and I love it. Never had an issue except one and that was when I got a new phone and was waiting for my number to move over from my old phone but they helped me really fast and we came up with fixing the problem. Other then that I have had an amazing experience. I would recommend this to my friends and family. Keep up the great work.

title: Great app
review: Easy to use. Get my checks 2 days early. I got the recommendations from a friend and I haven’t regretted it since I got it. Tracks my spending so I know what I need to do to manage it better and I can even diversify my savings accounts for different projects I have. Now it’s even easier to load money into it and take money out cuz it tells me where I can do it for free. Would recommend if your not into traditional banks or credit unions

title: Horrible app and can’t even talk to a human
review: This was great at first because I was able to send my kids money but then it got to a point when anytime I wanted to reach out to someone I couldn’t get a human on the phone.I have spent several hours this morning emailing back-and-forth with the place but no one will respond to me right away it normally takes at least 20to 30 minutes if not longer.I do not recommend this for anyone it would be better if you open a bank account for your kids if you are needing something to be able to transfer money to them while they are away from you horrible app horrible people do not use.

title: Great App For Major Banking Alternate
review:
I have been looking around for a while for an app that I can use to replace my bank, which was charging fees left and right for everything I did. I found Current in an app store search and this is what I LOVE:

-Color scheme is amazing. Its a visually appealing app to use. I love the look of the debit card as well. Might be my favorite thing overall
-Built in tools like budgeting tracker is really cool
-i love the overdraft protection with no fees 
-I like that you can deposit cash still using stores in my area. Thats usually my only issue with non-major banking apps but this solves that issue
-Earning rewards points for shopping is always a plus
-Very nice to be able to use a virtual card until our real card gets here. 

I love the app and plan on using it long term!

title: Awesome card, great support, this is the card you’ve been waiting for!!!
review: Seriously fast direct deposit, I get my check faster than anyone else, even my snobby traditional bank friends!!! I genuinely want to thank the  creators, the staff anyone that has had anything to do with this powerful banking resource as they have truly given me the type of relationship I never thought possible with a bank.

title: False advertising
review: Y’all did not let me back into my account cause I change my number I’ve been lock out my account with a couple of hundred still in my account that I no longer have access to this is a bad card do not get this they wait till you change your number than lock you out your account an don’t even answer the emails just going back in forth with me for over a week an I still do not have access to my account I send in all the information they needed to prove it me an not no one else I still haven’t heard from them an I’m still lock out my account that’s has my money in it so please do not get this card they are no good
developerResponse: {'id': 16340992, 'body': "Hi, we'd be happy to see what happened with your account. Please contact us at reviews@current.com. Sincerely, Support@Current", 'modified': '2020-07-01T15:33:13Z'}

title: Can’t access my own money
review: Beware once your money is on this card it’s very hard to get it off. I have bills I have to pay but have to wait because there is a maximum of $2000/day you can use. It still keeps declining after it’s been a day for smaller purchases saying I’m at my daily limit. The only way I get money off my card is to link it to my cash app account and transfer the money a little bit a day until I can get it all off this card. It’s still not letting me get anywhere close to the $2000/day limit. I tried raising my limit but that wouldn’t work either. I will ever use this card again once I get all my money off of it.

title: I’m able to log in and access my funds.
review: I have reached out to their customer service 3 times with no actual help. The current app seems to be frozen on the “get started” screen. I can’t press the button so I can log in. I’ve forced closed the application MULTIPLE TIMES. Uninstalled and reinstalled MULTIPLE TIMES, make sure the app and my iPhone is up to date. However the problem persist. It’s going on 1 month now & customer service keeps letting me to try to log in 😒. I CANT GET PAST THE “Get Started” SCREEN IT WONT LIKE ME PRESS “ Get Started” SO HOW COULD I POSSIBLY LOG IN???? The need a customer service phone number. Because clearly email leaves things to be misunderstood over and OVER AND OVER AGAIN.

title: A horrible app
review: I haven’t had this app for not even a month and it’s already playing games with my money I had my unemployment deposit to the current card double check account and routing numbers. just for them to hold my money for a week and Say it was never deposited them State say deposited last week And have it on record saying it was posted last week  just for them to A week and a half later saying they got the deposit then they still don’t wanna give it to for them to say it will be available two days later. u do not get your money to days earlier you get it two weeks later don’t waste your time with this app

title: Bank of the future is now
review: Current is the most beautiful and versatile of the last decade with every single pro of a bank account and none of the consThey have completely loaded plethora of resources at your fingertips you cannot go wrong with this financial system it’s even aimed at specific groups with team banking included I am completely entranced with current this is the establishment at the top in my opinion

title: Great experience so far!
review: I deposited cash for the first time today and it was not only convenient but quick and the funds came off of the amount I deposited which was good to know. I used it for the first time to purchase a cell phone and it worked perfectly. I just set up my account and everything seems to be running smoothly. I can only hope that this is a very secure bank. Thanks Current!

title: Current scam alert
review: Well I been using current for a year recently my account has been hacked it been month we tried to get my money back these guys don’t have any protection any sorts so if someone hacks your hack your account you don’t have your money back they don’t even have a real support all of them are just fake there names and all of that they ask for your name and date of birth then when I asked for my money back they said I didn’t have a account with current such a lie this bank is not recommended for kids and adults there just scammers looking to take your money I will be filing a lawsuit against these people # don’t download this app buyers beware

title: Change the notifications.
review: Beautiful card, I like the app it’s a easy way to manage my money. My paycheck arrived fast which is a plus. The only thing I’m annoyed with is all the notifications. I have to decline the same notification when I go to the app. I don’t want to have notifications sent to my phone I like to check my money on my own time. It’s like they want to force you to receive notifications and emails. If they change that then I will give them 5 stars.

title: Love
review: I was using PayPal, I switched to current and I love I can add current to my Apple Pay I couldn’t do that with PayPal.  Also love that employee direct deposit came 2 days faster than PayPal.  Totally loving the app. I recommend getting the premium where you pay 4.99 a month because you getting pods which are savings accounts.  I got the free version for my 12 year old to start teaching him about money and responsibilities!! 💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜❤️❤️❤️

title: Best card around to help my children’s manage money
review: The card and the app are perfect for my children. It lets you set up scheduled allowance. You can set up a chore list so when they are done they can get paid. Also you can set up restrictions, like no hotels, porn, bars, air plane ticket, etc... also I find my kids watching their account and managing their  money way better than when I was paying them in cash.

title: CURRENT
review:
Current so far is absolutely ANAZING! It was super fast and easy to apply and my card was sent to my house within the same week. Current had also already given me $1 In my account just for simply having friend sign up!! I’m extremely excited to see what else current as to offer and look forward to using their services! ❤️❤️

Thank you CURRENT!!

Xoxo - Your new Customer, Mariah!!

title: Customer Service
review: Customer service is terrible I got locked out of my current account and I have money just sitting there, customer service takes forever to respond and with the phone number they have you can’t even speak to a representative to get things figured out quickly the only way you get help is if you send a ticket through email or message within the app. It’s quicker if you message in the app but if you are locked out of your account you have to wait for them to respond by email which takes hours. It’s ridiculous and I’m not staying with them for long
developerResponse: {'id': 23335726, 'body': "Hey there, we apologize for the issue you've experienced logging in to your account! We would be happy to update the information on your account and swiftly resolve this issue! Please shoot us an email at reviews@current.com for further assistance.", 'modified': '2021-06-11T20:31:13Z'}

title: Is it a bank ?
review: The most frustrating thing I happen to run into with current is that every time it comes to uploading my credentials into some online access service and they have in their system set banks that are recognized. Current never pops up yet chime would and current is better. But the only way is to have to sign in through the parent company (choice financial) but I’m always unsure if my credentials are assessable with that option and why hasn’t that changed to where I can find current
developerResponse:
{'id': 22289348, 'body': "Hi there, thanks for the review & we apologize for the inconvenience this has caused. At this time, we don't currently support connections of your Current account to 3rd party platforms, like Plaid. Although our partner bank, Choice, may come up as an option, they do not have access to your account information or your login credentials as we are completely independent from Choice. However, we'd be more than happy to forward this suggestion to our product team as we're constantly working on improving the products & services we offer. 

If you have any questions/concerns about your account or additional feedback, feel free to contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account. 

Sincerely, 
Support@Current", 'modified': '2021-04-16T18:00:59Z'}

title: Good but still lacking
review: My only issue is the lack of ability to use the card when I want. It will randomly stop working, like it has done today. I have a small balance, tried to make a transfer with the funds,DECLINED, tried to purchase something DECLINED. Can’t get a firm reason why it’s being declined, but multiple merchants have tried it as well and declined. When it works it’s great, but it’s just not operable all the time for some reason...oh and it’s not a fraud flag either or if it is, I haven’t been notified which is just as worrisome.

title: AWSOME
review: real life review im 18 and i couldn’t use nun of them credit card apps without an ID and current really came in handy i can add my current card to apple or to cash app to cash out and everything works smoothly and u can set a spending limit that cant be gon over your card will decline if whatever u are getting is over your spending limit and sending and receiving money is just like cash app its easy and cool app is AMAZING 💜💜

title: Not Really a Review
review: This isn’t really a review but more of a question. I’m waiting for my card to finish shipping so I was browsing through the app and found the store to use the points. I was interested by the shoe selection and hit ‘Notify Me’ on the shoe that I liked most. After a few days and I don’t even see a shoe selection. And the gift card selection was missing too. Is there a reason for that? Does Current no longer support those items for the store?

title: Current
review:
Current is a horrible app .. I tried to cash a check with them and after they made me write on the back and stuff it told me they couldn’t take it so now I can’t cash my check anywhere .. on top that the support team is trash .. they never answer the phone or actually help you in any way .. oh wait I am not done yet .. after I went to go try and add money on the current card is kept saying invalid card number but my card is activated .. like I said horrible .. y’all really need to fix this .. I can’t cash my check because of you guys and now you can’t fix it .. I will make sure I let a lot of
People know this this is a scam
developerResponse:
{'id': 18531181, 'body': "Hey there! We're sorry to hear about the experience that you've had so far and would be happy to investigate further. 

Please shoot our team an email at reviews@current.com for more assistance. We look forward to hearing from you! 

Sincerely, 
Support@Current", 'modified': '2020-10-16T19:46:47Z'}

title: Easy to use
review:
It is so easy to add money on my 14 years old son’s account. It made him to manage his money independently. Also I receive every message what he has spent. ... I only didn’t give full 5 stars rate because the one thing needs to improve. It takes about 3 to 5 days to transfer money to his account.
I wish it could transfer immediately without needing for him to wait to get enough money. So I have to remember to deposit before his money run out .

title: Worst online banking app
review: My partner and I decided to try out online banking so we went with Current. I had created my account on February 28th and they say it takes 7-10 business days for your physical card to arrive. We used the same address, but my partner received their card in the mail before I did even though they created their account after me. It’s now the end of March and I haven’t received my card at all. Current’s customer service is probably the worst I’ve had to deal with. Takes too long to respond and doesn’t solve your problem either. Definitely the worst online banking app I’ve signed up for.
developerResponse:
{'id': 21937385, 'body': "Hi there, we're sorry to hear about your experience so far & we apologize for the inconvenience. We understand the importance of quality customer service, especially when it comes to mobile banking, but it sounds like we may have missed the mark on this. 

We would be more than happy to look into what happened here. Please reach out to us at reviews@current.com from the email address associated with your account & let us know if you have any questions or concerns.  Looking forward to your response. 

Sincerely, 
Support@Current", 'modified': '2021-03-30T02:17:41Z'}

title: Worst online banking experience ever
review: This is one of the worst online banking experiences I ever had I got my card stolen 6 months ago and to this day the people who stole my card was able to withdraw money from one account to this online banking account now my account is in the negative and in order to do anything with this account again I have to pay the amount that is owed when it was fraud from the start so highly do not recommend this online banking also the way to communicate to someone is like a joke you can never contact anyone at all and if you do there is so little that can be done if I can give them zero stars I would

title: So far so good
review: It took 7 business days to get the card but I’m impressed with the look of the card too. Only thing that I see needs work is if you deposit money from another bank to this one it takes at least 5 days to clear only downside I found but getting direct deposit from your job is fast and is there 2 days ahead of time that’s convenient

title: It’s actually very easy to use
review: This app is more then just helpful it’s actually very insightful and it helps you get motivated towards making changes that can possibly help build a future that’s brighter then you expect. Not to mention the overdraft non fee with direct deposit up to $100 bucks, is truly delightful. I wouldn’t want to reach the point of needing to use the overdraft it does give you a peace of mind.

title: Amazing
review:
Fast and simple to get started on an account

Wait times for your money is almost instant compared to last banks which take 3-5 days

Would recommend to literally anyone! They give you a virtual card while you wait for your physical one to come in. Great User interface with many options. A very seamless and user friendly experience all around!

title: Mobile checking
review: Overall good app. I use it to monitor funds with my two kids.  Easy to transfer back and forth and very user friendly.   The only downside is the mobile banking deposits.  They have longer holds then regular banks.  For example: government checks are made available next business day through regular banks.  But with current they put a 5 day hold on one of our tax returns/government check.  Not ideal unless you have direct deposit.

title: Happy
review: I can’t lie at first I was being a little more difficult but when I really started looking into this app this app comes with a lot of perks great ones on top of it to be able to get a virtual card to still be able to handle things that you need to handle to transfer the money which makes it so much easier than using Cash App or any other third-party this card is dope is all I’m saying

title: So far it’s pretty decent
review: I just received my debit card but prior to receiving the card the app itself is pretty impressive and offer many features that Chime just doesn’t. I’m impressed by the card design and the fluency of the app. Hoping for a better banking experience than I have had in the past with other card apps including my long running Chime Card and my other 2 backups, my N26 card and Cash App

title: Great online banking
review: The online banking system is great ! Direct deposit comes 2 days faster with premium checking account that’s not All YOU EVEN CAN OVERDRAFT 25 dollars !!!! You will not be disappointed! Trust me I’ve been banking with this company for 3 months the only con thing about this and they should look into is when you deposit a check thru mobile it takes 5 business days usually most mobile banks check deposits goes into your account instantly

title: Awesome card
review: I highly recommend this card, I’ve always liked prepaid cards and so far this one is the best there’s so much different options and features and even rainy day savings you can customize, plus money back earnings super awesome and the money fee is perfect for the premium service, I will be recommending this card to lots of people, I’m glad I found Current, I’m really excited to have it!

title: Y’all🙄
review:
Sooo.. let me tell y’all. This thing said I get my taxes 5 days faster so HERE I AM THINKING I’m about to get my junts back before everybody else and I filed on the 13th... ITS THE 25TH and I still ain’t get my junts back but I know people that know people that got theirs back already🤦🏾‍♀️ Moral of the story, Current be lying more than my daddy.

Ooou! Y’all, not to MENTION, I texted “customer support” thing or whatever because I didn’t know the bank name they use. Tell ME WHY shorty texted back that SUPPOSEDLY WORK FOR THEM and going to say she don’t know just leave it blank and just enter my account and routing information for my taxes🤨 like what!!?

title: Current
review:
It’s got a free basic account or $4.99 monthly fee like PayPal master card but, sending money to others is Free, downside they must also have a current account. But same as PayPal but PayPal has a transaction fee and current doesn’t. 
I used PayPal for years but, no Transfer Fee is better.

Can also teach teenagers wise spending. They have a teen account an parents can deposit their kid’s instantly with No Fees.

title: Up to the minute notifications!
review:
The feature that I appreciate the most is the up to the minute notifications that this app gives me!
    My old bank may send me an email telling me to go online and log into my bank to see what’s going on, and by that time it could be too late!
Current stays current, and let’s you know what’s going on as it’s happening!

Thank you!

title: Great bank
review: I love using current yes depending on your job or direct deposit you do get your check 2 days early but it may come a little late in the day!!
