But I love the fact that you can earn points almost anywhere and you can turn your card off just as if you lost it and don’t want anyone to use it instead of canceling it and finding it right after you cancel it

title: Current card
review: This is a good card overall. My first time putting direct deposit on it I got my check 3 days I’m advanced. Witch is cool because most cards don’t actually follow threw or actually get your check to you faster. So all In all I’m impressed with the card gonna see if the over draft is a actual thing now. So I’ll write another review and let you guys know how the over draft goes.

title: Current Card for Teens
review: I got this Current card for my children years ago and they never used them and have lost the cards since then and I have been trying to cancel these accounts that I have been charged for the last two years and I have emailed back and forth with a representative who wouldn’t let me cancel and told me to do it in the app and I wasn’t able to login to the app because it was so long ago and he still would not give me another way to cancel. Now Current has taken $48 from me the last two years for cards that we have never even used and that they won’t let me cancel.

title: Scam alert!!
review: This app is such a scam that you wouldn’t even believe the headaches that they have given me. They held my money for weeks with no reason ever given and then the only way I was able access it was to take it out via cash advances which cost a fortune and they never even offered an explanation. Their customer service is a joke and they should all be arrested for their complacency and contribution to a clearly fraudulent financial institution. After DOZENS of attempts to speak with someone in their fraud department or even a supervisor, I have come to the conclusion that this is low level hacker stealing peoples money via this app.

title: 5 stars
review: Current is the first bank card I have used that I have stuck with I am a 21 year old you adult . I feel that current is a great option for students and young adults . It is easy to use, has a lot of benefits, and get shipped to your doorstep for no cost, for you to get ready to start put to your money somewhere where you trust to buy all the things you’ve ever desired. (:

title: Awesome
review: The app so far is easily accessible. And easy to understand. Got my check on Wednesday instead of Friday! So happy about that! Also just got overdraft that kicked in with up to $25 free ! I’ve had many app bank cards and this one is by far the best. 10/10 would recommend. Also, did I mention, if you have a paper check you can snap a picture and deposit it? I think that’s awesome. Great.

title: Was going good til I couldn’t log back in
review: This mobile bank is the worst they don’t have representatives to talk to when you call the number so they can easily fix any important immediate situations and I can’t log back in it just says to make a new account and I had my tax refund and my recent check from my job I take lyfts to work right now so if y’all don’t fix this soon I’m gonna lose my job cause of y’all !! Also how am I supposed to talk to anyone if you can only chat with someone in the app if you’re logged out you can’t talk to them seems like a big scam to me and I’m reporting y’all if it turns out to be exactly that.
developerResponse: {'id': 21548594, 'body': "Hi there! We're sorry you've been experiencing this issue & would be more than happy to look into this for you. Right now, our phone support is limited to ensure the safety of all our member experience agents. Since you do not have access to your account, please send us an email at reviews@curent.com from the email address associated with your account for assistance! We look forward to hearing from you! \nSincerely, \nSupport@Current", 'modified': '2021-03-09T19:42:00Z'}

title: Years of waiting to apply...
review: I signed up for Current over 2 years ago at this point, and every time I attempt to login, I get a message “Thank you for applying for a Current account. We will review your application and notify you of our decision to open your account as soon as possible” and nothing happens... Over the years I’ve deleted and reinstall the app, with the exact same message. Both email and phone number give me the same message. There is no way of contacting Current outside the app, so I’ve resorted to leaving a review since it seems that is the only way of getting Current’s attention...

title: Awful awful awful - Beware
review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!! There is absolutely no customer service and of course when I asked for a number to call, their response was  “our phone lines are temporarily unavailable” They have ridiculous charges, and they charge you a $30 fee for an instant debit card deposit and still hold your deposit for 5 days!!! This is by far the worst app!!! Download at your own risk!!!

title: Very organized
review: I quit using regular banks because there always closed or busy. I can open the app at any time cash checks and if there’s any problem they are available to live chat and help at any time. Loving the simplicity and convenience. The cards are high quality and look nice as well. Completely free and I have found no problems whatsoever. I highly recommend this bank to anyone.

title: My name is Pamela
review: I love my Current card because I am a disabled senior citizen receiving my social security benefits on this card and out of all the debit cards I’ve had this is the only one where I know my money is safe because I can disabled my card when I’m not using it and I love the fact that you have list of brands that are and can be blocked- that is so great- I would recommend this card to anyone

title: Horrible bank
review: I have had this account for over two years. I have all my pay deposited into this account and always have. This morning, after I paid my bills, right before I bought food for myself and my family, this bank froze my account. No reason why. Not able to access my paycheck. Asked for ID and address verification which will take three to five business days(it’ll take longer, we all know that) to “review”. Meanwhile, I can’t access any money to finish paying my RENT, buy groceries, do laundry or anything else my children and I may need. I need this fixed. I wish I could give zero stars.
developerResponse:
{'id': 22021926, 'body': "Hi there, we're sorry to hear that this has happened to you & apologize for the inconvenience we've caused. Our internal system automatically flags accounts for review if there is irregular activity on your account. Please note, this is done to ensure your account remains safe & secure. 

Feel free to contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account if you have any questions or concerns. 

Sincerely, 
Support@Current", 'modified': '2021-04-02T22:19:00Z'}

title: Unbelievable
review: I get my checked direct deposited into the account that I see on my app. Literally the minute I swipe the card I get a notification on my phone to exactly where I used it at. And there’s a built in savings account in the app that you can move money to from the app. I couldn’t ask for a better banking system. So much better then an actual bank

title: Current Vs Cashapp
review:
I came here due to ads and suggestions. So far it’s dope. I like the Party Themed Layout, and design. Real 80s S. Beach Late Night Vibes. Direct Deposit just came in so I don’t know about consistency. Cash app is trash with direct deposit and very inconsistent on times. So hopefully Current is better. 1st Direct Deposit Earned me a 25 Overdraft Fee of rip sooo... we’ll see I’ll update in 4 weeks about consistency on pay times 
( weekly pay )

title: Rob you blind
review: Do not get this app or this card. I have had my account compromised twice within two months of times they have gone over $700 out of my account. You don’t have a person to talk to. you have to chat with someone they tell you takes 90 days for you to get your money back. they do not offer provisional credit. you’re just out of your money and you have to wait for the investigation team to credit you back your money. This is the worst online bank company possible. The agents act as if it’s your fault that your money has been stolen. I think the company is stealing the customers money.

title: Amazing All Around
review: The few experiences I’ve had with support were amazing , the card itself is very unique looking thier point system is easy to understand and use if you remember to check around you before you go shopping. The 2day faster deposit isn’t a gimmick I was actually able to use the feature. I have no complaints whatsoever.

title: Best card service ever
review: I have used a few different prepaid cards and I am obsessed with current! It wasn’t clear that you have to pay for the premium for the early deposit but I’m glad I did it! I’m always getting paid early and it’s always a steamless checkout using my card. Customer service is always super friendly and helpful. I always recommend it to a friend.

title: “Transaction history”
review: It took the current “support team” 3 weeks to contact me when they said it’ll only take 2-3 Days. After a review of my account and transaction history they decided to close my account. But nothing over 500$ has ever entered my account and I’ve never sent out more than 150$.... so please explain to me what it is that you guys were looking at? And on top of that I still have bills and stuff that need to be paid but can’t because I can’t access my money any longer. And according to them they can terminate your account at any time for ANY REASON. Seriously????

title: Current is AWESOME!!!
review: When they say you get paid faster, days sooner/earlier, etc. That is nothing but the TRUTH!! Take it from me, because I’m a single mother of soon to be 5 children and I’ve NEVER received my money this fast, while everyone else is still waiting! So, if you’re feeling unsure... Don’t! Give Current a try and it will change your entire life!!! Thanks again Current! ♥️♥️♥️

title: Don’t use these people.(SERIOUSLY)
review: Out of all the mobile banking companies out their, don’t use current. You will be truly disappointed and sorry you did. They are terrible. They will hold your money for weeks and won’t release it and support is terrible. They don’t care. Worse mobile banking  company out there. The only thing they do correctly is provide you with 2 days deposit. But you pay monthly for months to get $25 overdraft even if you deposit over $1,000 every two weeks. And they only allow you to spend a certain amount of your money a day. Don’t use these people

title: Scheduled Transfers
review: I love this app. It shows me how much I’m spending. I got saving pods. It actually breaks down what my money is going to. It’s one feature I feel like needs upgraded. The Scheduled Features . I feel like you should be able to add how many you want instead of just one. It would help people save move out they checks every pay day . Going into one of the savings pods .

title: Instant Deposits Just Disappear
review:
I’ve been a member since about 2015. Always had instant deposits to my kids accounts. All of sudden instant deposits are no longer available. My son is away at school abs ran out of money. Talk about inconvenient. 

Customer service is horrible. You used to be able to call and talk to a person, now you are limited to chat through the app. I had a customer service rep ask me to wait about 5 times yesterday and they were never able to help. 

Do yourself a favor and go to a real bank with a physical branch. I will be cancelling my account as soon as possible.

title: No longer satisfied
review:
I’m no longer satisfied with using current. I’ve been with them for 3 yrs and I’m also a premium customer however I do not get the privilege of using my overdraft as stated on the current website. My deposits are well over $500 and been that way since I became a customer. Another thing is when I know I have a deposit pending they never release it until 
8:30-8:45 P.M. I mean who can pay bills that time of night?!! So for these reasons I will no longer be using current, I don’t feel I’m treated equally as a customer.

title: So far no issues.
review: I don’t necessarily like waiting until the evening to get my money but all in all I still rate five stars because it notifies me when it hits and the fact I get paid up to two days earlier really enlightens my mood. Thanks so much current for being there and helping me when I didn’t have all info for a walk in bank. Keep up the good work! 🤘🏻🌹😎

title: Love it
review: Current is easy to use with so many ways to save. Not only does Current allow you to put your  money in a savings account, it allows you to budget your money by categorizing and prioritizing “must needed” essentials, so you can not over spent. Current also allows you overdraft your account in case of an emergency! Current is a must have card in your wallet!!!!

title: Horrible
review: My job deposit my check into there old I had with them which I don’t have the card anymore eaither and now there’s no way of actually speaking to someone about it so they got my money which is 800 and won’t help me or call me to help. And there’s no actual way of speaking with them on the phone . So don’t try there services people it’s horrible business

title: Current
review: The service is great they helped me with all my problems very quick contact for help works very good send you notifications when you buy some thing or transfer money or ask for money from somebody else allows people to send you money you can send other people money just overall a great app and business love it so much

title: I don’t trust
review:
So I’m currently with USDA and I tried to deposit my federal check. It said to contact support so I did. His replay was we can not accept federal check. And or my federal bank account. I found this a little sus. So I called my financial agent sent my support chat to her. She said leave that bank immediately. A bank that does not accept federal check is not a real bank. A federal check is garenteed funds for the person only. Which means no one can take your money. So there for do not use or trust that bank. 

To sum up. Use this bank at you own risk. And take in account a legal financial lawyer. Said do not trust this bank.
developerResponse:
{'id': 23203056, 'body': "Hi there, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review & we sincerely apologize for your experience with us. 

To clarify, we DO accept federal checks & any other personal checks that are made out to the account holder only.  However, if you were trying to fund your account for the first time with a check, we are unable to accept the check until you've made successful deposits from another funding source to your Current account. 

Once the deposits have settled into your account, the mobile check feature will be made available to you in the app. Please note, we only accept mobile check deposits up to $2000. 

If you have any other questions or concerns, please contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account & we would be more than happy to assist you. ", 'modified': '2021-06-04T17:59:59Z'}

title: Hassle Free Money
review: I love that I can save my money  for different things in separate savings pods at no extra charge. I also love the $25 over draft with no add fees. I don’t like that it is a little difficult to find free. Atm even with the app. Sometime they show up as an in network atm on the map and then you get charged a fee. Over all I like banking with current and I will continue to do so.

title: There’s check cashing is misleading
review: I downloaded this app to cash my check from my refund. Added my other bank to this account also made me Endorse there bank name on my check took pics of the front and back to make me get to the last of the process to tell me that I had to deposit money another way before I could cash it and customer service said the same thing! Bottom line don’t download trying to cash a check or u will be told no amd have there banks name on your check saying mobile deposit! I’m very disappointed and they advertise check cashing but don’t tell u the truth!!!
developerResponse:
{'id': 22289255, 'body': "Hi there, thanks for leaving a review & we apologize for the inconvenience this has caused. We try to be as transparent as possible when it comes to taking advantage of our features, which is why our FAQ page is a great resource if you're in need of more info. You are also able to contact our support team via chat 24/7 if you have any other questions! 

Unfortunately, a check cannot be used to fund your account for the very first time. Once you've made a successful deposit from an external funding source, you'll be able to deposit checks into your account. For more info, feel free to check out our FAQ page here: https://support.current.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017498454-How-can-I-deposit-a-check-into-my-account-

If you have any other questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account. 

Sincerely, 
Support@Current", 'modified': '2021-04-16T17:49:15Z'}

title: Current
review: I just don’t like that they don’t have a spot me, all cards have it, I tried current out and I like it but I feel that they should have a way we can borrow money Incase we needed it for something quick and important and then you pay them when you get a deposit, I feel that should be added. I mean it’s a suggestion, I just feel like the black card is stupid why do I have to pay 4.99 a month for something that doesn’t even help me in anyway.

title: Advise to stay away if married.
review: This is a great app. But I’m only giving it two stars because they do NOT do joint accounts and WILL REJECT TAX RETURNS AND YOUR STIMULUS IF YOU’RE MARRIED! They PRIDE THEMSELVES ON GIVING YOU ACCESS 5 days early! But ONLY IF YOU ARE NOT MARRIED FILING JOINT! Oh and you can’t increase your spending limit past 2000$ a day. Not even temporarily. At least with Chime or Varo or a real bank, they’ll temporarily increase your spending limit with a stimulus or tax refund. So again, if you’re married and filing joint and wanting to use this in anticipation of getting your stimulus or tax refund early, DO NOT GET CURRENT. Get Chime or something else.

title: New card holder
review: So I’m just getting to use my new current account but already I love it. I actually received my paycheck a day early which I was skeptical about. I now have the ability to accumulate up to $25 overdraft for free and can transfer money to my personal bank account. My rating is a 3 because I haven’t really been able to do much with the card but I hope that as I begin making purchases and transferring money to my bank that I can come back and give a updated review. SO FAR SO GOOD !
developerResponse: {'id': 18431806, 'body': 'Hi! We are glad that you like our app. If you have any recommendations/suggestions please let us know! Thank you very much. Sincerely, Support@Current\n\n', 'modified': '2020-10-12T15:28:46Z'}

title: Current
review: I hate I even set up direct deposit with current I went to atm and it did not give me my money 190 went down the drain I did a dispute and still never received my money and they cancel my dispute and basically told me it was nothing they can do please do not get an account with them only thing good with current u get ur check or your taxes faster

title: Easy to use
review: The interface is super easy to use and is super easy to use when trying to finance with different categories. I use this for personal banking and the app offers a virtual as well as a physical card which comes in super handy. I love the apps look as well. I recommend this to anyone looking to set up a teens account or just for personal use.

title: Great so far
review: This is a good app for managing your money as well as owning a bank account to store it. My favorite feature in particular is the savings pod it makes it easier to distinguish what you want to save your money for. You’re also able to create multiple savings pods for different things you want to save for. This is definitely worth using.

title: Your moneys gone if you file dispute!
review: Wow have i had an experience with this crappy Customer service you guys have. Ive been trying to get a dispute handled for over a month and yet to receive anything not even an update. Yet these punks have no issue at all taking my money for there monthly service fee. Service fee for what? 😑 i mean clearly that money isn’t being used because your support team is compromised of sloths especially Raymond P that imbecile. Im usually very patient but im starting to grow very very angry at how these ppl treat me. I will be finding a new bank very soon and so will my 7 friends I recommend to the app.

title: No support
review:
Been waiting over 2 months to get a reply back and my funds returned. Sent several emails regarding my account and still not one single reply back. Then they suspend my account and is holding 800 dollars of mine. Every time I call it routes me to a prerecorded message. When I try to login to chat , it denies me cuz my account suspended. This is worst online banking and never in my life would I use these thieves again.

**Update**
Finally I got a reply back and was able to transfer my remaining funds to another bank. Still didn’t receive an explanation of why I’m not able to use their bank.
developerResponse:
{'id': 16246380, 'body': 'Hi, Please contact us at reviews@current.com to have your issue resolved. 

Sincerely, 
Support@Current

', 'modified': '2020-06-26T21:45:18Z'}

title: Love It
review:
So far current has been a god-send (SO FAR). I was at a time of struggle the last few months, and no bank account would accept me. But I finally got back to work and needed an account, and viola now I have current. I’m writing this review right now because I get paid on Fridays, I got my check yesterday (Wednesday). I love it (SO FAR). 

(Only had the app about a month now)

title: “Finally gave in” never regretted it since
review: Let me tell you in the beginning I didn’t like current because there was no human contact whatsoever I signed on with them right when the “Covid virus” came...Let me tell YOU the best thing I’ve ever done in my life I love them they’re great and they have the best app support line ever if you ever need help with anything you can count on THE CURRENT GO TO 😁CURRENT TEAM❤️❤️❤️

title: Thank you
review: Greetings! I just wanted to take a few minutes to post how my experience has been with Current. I must say that I absolutely love the service. This is a new day / time that we live in..... this company and team makes things so much easy on the financial realm. It’s greatly appreciated. Keep doing with you do. I’m sure it will get better and better. 💯

title: PLEASE ADD SUPPORT FOR PLAID ON CURRENT AND EXPENSES PODS
review: I really really really really wanted to like this app, because my former bank shut down and i needed to switch, i thought my search was over to find a new bank. Everything looked nice and I was gonna use a budgeting app on the side since you guys don’t offer any automatic expense pods (PLEASE ADD ALSO) but you guys aren’t connected with plaid so i literally can’t use anything along side this bank. For a bank called Current it sure isn’t up to date on the latest budgeting things or even connected to PLAID??? I’m probably gonna switch banks.

title: Horrible
review: This app seems like a scam I’m currently locked out of my account the app is not working it won’t let me log in because my phone number has changed and it won’t accept my email address anymore I have money in my account and cannot access I can’t call and talk to anyone about my issues Nor can I contact support!!!!!!!!!!!? Need answers now

title: Modern & Hip way to Bank
review: I love all the little features that keep you super interactive with the banking app holding your hard earned money! I love the jewel tones and black colors on the front end and it is super user friendly. Whether this is your first bank or you’ve had others... either way this app will leave you impressed and wanting to explore more.

title: Absolutely Love It
review: Current is by far one of the most trusting mobile banking app and I would recommend it to anyone. The support team is amazing and if you have a problem and you contact them your problem will be resolved almost immediately I recommend this to anyone who is looking for a mobile banking app as a team.

title: Current is currently the best
review: I’ve had absolutely 0 issues with current!!! I set up my direct deposits within a week of receiving my payments, and they BOTH continue to come as early as possible! I love the no transfer fees! Current is definitely one of the best online banking checking accounts around! I recommend them to any one!

title: A Great Way to let your Children use a credit card
review: Current is the perfect way to give your child a debit card that they can use for online purchases and in-store transactions. While it does cost $30 a year to become an active member, it is the cheapest option compared to any other app of similar nature.

title: It’s okay
review: I give it a 3 star only because when I put a reoccurring deposit from another account into my current account it’s sometimes usually takes five days. Even after receiving a notification that deposit from another linked account should happen instantly still takes five days. I hesitate to use this as a direct deposit through my employerBecause of it being so new. This bank or card being A new business.

title: USED TO LOVE
review: I’ve had my current card for 2 years now and I LOVED every minute of having.  BUT as of late it has been REALLY making me mad.  For the past few days I have been trying to login to the app but have been unsuccessful....I had switched to a new phone and had to re-download the app and now it want let me log in.  Someone needs to FIX this feature on the app.  It is RIDICULOUS that I know my login information but it steady tells me that I already have an account with current and I need to contact the support team.  OKAY did that and no one has responded to ANY of my emails.  FIX THIS I NEED MY MONEY!!!!!!!!!

title: Love love love
review: I split a portion of my direct deposit into Current and I get paid two days faster! Not only do I get paid faster but it’s very convenient for me and my children. There’s a chores list and an allowance that you can set up along with savings options! Ir teaches my kids how to save and even how to use their own debit card. I can control and monitor their spending.

title: Terrible Customer Service
review: This company Current is no good they have no representatives that you can talk to when you have an issue it’s all through the app and if you don’t like the card they just close your account without refunding your annual fee even though it’s only been 3 months. I got this account so I can get my two young kids a bank card. It requires them to have a phone so that they can download the app and activate their card. My kids are to young to have a phone! I recommend trying Greenlight or BusyKid if your trying to get your young ones a bank card.

title: Convenient
review: I moved to a new town I had no bank account, no ID. With no ID it made it hard to cash checks & pay rent so Current made it very easy on me. I filled out basic information & they shipped my card in less than 2 weeks & from there I got all my check straight to my card. It works with cash app Venmo, you can shop online with it. It’s awesome.

title: Awful
review: I am now out over $100 because of this awful bank. It has been weeks since filing disputes and i have heard nothing back. Somehow, scammer get access to my card, so i ordered a new card. And to no ones surprise, fraudulent purchases with that card number as well! Awful. Would not recommend this to anyone. The customer service is awful too. They only allow an in-app chat, or you can leave a message and they’ll “get back to you within 24 hours” FALSE! I have left probably 25 messages without a single reply. Do not trust this bank with your money.
developerResponse: {'id': 17957945, 'body': "Hi, we are sorry that you're having issues with the app. Can you write to us at reviews@current.com. Kindly include a description of the issue you are facing. We look forward to hearing from you. Sincerely, Support@Current\n\n", 'modified': '2020-09-18T15:27:16Z'}

title: Current is awesome
review: It is very hard to cash a check these days . Not to sure y specially if u don’t have 2 forms of I.D. I opened this account and I really didn’t know what to expect. I expected Current to tell me no but they didn’t. And it is so easy. Thank u Current. Great account I will definitely refer my family and friends and even strangers. I glad I got this account

title: Better quality
review: I honestly love this bank and app its so helpful and i love that i can overdraft if i really need it with no extra fees, also the saving part is very helpful I think the only thing i can say is they should really improve the quality of the card i haven’t had mine that long and the paint is already coming off also they’re super flimsy and thin but other than that i love this online banking

title: Loyal To Current ❤️
review: Ever since i’ve signed up for Current, i’ve been in love. No complications whatsoever. Easy to use app, easy access to atm locations, endless services to choose from. I absolutely love the “Insight” feature. Helps me keep track of my spending. I’d definitely recommend this to anyone that wants to convert to online banking. Best online banking app i have ever used!

title: Love my Current card💜
review: I got my premium card last summer and so far i love it! Every time i deposit money, it’s instantly there and I don’t have to wait for days. When i go to a restaurant and pay with my card, i get a text message of how much tip i should leave. And now i started earning cash back and saving money in a saving pod! Thanks Current

title: Terrible!
review: I had this app since April 11. I have not received my card not at all. To change my address, I sent verification and still have not got a respond back. I used my virtual card but when I use Apple Pay I have to type in a pin which I have not even created. The app is good but most of the features are terrible!! I would not recommend unless the make changes ASAP! I’m currently trying to change my banking information now, if anyone can give me any pointers on how to? I would gladly appreciate it!!

title: Trash
review: Don’t sign up if your just trying it out because they won’t let you close your account or stop from changing your direct deposit. I submitted 2 forms to current support asking to cancel my direct deposit for the current card and to close my account and the support email just kept sending me excuses as to why I shouldn’t close the account but I told them like 3 times I wanted it closed and a month later my account is still open and they made me get direct deposit on the current card and won’t let me transfer money to my other card.

title: Really disappointed
review:
I can’t get a real person to respond to me EVER!!! You all deactivated my account and I never asked for that to happen and never used it!!! I would like to be able to use it but you have it locked up to where I can’t even start a new account but yet you send me email after email after I have unsubscribe several times. I guess negative feedback might be the only way to get attention
UPDATE
RESPONSE TO CURRENT-I have emailed several times and emailed again right now we will see what happens but I’m pretty sure it will stay the same nothing will happen

title: Pending
review: This app is crap even when you charges are pending it takes the money amount out when it is pending my somehow you still end up overdrafting even when you don’t go over the amount of money you have in your checking I’ve had them steal 20+ dollars from overdrafting and not one of those times have I over spent on my limit. And when I try to contact them about it I wait forever to get a response and then don’t even get one because it just kicks me out. Don’t get this app not worth it just get a back account.

title: One star is the lowest you can go so they got it.
review:
I have been using this banking Apps since January
Since starting with this I have had nothing but problems. There have been several times money has been taken out double charged or held on my account that shouldn’t have been. The chat feature is a joke it’s all bots sending the same messages over and over. As soon as I wait out my latest dispute and hopefully this time have my money rightfully returned I’m closing my account and never using them or a service like this again.

title: Great app but...
review: The app is great and has greater and quicker access to your financial information than your average bank but the card took a while to get here and the inability to deposit cash into an atm is a bit of an inconvenience but I’m assuming they’re working on that! Overall though great app and look forward to continuing my use with current!

title: Current has me locked out of my account and i have no one to speak to
userName: do not bank here iam telling u
review: This situation that iam In is scary all my money locked in my current account and I have to wait days for them to email me back ? When the only thing I should have to do is put my email and phone number in like I did to sign up... they don’t have a 24/7 chat unless u are in the app and still that’s not useful , I literally had to have my woman make a current account up just to try to talk to some one about my situation now that’s doing to much when I have all my bill money  in my account

title: Worst app
review: If I could give 0 stars I would. Worst app I’ve used. Can’t believe I switched from chime to this. They have your funds in pending even though the funds have been released. And going to hold it in pending until the end of the day. I need my money when it’s released, not when you all decide to let me have it. Send support a message in trying to get help and was told over and over again that they was waiting on money to be released even though I had spoken with my bank and funds had been released. Would not recommend this app to anyone.

title: This app is overall a decent banking app
review: It’s ok for those who can’t or don’t want a conventional bank account has a fee for the account 4.95 each month only good thing I can see is the ease of the web site still check deposits are plagued with excessive delays in the availability of funds and you can get a cash app account and get all the same features for free hopefully if your just looking for access to a debit card and the security of having fdic insured deposits then this is probably the account for you

title: Phone service
review: This app is by far the best banking app out there. It’s cool, fun and easy to use. The only thing that stop from giving me 5 stars is going through the process of contacting customer service. If you lock out the app and can’t get in. You have to jump through hoops to get back in. They should really thinking about creating a phon line to talk to a real person instead of a machine.

title: Overdrive limit
review: So far it’s been great, but I’m confused on the overdrive limit feature, I’ve had this account for almost 6 months and it clearly states that u can go up to $100 and I’ve been stuck at $25 overdraft limit,that could’ve been useful at some points , and when I talk to customer service they say they are periodically reviewing my account which I do not believe, what’s goin on!!!???

title: Just okay
review: Have been using current for a few years now. First cards are very worn out. Could not get a new one with same number on it. Cards expired December 2020. Did not get new cards. Had to contact support a week ago. They only ordered one of my teens cards. Just contacted them today for the second teen. Support actually told me there was no fee for the replacement. What? It is not a replacement. Old cards no longer work. Very frustrating since this company is dealing with young people and their money.

title: CURRENT IS THE WAY TO GO
review: I absolutely love love love current. Not only do they give you up to 100$ in overdraft fees i get paid two days early which is a absolute plus because sometimes i need money days before actual pay day. I’m able to pause my card which i love because sometimes some places like to snatch my money off.

title: The BEST card there is!
review: I absolutely love this card. I can add money using cash, bank account, or debit card! My husband has one bank card and sometimes We both need it on the same day ... until I found current. I just transfer money from his card to my current account and the funds are available IMMEDIATELY!!

title: Not happy
review: I have a current account somewhere out there. I have money in a savings pod and no way to access it. Once I added my teenage son an account attached to mine so I could send him money. Current either deleted my account, without me asking for this or they made my son the primary account holder. All I know is something went wrong. I called for help, “ of course “ the automated response comes on and it is in no way helpful. So it has been a few months now and I still do not have my money or help on correcting the account situation. Very disappointed.
developerResponse: {'id': 23313102, 'body': 'Hi there, we are sorry to hear of your experience! We would love to look into this further and see what happened with your account. Please send us an email at reviews@current.com for further assistance. Thank you!', 'modified': '2021-06-10T17:37:27Z'}

title: Super easy/simple to set up
review: I was just amazed at how quickly and easy it was to set up the account. Also, all the features that it has built in. The pods is one of my favorite features, I had been looking for something like that for a while and came across it when I wasn’t looking. Just plain awesome!

title: Help was on the way!
review: I was locked out of my account changed my address phone number everything I contact support and with the proper protocol and security I was in able to update everything! I love love love this app! Early quick pay! So many benefits to this app card everything! Enjoy new current customers!

title: Great card
review: It’s great and easy and it makes it easy to watch my children spending and monitor them at all times very convenient love this card.😍😍😍😍 And my children really feel like they got responsibility because they have a debit card and they can pay and buy things on there own😂😂😂😂

title: Locked out no one is responding
review:
I got a new phone and number I tried down loading the new app and log in with my email it asks for your phone number aswell which I don’t have my old number anymore I’ve tried contacting via email and phone there is no live person you can speak with I’ve emailed multiple times I’ve 
Tried to transfer money over to my Apple Pay they locked my account now I have no access to my money horrible won’t refer anyone to this company only way your able to contact them is thru the app which is insane!!!!
developerResponse: {'id': 19625706, 'body': "Hi, we're sorry to hear this and we would be happy to investigate what happened. Please send us an email at reviews@current.com. Thank you. Sincerely, Support@Current\n\n", 'modified': '2020-12-08T17:12:40Z'}

title: Infuriated
review: Current was a great app until it crashes!!! Once you are locked out there’s nothing u can do they don’t have a number and when u post your problems on a review all it’s going to say is please email this email to be assisted..I can’t even log back into my account for my job to do direct deposit and it only pops up with review of application or talk to 24/7 contact support but the catch is...YOU CANT CONTACT SUPPORT IF U ARE LOCKED OUT OF YOUR ACCOUNT THAT IS THE ONLY WAY..smh current..a was satisfied customer is now a dissatisfied customer

title: Upset
review: I’ve had this card for a few months now I finally set up direct deposit with this bank been trying to contact someone regarding why I have not received my direct deposit yet and I still have not received any funds we are in the middle of a pandemic and I have bills to pay if I do not receive my pay check I will be switching banks and something has to be done I am so upset worried about where my money is my job has done their part and stated they have already sent the direct deposit days ago.

title: Review
review: Me and my family have used midfirst for forever and I just started using current and I love it! I’ve never written a review on anything before, that’s how good it is! The faster direct deposit I didn’t know I was eligible for stimulus checks and current helped me get mine, the savings pods are very helpful for me to set goals financially. Absolutely love it

title: Never have issues
review: The only down side I can say Current has is there fear of confrontation. Obviously there’s a reason they refuse calls from account holders. The only support/customer service availability is chat and if you are unable to respond immediately then just be prepared for never being able to hold a convo long enough to get anything resolved…

title: Getting paid fast
review: I absolutely love this app. Got my third stimulus four days faster. Almost ran off the interstate when I got the notification! Also the overdrive option has really helped me out a lot!  And the customer service is amazing. I highly recommend current. They don’t hold your money like chime.

title: The truth..
review:
I was skeptical when I first downloaded the app but if I’m being 100% honest, I have fell in LOVE with it! I can’t say any bad things about it.
I even went and upgraded to premium for $4.99/ month. All the features are amazing and very easy to navigate! I’ve already recommended this app to everyone in my contact list!

title: So simple
review: I am glad to have found this app. It is so simple to use and easy to understand. Current is helping me when I couldn’t get a bank account elsewhere for one reason or another. I recommend current to anyone who needs help learning about banking, or anyone who is building themselves financially.

title: Satisfied
review: This card is the best. It gives you an overview of your account. Navigation is so easy and it allows you buying access to more options then other prepaid cards would. Monthly maintenance fee is lower then other and with all that your getting from this card, it’s worth it.

title: Wow
review: I’ve tried my hand with a lot of these new hybrid accounts that border between prepaid account and actual checking accounts. So far current has been rather impressive! Was able to add $150 instantly through visa and even deposit a $900 bill pay check first day the account was opened. Fantastic.

title: Current stole my money!
review: October 24 I swiped my card for gas but it said decline and it took a pending charge of 100$ now I’m a premium member so they should of reverse it but never did, I asked current about this and said it’s a pending charge and was never charge and it was reversed, lies! I have screen shots of a before and after balance I saw with my own eyes now they won’t give me my money back! And also if you use an atm they don’t support you get charged 7$ extra by current on top of the atm charged they lied to me and stole my money! I’m going to take legal actions with bank

title: MrBeast is the man!
review:
Just got a notification that I can enjoy premium benefits for LIFE, free of charge. Heck yes brother, thank you!

App itself seems promising. Setup was super quick and easy, debit card currently en route but I can utilize electronic payments immediately. Especially love the “Savings Pods” feature. 

Anywho, keep up the great work, whoever you are. And thanks again Mr. Beast, you the man.

title: Love it!
review: No hidden charges on anything. Only thing is is you upgraded to the premium card it’s $4.99 and it’s well worth it I promise! Literally got all my direct deposits extremely early sometimes on Fridays when my direct deposits are processed on Fridays I literally will have it hit into my current account 3 to 4 hours later on a FRIDAY!!

title: Currently a scam obviously
review: I gave this card no rating because it a scam why because I followed all instructions they took my 36$ and I got no service you have to keep verifying your email it won’t accept it it won’t link to your child account and of course I contacted customer service chat the close the account and didn’t give me money back so yeah no find another app because this one is a ripoff

title: Currents Review
review: Really good service and care service to use. Only thing I think should change is they should up their over draft from $25 to $50 or $100. Especially for the folks like me that have money hit every week in my account, have for a long time. But over all I give in a 8 out of 10

title: Money comes late
review: I was told that the premium you can get paid today faster so I decided to get premium and I am getting paid a day late at this point that if I get my payment today if I get any other day it’ll be even later they are absolutely terrible I would’ve never bank with them if I knew that and when I went through customer support the guy I was talking to literally just hung up and I was not finished I still have questions absolutely terrible I recommend being with anyone else in the world besides them

title: Perfect
review: There has never been an issue with any deposits to this account. My check comes 2 days earlier as well. I use it with paypal and cashapp and never had a problem. I love receiving the notifications every time card is used or declined so if any fraud was happening, I could catch it immediately.

title: I Love this app ITS BETTER THAN CASHAPP!
review: This app is amazing! you could refund you payment and get your money back within 5 days! You could order a card and it comes really quick! And when you at the start if you don’t have enough they will pay it for you, I know that you will have a over draft but they MAKE IT SO CHEAPER!!!

title: One Question
review: I’m trying to make an account for my daughter and I have to use my regular banking account and I don’t really prefer to use my banking account for things so why don’t you guys make saving accounts and option like say if I don’t want to use my banking account she can you her savings account and put money on the card for her savings account?.Thank you

title: Incorrect Advertising
review: I’ve been with Current for quite sometime now, but I’ve been frequently seeing advertisements stating that they have overdraft for up to $100. Myself along with some other people who just joined only receive $25 for overdraft. So why false advertise something that you don’t truly do ? Over all a good debit card to have, something’s can be changed, but don’t reel people in for something you don’t have

title: Lie
review: They told me I can use my card cuz I Got premium when I didn’t ask for it and I only want a basic but I can’t use my card and I have to wait 10 days just to get me another car just to be able to use my money this banking is trash there’s no point in using them at all because now all the sudden they can change your account back to the house supposed to be basic but I bet you can’t reactivate your car I’ve never heard that before never my life specially when you it was a mistake never again will I use them

title: Great Bank
review: I love Current! I have the premium account so I get paid 2 days early which has been wonderful for me. I love how consistent Current is and I haven’t had an issue with them I’ve had it for about 8 months and it’s really the easiest for my savings and a fun bank to go through. I highly recommend!

title: Just use chime
review:
I’ve been waiting months on a dispute, uploaded image proof I been scammed along with others. The website was shut down, their email, their phone number and still they want to make me wait and get in contact with the merchant that is non existent. 

Received a phone number for this bank to call and move the dispute by quicker and was told they could not do that, they never give help, there’s no telephone number to actually speak to someone and they blame COVID as to why. If I could give 0 stars I would
developerResponse:
{'id': 20069701, 'body': "Hi there! We're sorry to hear this and appreciate your feedback. Disputes can take up to 90 days to be completed, but most are resolved sooner than that. 

You can also check the status of your dispute within the app too by heading into your transaction history and tapping Open Disputes. 

For additional questions, feel free to contact our customer support team at reviews@current.com from the email address associated with your account for assistance.

Sincerely, 
Support@Current", 'modified': '2020-12-29T17:59:00Z'}

title: Inconvenient
review:
By far the worst functioning bank app.  I constantly have my card declined when making purchases due to “invalid pin” or having my card “paused” when it literally says card active on the app ??? Never ever changed my pin either so the app needs major work.  

Have an unauthorized purchase? Don’t even bother filing a dispute because they won’t help and your moneys gone just like that.

I’ve switched to Discover Cash Back Debit which is wayyyyy better.  Can’t wait for my card to come in so I can finally get rid of current for good

title: Great app
review: Sooo I love the premium features. I love getting paid 2 days early instead of getting paid Thursday  I get paid Tuesday 😮 which is one of the best things I love about current I usually get paid around 11:30 earliest 11:45 latest. I recommend downloading this app and yes this a real review! I also love the black card very nice and unique.

title: Direct deposit
review: I really didn't think my direct deposit would go through so quickly. I just filled out the papers online thinking it would go through by next pay but I was so wrong. I will make sure to spread the word about this card from now on..

title: Current banking
review: This is by far the best online bank i’ve ever used, and i’ve used quite a few. Direct deposit comes 36-48 hours early every time, and are just a great online bank overall. 100% recommend this app to everyone looking for an online bank!!

title: Awesome!!!?
review: Seamless banking, instant cash deposits, points rewards, and getting my hard earned paycheck two days early. What is there not to love? I also enjoy the fact that I can request/send money from other users. The premium card is super sexy with the embossed current logo and color scheme. Definitely baller status!!!

title: I like it
review: I haven’t had any problems. I’m terrible with money and this app has shown me just how bad I am 😂 and because of it I have gotten sooooo much better! I’m saving and I can see how much I’m spending a month with ease. Definitely good for teens! And I think EVERY bank should have the features this bank has.

title: Average guy
review: Current started out great. But when fraudulent charges were made on my account. They left me hanging for months and when I finally go through I was told that there was nothing they could do. And was told that I was out the 1500. The reason being that they tried to contact the vender and they never responded. Yes you heard that right. They expect a person steeling to get back to them. I felt as if they were the one stealing. I don’t think I’m going to let this go. To top it all off I never received a card for the account.

title: Love CURRENT
review: I absolutely love my current account like I get paid 3 days earlier than EVERYONE at work including my managers lol but seriously being a premium member I get a lot of perks I haven’t seen all of them yet but I know you guys have much more I’m store for me I recommend current to everyone I know thank you

title: Great App!
review: I LOVE this app! Everything is available at the tip of my fingers and the opportunity to get cash back from points is so helpful and useful, I have recommended this app to over five of my friends it’s so accessible and has so many features including depositing a check, which has helped me so much.

title: Love my current card!!!
review: I always have early access to my direct deposits, it’s so awesome! All my coworkers are jealous that I always get paid 2 days early and I told them we’ll get itself a current card and you will not regret it!!! Also customer car is awesome they always answer right away!

title: 10-Oct
review: this is an amazing banking app. it doesn’t charge you for over drafting up to $100, which can be a life saverrr. The customer service is very helpful, and honestly i found this app most easy to navigate out of all the others i’ve tried. the cards look pretty cool as well.

title: Regrets
review: I’ve been banking with his bank for a while and had nothing but problems with my card and as well with the dispute that I’ve had since September 19, 2020 right now it is currently May 2021 and I still don’t have a resolve solution for my dispute that I’ve been trying to get them to do for me! I’ve tried calling the customer service line and you can’t even get to a single person on the phone line this is by far the worst customer service and worst bank I’ve ever dealt with hence why I am transitioning to a different banks!
developerResponse:
{'id': 22751285, 'body': "Hi there, thanks for leaving us a review & we'd be more than happy to look into what's going on here. Our phone support is currently limited for the safety of our customer support agents & we apologize for the inconvenience this has caused. Rest assured we're working on a solution that meets the needs of our members & continues to keep our support agents safe. 

In the meantime, please contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account so that we can look into this for you. We'll keep an eye out for your response & let us know if you have any questions or concerns. 

Sincerely,
Support@Current", 'modified': '2021-05-11T17:38:04Z'}

title: Unbelievable
review: Current is awesome! I’ve had the card for a few short weeks and I’m already saving money from round-up purchases! Also, all of my deposits from my job are arriving 3 days early! Unbelievable! I cannot wait to start using the overdraft feature when needed !

I have had this card for almost a year now. I had to block so many companies for trying to take money out of mine and my kids account. Or get a new card. The sad thing is once the company take your money that is the only way you can block them and current will not give you your money back. And they charge you $5 for a new card when you cancel it. I was in love with this card until that started happening. I feel bad but I have to get rid of it. I am tired of losing money I worked hard for.

title: Customer Oriented
review: This card is great!! For a small fee you get overdraft. That’s most helpful in times like this. I had to change my phone number. Contacted customer service and they changed it for me promptly after answering questions for secure purposes. Very helpful and quick to answer questions!!

title: Terrible.
review:
They do not send replacement cards at expiration.  They want to charge you for the card.   Then when I asked for the replacement, representative said it would be delivered in 10 days.  Never came.  When I reached out again, the original rep never actually put an order for the card. 
When I asked again for the replacement, but asked for it to be sent over night, because now the card expired. 
They refused, and wanted me to pay an additional $20 fee.
I will be leaving the company after this disaster.

title: Customer satisfaction
review: Ok so you can’t Instant deposit into current for whatever reason but when I tried they didn’t let me for months not only that there deposit checks take too long n transfer money from this bank from another is bad. Once I tried to cash a check into this bank I couldn’t cancel it when I wanted to instant deposit and then once I did to another bank they blocked my account n stole $300 off my account. All because they have no cancel feature for depositing checks.

title: Locked out with no access
review: I have had this account for forever today the app will not let me log in there is a customer service number but no live agents you can only leave a message the only way to chat with support is through the app I’m freaking out I have no money on me and I can’t even get help this is a real problem I hope someone contacts me soon but as soon as I have access I’m taking all my money out and changing my direct deposit this is a huge failure and I don’t trust them with my money
developerResponse: {'id': 23313139, 'body': 'Hi there! We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and would be happy to assist you further and update the info on your account to have this issue resolved asap! Please send us an email at reviews@current.com. Thanks!', 'modified': '2021-06-10T17:41:11Z'}

title: Customer service is poor
review: I got current and used the savings pods didn’t make any large transactions just $1 and I’m getting charged extra. This app stole money from me, I tried customer service and they couldn’t help with anything or find that something was wrong after sending them proof. When mr Beast commercial came on my phone I didn’t know I would be opening a scam. Is he getting the money? Scam likely be careful current is taking people money without transaction history and hiding fees that wasn’t on the disclosure.
developerResponse:
{'id': 22903652, 'body': "Hi there, thanks for leaving us a review & we're sorry to hear about this. We would be more than happy to look into what's going on here as this doesn't sound right. Please contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account for help. 

Let us know if you have any other questions or concerns & we look forward to your response!

Sincerely,
Support@Current", 'modified': '2021-05-19T20:32:59Z'}

title: Awful awful awful. I recommend chime !
review: Downright awful ! At first it was great. Then my tax return hit and it went down from there. My account has been locked for a week and cannot move or send money from anything and have contacts them daily and they refuse to do anything about it ! I lost my house because they can’t unlock my account even though I have sent them every bit of information they have asked for !!! Filed a lawsuit against them ! Wouldn’t even give them a star tbh.
developerResponse: {'id': 21718842, 'body': "Hi there! First & foremost, we're sorry to hear about your experiences with us & want to ensure that you are taken care of. Our goal is to offer a premium banking service that is accessible & provides the right tools to improve your financial outcomes. However, it sounds like we did the exact opposite here & apologize for any inconvenience we've caused. Please contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account so that we can look into this for you right away! \nSincerely, \nSupport@Current", 'modified': '2021-03-18T01:11:43Z'}

title: App Use
review: I can’t get the app to respond. I’ve uninstalled and downloaded it several times now. The app opens up but won’t allow me to touch any buttons to advance to another page. I can’t gain access to my account and I need to. Support told me to email them from the email address i Registered with. But I can’t even look to see the appropriate Email. This has been going on for a week now. I’m not very happy

title: Love the app, but it does not work with iOS 14 as it claims
review:
Guys, get this: 

When I updated my phone to iOS 14, Current stopped working on my phone. It will not let me press the log in button to access my account, but I could still access my card. 

So, to try to solve the problem, I checked the update logs and they said that the app was updated to work with iOS 14. I just figured I needed to re-install the app. I did this, and I had the exact same problem. 

However, when I re installed the app, all of the previous data was deleted from the app, including my LOGIN INFO. So now I can’t even use my physical or virtual card at all! 

I do not recommend downloading the app or getting a card until this issue is resolved. I hope that the developers contact me about this issue before Current closes my account or something.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18150794, 'body': "Any deposit you make from your bank account (ACH) will take anywhere from 3-5 business days to settle into your Current account. If you are experiencing issues with your app, this should not limit your card usage. We'd be happy to take a further look into this. Please send us an email at reviews@current.com. 

Sincerely,
Support@Current
Sincerely,
Support@Current", 'modified': '2020-09-28T14:14:17Z'}

title: Rating Current
review: Great so far.. I du wish to overdraft without setting up direst deposit due to my job not giving paper checks it’s paid under table Nd then I add the money to current card... hope u guys can help but other than that I heard from friends that this banking method is straight and helpers are friendly

title: Current review
review:
Love this company ! I have not had one single issue at all with them and have received all deposits on time -the last  online bank I had (won’t say who ) I was totally unsatisfied with -got my check at sometimes 11PM -which is absolutely ridiculous ! 
Current Is the BEST ! 💗💜❤️

title: No customer protection
review: I had $700 in fraudulent charges on my account in September. They didn’t complete their investigation until February only to tell me in email they was no error found. I didn’t get a dime back. I block brands on the app only to have the same charges happening over and over. I’ve had $357 taken out fraudulently in the month of March alone. You will never get any money back. All of their practices by bank standards are very unprofessional and unethical. Don’t use this bank if you value your money, security and peace of mind
developerResponse:
{'id': 21892458, 'body': "Hi there, we're sorry to hear about your experience with us. We take fraudulent activity very seriously & do everything we can to ensure our members are taken care of & feel safe utilizing our service. 

Disputed charges can take anywhere between 10-90 business days to complete, which is a standard timeframe. We apologize for the inconvenience the outcome of your dispute has caused & will be here should you have any questions or concerns. Feel free to contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account for help. 

Sincerely, 
Support@Current", 'modified': '2021-03-26T21:06:05Z'}

title: 10-Oct
review: Current is just so awesome and convenient, absolutely perfect for the modern lifestyle. It has super cool ways to save and set money aside which helps a lot specially with how you can round up every purchase to go to your savings. I love it so far ! It’s also cheaper then your average bank account by far.

title: BEST MOBILE BANK
review: I’ve used many mobile banking apps but current takes the cake over all of them, easy to use, direct deposits hit faster and customer service is outstanding. 5 out of 5 stars for sure! Ditch your bank and sign up with current today for stress free banking without hassle.

title: The best Ever
review: I was broke and was waiting for my usual payday. I just signed up for current last week I got my card this week and switched my direct deposit ASAP. Something told me check my account and my money has been on my card since 8 this morning!! I just changed my direct deposit YESTERDAY!!!

title: Best bank
review: This bank is very user friendly u can see anywhere your card was used it’s so cool I love it . And it also helps me budget and save money. No bank has what this one has you can even put a picture for your savings pod and it’s so easy to transfer deposit money anything

title: Great in concept but....
review: Love the interface and all the capabilities. But execution is dismal. 1) forgot to send my daughter a new debit card 2) declined a purchase even though the funds are available 3) when we did call to order a new card it takes 3 weeks to get to you! - rendering the spend account useless 4) turned off allowance but kept transferring money anyway and 5) SUPER expensive in a world of no fee checking and spend accounts. Want to love it but will have to dump it. Way too many problems.

title: Thrives.
review: They allow someone to take my money and minutes, and did not stop it, or let me know. Now I have to prove myself to them for someone taking over $1700 within minutes off of my card. Can’t get in touch with anyone, and they lie and say they will get in touch with you within 48 hours, but I have not heard anything from them at all. And chat is the worst waiting two hours to chat with someone that cannot help you. I can’t wait to get my money back, or report them to my local news station for help.

title: Been a great account so far
review: I’ve been using current off and on for a couple years now. Lately it’s been one of the only accounts I use for anything online. Everything is straight forward and easy to use. I’ll keep using it until it isn’t.

title: I need help please!!!!! ASAP
review: I just moved and I don’t have proof of address yet and it won’t let me add my apartment number to my address to get a new card how do I delete my account and try again? But other than that this is a wonderful app and I love it as my first bank account but I just need my card

title: Hard times
review: While we are all experiencing lost of income and lost of trust of big banks while we fight though this pandemic. I’m glad to see Current Card get me through these hard moments to get me my essential paycheck fast and on time! From the bottom of my heart thank you Current Team!

title: Love everything but one thing!
review: Absolutely love everything about this app! I have only one complaint and that’s with other websites current isn’t heard of and it makes it difficult because this is where I get my direct deposit so proof of income isn’t found on places like Earnin and any website of that nature or loan websites. It’s not an approved debit card.

title: Wow
review: I am so glad that I switch to current!! I was just telling my aunt that I did have any money and that I would have to wait  until the 1st  and here it is  the  26th 3 or 4 days before  my money was supposed to be here  but it’s here .😀😃😄😁🤩🤩 and I have told both my sisters and they have signed up as well.

title: Best prepay card
review: I honestly think this card is amazing there is nothing in stores that compare it got to my house four days after ordering I got my check 12 hrs before any of my co worker’s and it’s set up to make kid account no complaints here just wish I found it sooner!!

title: Best bank you can have
review: I had Current for about 5 months and I love it you can do anything you want and it’s quick easy deposits, you get direct deposit 1 day early and you can even easily switch over from checking to saving with just a few clicks

title: It’s ok
review: I feel like current is ok , they just should have way better features especially being and having the big name they have when you deposit a mobile check upload you have to wait 5 days vs net spend you can pay a little more for fast verifying for only around 2.99 also the direct deposit takes forever when it says 2 days dfaster

title: Stolen money
review: This company has terrible customer service they suspended my account and kicked me out of the app with over $50,000 of mine and my children’s money inside I send an email every day and still have not received a response. They have not even told me why I cannot use my account. I just want my money back. This is criminal to steal someone’s money like this and not give them any option to get it back. DO NOT USE THIS APP THEY WILL TAKE YOUR MONEY. they have no customer service number and do not answer emails. TERRIBLE SERVICE!!
developerResponse: {'id': 17334753, 'body': "For further assistance, please email us at reviews@current.com. We'd be happy to see what happened with your account. Sincerely, Support@Current\n\n", 'modified': '2020-08-17T20:30:05Z'}

title: Super easy and convenient
review: I love this current card.! I use it for my Doordash deposits and it becomes Available instantly! Also it’s super easy to place money in different savings pods. Very cool!! I have a savings for my bills and also my travel savings all in one app, one card! Also no ATM Fees! Definitely a must

title: Suddenly can’t login into my app
review: This is ridiculous. I was able to login the night before !! Now I can’t login at all. The login button disappeared and the only thing showing is “get started” even when i enter my number is says that my number is already registered and it doesnt even take me to a login screen! This is really unacceptable! They have support but there’s no to check your balance over the phone and no way to access your account online or recover it either… 🤬🤬🤬
developerResponse: {'id': 23335725, 'body': "Hey there, we apologize for the issue you've experienced logging in to your account! We would be happy to update the information on your account and swiftly resolve this issue! Please shoot us an email at reviews@current.com for further assistance.", 'modified': '2021-06-11T20:31:00Z'}

title: Ugh i love this
review: Im underaged so i have to use my mom ss number and account for Cashapp and i keep forgetting my password, so shes sick of putting it in over and over again ...... so u download current ordered a card and just cash out and use the money like that❤️works like a dream without charges and monthly fees and so forth!

title: Tax Return
review: I was a honestly a little skeptical about using Current for my tax return, but it worked so perfect!! They claim that you can get it 5 days by using the app, and they were so correct! My tax return came without issue in less than a week from my tax return (E-File) being accepted by the IRS? 5 stars

title: Best Thing for Single Parents with no actual bank
review: Current has helped me start savings plans, not go over budget, keep money in my account long enough to pay bills lol. Thank you Current for helping me be a better me. I even opened up an account for my son and I’m saving money for him

title: Do not bank with current
review: I’ve been banking with current for over a year now and at first everything was great but now it’s horrible I lost my card and tried to send the rest of my money to my boyfriend since he has current as well so I can just take off the cash they won’t allow it unless you have an actual physical card which takes about 2 weeks to ship out so now I cannot use any money that I have until I get a new card customer service is awful and are no help at al

title: RoyalT Muzic
review: Fastest direct posit out here and you can buy items from certain store to gain points. So you can redeem those points until real money 🤫💰. So I highly recommend the current card to students, workers, children allowance and businesses that love transfer money to another business. 🤝💯

title: BETTER THAN ANY BANK I KNOW
review: We are Emailed when we are paid early. Everyone at work is getting paid on Friday night. I’m getting paid Wednesday at Midnight. More than 24hrs before everyone else. Also this app helps you create a spending budget and adds up your spending and summarizes the category

title: great for families
review: I use current with my dad and mom and ifs been great. I can save my money and they can check how much ive saved how much ive spent and where i am spending it. They trust me with money now.  and i recommend you should use this with your teenagers, its easy to manage and online. functions like any regular app. easy and great for both parents and teenagers.

title: Great banking app easy to have easy to use but nice and secure to feel safe with your money again
review: This banking app isn’t like no other, it’s better easy tracking so you have all you need right in one spot, easy to set up and start saving money, nice and secure to feel in charge

title: Question
review: I made an account and I’m in the account, but when you create it does it automatically send you the card, because it didn’t say anything about getting it shipped, over all is very organized, but it just doesn’t say I’m going to get it delivered

title: Echo the awful customer service
review: I would stay away simply because the customer service is nonexistent. Quick summary:  opened an account, received error when trying to deposit funds from 3 different external bank accounts, used text chat to report issue, 3 weeks later I am still being told that their “customer service” department is looking into the issue. Today was the last straw as they once again gave the generic response of 3-5 business days. I canceled the account.
developerResponse:
{'id': 22082360, 'body': "Hi there, we're terribly sorry to hear about your experience with us & we apologize for the inconvenience we've caused. At Current, we understand that customer support is crucial, especially when it comes to mobile banking. We strive to meet the needs of all our members by providing high quality customer service in an efficient & easily accessible way.  It sounds like we've failed you & we'd like to look into what went wrong here. 

Please reach out to us at reviews@current.com from the email address that was linked to your account for help & let us know if you have any questions or concerns. 

Looking forward to hearing back from you! 

Sincerely, 
Support@Current", 'modified': '2021-04-06T18:33:57Z'}

title: Logging in
review: I have not been on for a while and it is asking me to log in. When I click log in, it brings me to questions, as if I am signing up for the app.  I have deleted the app, deleted data from the app/iCloud, reinstalled the app, and yet it continues to bring me back to the last question I had not answered.  If I’ve deleted the app and the data from the iCloud, how does it remember what question I am on?  Please help me simply log in to my sons account.
developerResponse:
{'id': 21959121, 'body': "Hi there, we're sorry to hear about that! If you've updated your phone number or email address since you've opened an account with us, we may need to update that information on our end. Please reach out to us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account so that we can help you gain access again. 

Looking forward to your response! 

Sincerely, 
Support@Current", 'modified': '2021-03-31T00:39:08Z'}

title: Bank transfer
review: Your money arrives a week early . But the only thing I don’t like is that, when you go to transfer money into the account or out of the account it takes a week . Sometimes I need the money ASAP but due to a long hold that’s impossible

title: Best mobile bank - tried most
review:
The only thing I don’t like is the $4.99/month fee but to me it’s still worth the price for the features. Even though now almost every other mobile bank is coping their style, I will still support Current.

Card looks cool as well lol

title: YES MUST
review: I have had current for a little over a month now and i love it.. i’ve gotten my paycheck 4 days early before. I get paid weekly so having current makes me feel like i’m never going broke with early pay days. With COVID money was everywhere and a mess, Current has helped me clean it up.

title: Current Direct Deposit & Credit Improvement
review:
I came to work asking about my check & by the end of the shift on Wednesday night (tonight) it arrived, I highly recommend current to anyone.
It also raised my credit by adding 7-9 points to it,
Just by using current.

title: Happy
review: I am very pleased with the current mobile banking app my check now arrived two days early in my direct deposit but I had just started work last week and applied for my direct deposit in the following week it was in my account two days early

title: The Future Now!!!
review: I’ve had this card since the first advertisement on Snapchat! It’s the best card in the market. You can change your pin in seconds after every purchase and stop purchases from going through at the tap of a button.

title: Greatly accurate information and services!
review: I initially wanted this account, only for the debit card! I thought it was beautiful. Though since I’ve had it and made use of it, I found out just how stellar their service is. I would recommend this card to anyone!

title: Love it.
review: I never have a problem with my card.  I also get direct deposit 3 days after then I am supposed too opposed to 2 days.  I love the fact that I don’t get charged a monthly maintenance fee. Also like the fact that you can have up to 3-4 different savings pods with unlimited transfers!!

title: Awesome
review: Everybody go sign up for current this is actual bank with no hidden fees and it’s so easy to use people that have trouble signing up for a bank like welfrago , chase, Bank of America this is a whole different bank experience hurry you won’t regret and won’t take that long

title: Easy and Quick
review:
I love that my credit card payments were withdrawn rapidly & yes I got my direct deposit on Wednesday. I love current, but I wish they had some kind of option like Zelle to complete transactions with people with other banks. 
Other than that it’s 100% recommended

title: Current Descretion
review: I have heard alot of god things about current, but haven’t experienced anything for myself. For the past 4 months every time I open the app it sends me to a screen telling me that my app is being processed. I made an account and put a ton of info in and haven’t received as much as a confirmation email. I have tried using the desktop version but to no avail, an they don’t have a support number to call so I guess they will be reviewing my application until only they know when.
developerResponse: {'id': 21849941, 'body': "Hi there! We're sorry to hear about your experience with us so far. Normally, we notify you that your application needs to be reviewed & will reach out if we need additional information. Please contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address you used to sign up so we can further investigate this issue for you. \nSincerely, \nSupport@Current", 'modified': '2021-03-24T22:15:28Z'}

title: Great I would recommend totally love this mobile banking system
review: Simple easy and handy saves my arse when I needed something it’s legitimate so far I have no bad complaints what so ever totally worth trying out! Get your money 3-4-5 days faster depending on what it is direct deposit government etc

title: Super Easy
review: Easy to sign up for easy to use and they even give you a virtual card while you wait. Using them as a bank and debit card two in one deal. Everything you need to see on your app. You’ll never go back to regular banks. Couldn’t be happier with it!

title: The best bank card ever!!
review: Current is simply amazing!! The card has many great features, although “Tap to pay” transactions decline every time, and yes we all know Current is working on that issue. Other than that I highly recommend this card to anyone!!

title: Terrible
