review: I keep getting ignored when asking why my check isn’t in my account.. I have the screenshots because for some reason you can’t get the transcripts anymore. Nobody could never give you a real bank answer or help. It’s always wait more time or some robot response.. they don’t have supervisors. It’s real starting to work my nerves. Phone service has been saying you have to chat in app because of there safety you can’t talk in person. Pitiful banking I wouldn’t recommend this if it was savings for a dog.

title: Poor fraud protection
review: My son’s card was stolen and someone attempted to use it. There is no phone number to call, you can only email for support. It took me two days and seven emails to get them to cancel my account. Lots of questions that made it clear they wanted to try to drag out me canceling in order to try to keep my business, rather than immediately addressing the fraud. I will go with a legitimate bank that has a phone number I can call and doesn’t try to fight or delay me when I want to close an account.
developerResponse:
{'id': 16153227, 'body': "We apologize for the trouble you've had with the app. We'd be happy to take a look into this for you, please contact us at reviews@current.com. Thank you. 

Sincerely, 
Support@Current

", 'modified': '2020-06-22T22:12:39Z'}

title: You have to love current
review: Current is easy to navigate it helps you save earn rewards points very efficient and you never have to worry about your funds being bothered if you don’t have a current bank go bank with Current!

title: Lit ASL
review: If you don’t want a bank with a lot of fees current is the way, if your credit is bad current is the way and you get direct deposit 2 days earlier I signed up for the premium today and got my pay check a hour later y’all need to get on the wave

title: Great for a Savings Card
review:
My favorite feature of this app is how easy it is to be able to set up a daily, weekly, or monthly deposited! Helps you keep track of your spending amongst other things!
Definitely recommend 
Trustworthy and Reliable.

title: I can’t get into the app
review: I applied for it on one phone that phone was lost tried to log in and download app and can’t get into the app at all I have money on the account for me and my children can’t even cancel they cards or talk to anyone this is crazy I just want my money

title: The best card to have
review: Ever since I been with current I get everything early my taxes pay check and i like the no gas fees it’s out the 100 dollars right back on your card with secs I haven’t never had a problem and happy to be doing business with current

title: Perfect
review: Love how smooth the layout is & how fast & simple the whole app is developed. Money comes in quicker it’s easier to spend with the virtual card while you wait on your normal card. The whole set up is nice I replaced wells Fargo with current. & am loving my first week with you guys thank you.

title: Support Assistance
review: I tried asking a few questions and the support team do not reach out. The monthly fees for the teens are $ 30+  and I believe that is too much. I also tried to ask why isn’t the app accepting my bank routing and account number and I haven’t received any response. I don’t like the fact I have to pay fees just to add money on my nephew account. Don’t get me wrong the whole app idea is a great but I believe there is lack of assistance and high fees.

title: USER BEWARE
review: If they so happen to make a mistake and charge you twice for yearly fees or any other reason you will have to wait for days or even weeks to get your own money back. It took them 7 MONTHS to get my daughters card active and able to use, meanwhile I was still being charged fees. They are TERRIBLE about timely communication. Not worth the hassle or inconvenience. I’m canceling my “service” with them immediately. There are too many options available to continue dealing with these problems.

title: HAPPY
review:
Thank goodness for my Current card....Is really helps with my money balancing as a Single mom💪🏾 So the Rainy Day Saving on the app is saving my babies Christmas 🤗😊 When I finally got my first deposit and played around the app I had to GO PREMIUM!!!!

Thank you 🙏🏾 Current Boss, owner, janitors, customer service reps and all who keeps Current “CURRANT”😍
Sincerely, SATISFIED CLIENT

title: The future
review: I just really like the app and how convenient everything is if I want to make a savings right there phone upgrade my car it’s right there if I wanna turn on and off my overdraft it’s right there everything is so accessible it’s a hard app to beat

title: Love it love it
review: I love the fact my first set up with my direct deposit came early I didn’t have to wait two to three paycheck I love how u can set u a savings pod and cannot touch that money until you hit the amount that you set for that pod sooo so far so good loving current thanks didn’t waste my time

title: Never Again will I trust this service
review: I used this card for unemployment payments because they stated that I would get instant access to my payments. It’s been 4 days since the  payment was added to my account. Since then it’s been on hold because “they haven’t received the payment.” Like seriously? Why did you make it appear like it’s been added to my account. It wouldn’t bother me if it was a couple hundred dollars but this is thousands of dollars being held from me.

title: What happened to this company????
review: Does anybody know if this company still exists I’ve been with them for over two years and never had a problem and now I’m trying to close my account and get my money back and I have no one responding I cannot even call because it says my account has been locked out and this is all happened during the Covid pandemic I have not been able to get a hold of anyone since March of this year 2020 can anyone help me get my money back I don’t know what else to do???

title: Good until you try to transfer money out.
review: I like the app and it’s very helpful for me not to over spend ,however I can’t send money to my other accounts outside of this card. It lets me send money in but not out and it’s very frustrating, and it’s a limit on how much you can take out per day. It’s a good thing but as someone with bills it makes it extremely difficult

title: I’ve used them all. This is where it’s at
review: This card and the oxygen card are the only two worth anything I feel with this one FAR superior. I love it that you can pause your card so no transactions can go through. Try it. You won’t be sorry

title: Innovation
review: Current has become our favorite daily source of $$$ and daily purchases our whole house uses it,it’s user friendly gives awesome rewards and perks,we have traditional bank accounts that doesn’t do what current does....well done

title: Money and horrible customer service
review: I love that you guys have an app and you have customer service unfortunately the customer service is not good,how come I asked my account to be refreshed but now I can’t even get in or know the reason why I can’t get back in to it whoever refreshed my account needs to be fired seriously and maybe y’all should fix the number I want to talk to real ppl

title: DO NOT USE CURRENT! They don’t know how to answer back to there customers!
review: This is the worst bank to have if you want to try to contact them through email. They don’t have the phones going so if you can’t get into your account you will be waiting forever. They clearly don’t know how to answer the emails AFTER they tell you they will keep an eye out on your response. All this waiting with no answers has made me officially dislike current. And I do not recommend!

title: Refundable transactions
review: Getting your check early an all is cool but, when someone says that a transaction wasn’t authorized and they come to you about it. Don’t have the only answer you come up with be yes it was and never refund stolen money that’s just not a good look!

title: Good app for anyone online banking
review: Easy set up. Doesn’t require direct deposit payroll to deposit checks. It may take a little longer for them to clear and deposit in. But it’s worth it. The live chat support is awesome and very helpful when you need them.

title: So good so far
review: As far as the app it’s been very accurate and accessible and I can navigate it without any problems. I’ve just started using this card for all my online purchases so I will write back soon with a further review. Hope this helps.

title: Horrible Customer Service
review: I had a fraudulent charge on my card and was told it must’ve been my kid even though I know 100% it wasn’t! Was finally told they would review and get back to me and nobody ever did. I then canceled my account and removed my bank info only to be charged the yearly fee like 9 months later. Customer service again said they would review and get back in 48hr. Again, never heard back. They just tell you that to get rid of you and ignore anything ever happened. The worst!!

title: The app and customer service
review:
Difficult to navigate
I was having issues with depositing into my current account from my chase account.
The rep I chatted with couldn't explain or answer any of my questions. He kept insisting that I needed to uninstall and reinstall the app to make sure I had the latest version. The support page in the app shows what version is installed on the phone. I asked him what version I should have and he would not or could not tell me.
Keep your money elsewhere.

title: Chimes Competition
review: Ok I love two days early on getting paid I get paid Friday but now I get paid Wednesday which is awesome but I would like for current to have a secured credit card also so that I may build my credit if that’s a a plan this will be the best card around

title: Current credit card
review: I love it so far I recommend for people to get it, its easy to maintain is easy to put money on your card they have savings where you could save your own money and put your own money to the side  for a rainy day it’s actually good.

title: I like it!
review: I really like my current card and app. It’s so pretty. It’s like a prepaid card, but I specifically like the fact that it’s compatible with Apple Pay. I DON’T like that I’m not able to load it without having direct deposit or doing a bank transfer though.

title: Good
review: Like everything so far . Love the savings pod feature ! Transfers are quick ! I’ve had my deposits in a timely manner with no issues . The customer support via the app had been so helpful whenever I have asked questions.  Current has been treating me right !

title: Not faster
review: I was excited to try this out since it claimed to have a faster deposit, up to 2 days before. Unfortunately that hasn’t been the case. My employer submits payroll by Monday, 11am, & I still get deposit early Friday morning. No difference than my regular bank. I do have the premium account and it is nice to have the savings pod. Overall, not bad just don’t expect a faster deposit.

title: The best app ever
review: I love current. It’s very easy to use and it shows you how to save your money. It also shows you how much you’ve spent in a month. It’s a really great app. Would definitely recommend and it’s great for teens. Current can teach children how to save and how to prioritize.

title: Don’t use!! Steals ur money!!
review: I’ve been using current for about a month and this app is terrible there is no way it is real. It’s like it’s run by scammers. I put almost 10,000$ into this app and it all gone. I made account and put money in and when I tried to sign back in I couldn’t at all I tried contacting services and I’m on hold for hours and it will hang up. Also i had a friend that used this and a hacker stole money from him, this app is terrible and needs to be taken down immediately.
developerResponse:
{'id': 22289274, 'body': "Hi there, we're terribly sorry to hear about this & apologize for your experience with us so far. We definitely want to take a look into what's going on here & answer any questions or concerns you may have about your account. 

Please contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address associated with your account so that we can look into this. We'll keep an eye out for your email! 

Sincerely, 
Support@Current", 'modified': '2021-04-16T17:52:03Z'}

title: Amazing! Would recommend!
review: I’d recommend to anyone who was in a situation similar to mine where they don’t have all the document available to get a banking account at a local bank. Current is super easy to use and helped me get straight with saving my money!

title: Very frustrating
review: We liked this app at first, but lately all deposits are taking about five days to go through. I am asked to reverify my account every time I try to get money to my child. Customer service advised me to uninstall and reinstall the app every time, which is ridiculous and which doesn’t solve the problem. I need to know I can get money to her when she needs it. I’m going to look for a different service.
developerResponse: {'id': 19811488, 'body': "Hi there, we're sorry to hear about this and would love to take a look at the issue. Please reach out to our customer support team at reviews@current.com. Sincerely, Support@Current", 'modified': '2020-12-16T17:41:02Z'}

title: Amazing!!
review: I’m absolutely in love with this banking app! I get my paycheck 3 days early, it notifies me every time I make a transaction, and I can still access and use my money even if I don’t have my card because I have a virtual card! Highly suggest this app for anyone working with a budget!!

title: Easy to keep up with
review: I like this debit account so far. I’m a big fan of Chime which has been my primary debit card account for quite awhile but I wanted to add a different one for other reasons and I’m trying this one out and so far I like it. The app is straightforward and easy to navigate and understand which is important.

title: Unhappy
review: I’ve been using current for a while now and I usually don’t write reviews but I had some scammers still money from my account and current has yet to give me my money back..... saying that I had to wait 90 days which I don’t think is right they really need better customer service reps because there pandemic going on and that was my last 100 $

title: Overall satisfied
review: With current I’m getting my direct deposit 2 days sooner then with my other bank, it has a overdraw protection for free , and it’s so convent to transfer money to my family members now that they have current as well .

title: Snapchat
review: Every since I seen the promo on snap I wanted and knew that I’d be reliable with my every day work I deposit money onto my account constantly and don’t have to wait for your money to clear thank you this is really the best better than a bank no cap...

title: Poor customer service
review: Why do I have a spending limit?  I needed to make a purchase with my own money that was over 2,000. I was ordering a laptop for work and the transaction was declined.  Apparently I cannot not spend more than $2000 per day.  The mobile customer service person says they cannot manually approve the purchase.  So what am I supposed to do???? I won’t be a customer with you guys much longer.  This is ridiculous.

title: Amazing card
review:
This is by far the best card and account I have ever used! Modern features that are easy to set up and I’m finally saving money for important things. 

Virtual card is available instantly, the app works very well and self explanatory I love this set up so much!

title: Customer service
review: I enjoy the idea of the app but think twice before downloading. I lost my card and asked for a new one to be mailed out but it is difficult because their really is no one to speak to at the call center. Best thing to do is email the company first. I am still waiting for them to reach back to me and it has been 1 month almost 2.
developerResponse: {'id': 23313042, 'body': 'Hi there! We apologize for the inconvenience and would be happy to assist you! Please note, you can order a new card directly through the app under "card setting". If you have any more questions or need further assistance, please send us an email at reviews@current.com.', 'modified': '2021-06-10T17:32:36Z'}

title: Terrible
review: They promoted that you could use your account to get your tax return but failed to mention that you have to file separately. Now my husband and I have to wait even longer to get our money because of Current. If I could put zero stars I WOULD. People have a life and kids and bills to tend to. They are playing with my money just because my husbands name was on the return. WERE MARRIED!!!!! It’s his money too, whoever runs this app is a fool. Definitely switching to Varo after this
developerResponse: {'id': 23160091, 'body': "Hi there, thank you for leaving us a review & we're terribly sorry to hear about your experience with us. Unfortunately, we don't offer the option to open a joint account at this time which is why we were unable to accept your tax return. Any incoming deposits must be made out to the account owner's name only. We apologize for the inconvenience this has caused & take full responsibility if we failed to disclose this to you before you opened an account with us. \n\nIf you have any other questions or concerns, please contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account. ", 'modified': '2021-06-02T20:08:41Z'}

title: Almost Perfect
review: The only reason I’m giving Current 4 stars is because they don’t actually have a branch! However, before you become a member you should know that already. Not having a branch has its pros tho lol. Customer service isn’t always available these days on the app so a branch would help.

title: Simple and easy
review: No bull crap and hard to connect other accounts super easy linked up to my direct deposit easy and funds were available instantly highly recommend. Customer service is killer too

title: Awesome app
review: This is an awesome app!! Fast, early direct deposits, instant refunds, no issues at all. The only thing I don’t understand is why there’s a monthly fee to have the account. I know chime is the exact same but they’re completely free so I’ve been thinking of transferring but overall this bank hasn’t given me any issues.

title: Better than chase bank
review: Everything you would get with a chase total checking account + instant card transfers. Highly recommend if you work delivery apps for instant cash outs. With no fees. This bank comes through

title: Amazing!!
review: Current makes banking so easy and very convenient. They also have great tools to help you manage your money and build good financial habits. Me and my significant other both use Current and will continue to do so. You should too. Thank you Current!

title: It’s okay
review: I give it 5 stars because it is a little slow at getting the deposit on basic but I get that they have to make money. Now the real test comes with online purchases with pay pal let’s see if they can pass the test

title: Sorry David Dobrik
review: Not going to lie I was going to give this bank a chance after seeing David promote them but I’ve installed the app multiple times on my phone and every time I click the get started button it’s literally disabled as nothing happens so I can’t even sign up! Good luck trying to bank with a failed mobile app and on their website you can’t even log in or sign up it directs you to download the app. Super fishy but I love seeing them help people on Tik Tok, pay it forward current!

title: Good Banking
review: I’ve had no problem with the banking aspect of Current . Although when trying to reach customer service it took an entire week for someone to help me with a simple problem. There’s never an actual person you could speak to . 8/10 would recommend

title: Wow!!!
review: I must say at first I was kinda worried about trying this card out. But I must say I love it. I get paid 2 days earlier. I can also block merchants from charging my card. And I have a saving account as well. It's alot of things that can be upgraded but I still love this card ❤️🙂

title: Horrible update
review: Since the phone number update I cannot get into my bank account and customer service never emails me back. I don’t see why app developers block the use of numbers like google hangouts. And then don’t give you an ability to update your information. One is the update option can definitely help and two why are you screening numbers you don’t pay our phone bills so it’s none of your business. This is what we get for paying premium.
developerResponse: {'id': 18150703, 'body': "Hi, we're sorry for any trouble you may be experiencing. We'd be happy to see what happened with your account. Please contact us at reviews@current.com. Sincerely, Support@Current\n\n", 'modified': '2020-09-28T14:09:28Z'}

title: Concerned
review: Everytime I open the the app it blacks me out and take me back to the home screen.. how am I supposed to see my spending balance and etc ?. and it’s annoying. Also when I purchase something they don’t complete the transaction until like a day after and then when that happens I end up having a negative spending balance. I’m really finna give up.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18078720, 'body': 'Hi, can you please send us your account details along with the screenshot of the problem to reviews@current.com so that we can help you. Thank you for using our app.

Sincerely,
Support@Current

', 'modified': '2020-09-24T14:26:59Z'}

title: Good card but flaws
review: So every one heard of Dave or others that advance you pay well every si how one like Dave earnin etc do not accept current. So I’ll be switching to chime because they accept it. But most of all I do get paid two days early which is what’s good but not to be able to have a bank hooked up to Dave and advance pay when I use to on my other bank is kinda bummer

title: Mr beast is absolutely the best.
review:
I’m honestly just writing a review because I’m hoping MR BEAST sees this and gives me some money!! I’m trying to surprise my wife with an amazing birthday she’s been an amazing mom to our beautiful daughter and I want her to grow her business idea!

If MR BEAST sees this that would be amazing!!! 

Btw my wife’s birthday is in less than a week! ✊🏽✊🏽🥳

title: Love at first swipe
review: I’ve always had problems trying to run a mobile bank account smoothly. Current works like magic! I wish I could spread the love like butter 😝 I recommend current to anyone! Thier overdrive feature is flawless!!6 star review right here!

title: My Primary Bank
review: Current is hands down my primary bank. I love how quickly I receive my payments and Chime was a huge bust because they have ZERO customer service and they allowed cyber predators to steal my hard earned money over and over again.

title: I have a question
review: I already have chase for my banking and such. Would I have to cancel all my stuff which chase and get all my money off of my chase account. Or could I still have chase but have a current debit card and account?

title: I hate banks but
review: Love current. Paid the day my check is deposited, no holds on it. And the overdraft has been a life saver. Hopefully no data breaches like some other companies that lend and are starting their own checking accounts. Beware of other money lenders. Oh and no fee for the overdraft!

title: Best Internet bank!
review: Never had any problems. Paid Early like advertised. Customer service is very quick and polite. App is super user friendly. I love the options to set different savings goals. I have recommended to everyone I know and will continue to!

title: Love this card
review:
Money comes one day before pay day 
And if anything ever happened to your card you can use your phone to move your all your money to your savings account so no one can spend your money if you lot our card

title: Happy Customer
review: Thank you so much for making it easy to pay my bills. I was able to load my card at a local Walgreens near my house. Then within minutes I paid my parking violation online. I love the color of my card. Good job!!

title: This is the best mobile wallet
review: I love this app honestly, the app give you a free debit card, and you can use it like any other card, it took like 5 days for the card to come in, and you get a virtual card too, you can make saving pools, this app is my favorite compared to Venmo, and PayPal.

title: Don’t use Current
review: Current is the worst mobile bank I have ever had or used. They take crazy long to allow my check funds into my account. The customer service is terrible. It takes crazy long times to get to somebody and they only communicate through chat. There is no phone number. The customer service representatives lie to you and they took $3 out of my account for no apparent reason. Try any other options before going to Current.

title: Allowance
review: I use the application to give my grandchildren an allowance for completing their chores.  They then have their card to shop and purchase what they want or transfer it to savings.  They both really like it and it gives me insight into what they’re doing with their money.

title: AWSOME
review:
I just started banking with current and I love it. I’m able to save without touching. It tracks everything you spend making you not want to spend.. I just don’t like the fact that I don’t have a free ATM In my location but other than that. I like it. 
Help Texas out with the free ATMS PLEASE!!

title: Can’t seem to connect my bank
review: I’ve tried countless times to connect my other bank account to current but it just gives me the same message over and over and now I’m starting to worry this is just some scheme

title: Good app and convenient
review: Love this card it gets me my check a earlier then my last bank this is a great online banking!I would recommend all my friends and when I did invite them current added money on my account love current!

title: If you’re under 18, don’t bother.
review: It won’t allow you to do anything without linking a parent account. Anything. When I messaged the live chat support to delete my account they even said to have my parent contact them... i asked why and that i was the one who created the account in the first place and they literally just stopped answering. Loved the idea of Current and was excited to use it... chill out on the parental controls.

title: I just join current
review: I just current and it’s fantastic my check came 2 days early. The only problem was waiting for customer service. You wait in a queue. My experience I had a nasty people you could tell there the text but that just one guy so I wouldnt let that ruin your experience. #joincurrent

title: Current
review: Great service, awesome!! Only thing is keeping up with you account because it’s kinda much if your info change often. They security is tight so really nun that could worry you comes from them, I love the online bank app

title: ♥️♥️♥️Love This App
review: I seriously love this app, it’s the best app and card you could ever receive. And it won’t penalize you like a regular bank would. Seriously out of 1-10 it’s a 100, if recommend it to my friends and I also love how you get paid two days early 😌

title: Well done
review: First off this is a great way to get direct deposit because it comes as soon as the money is being released to current so you get it a couple of days early and their aren’t any fees everything works well

title: Great banking experience
review: Quick allows for options to save on other stores and alerts for all transactions. Unique card design always get a second glance when paying. Enjoy the vibe and sign up for current, ❤️🤞.

title: Good for teens and those who dont need to use alot of money
review: This app is amazing for teens however the speed of which money transfers and checks deposit is just rediculous. I had to wait an entire week for my check to cash where on other services like paypal, it only takes 2 days and you can get the money right away with immediate deposit.

title: Love Current!
review: This banking service is simple, convenient and fast. I’m alerted of my purchases and balance before I even walk out of the stores! It’s amazing! Plus my direct deposit came days faster! Cannot say enough great things about Current.

I loved it while I could open it... Now the only way to check my balance is to buy something so it'll give me the notification of what my balance is.. When I try to open the app all it does is sit on the log in screen with the loading symbol..... But other than that, when I was able to log on it was a nice platform..

title: Solid banking/card app
review: Everything works pretty solid, direct deposit came two days earlier than payday which is great. Card looks cool. Amount of money you can have in the basic account is great. I may even upgrade to premium soon,

title: Amazing
review: Honestly love this setup for banking, easy to use & easy to understand platform. The premium checking account is definitely worth the few extra dollars a month to have, all of its perks come in handy! Should give Current a try.

title: Need better assistance
review: We know due to COVID it’s hard but it’s also harder for us trying to get assistance an help an only having to rely on this auto message.. I’ll like if u will at lease allow phone call call for a few hours a day so we can get proper assistance.

title: Decent online checking account
review: I don’t like how you Arnent allowed to transfer money from one current user to another without first activating your current card. But other than that; I receive my direct deposits really fast

title: Lied about early deposits
review: I am highly disappointed I have seen the money in my account for almost 2 days now well if i knew that I was going to have to wait as long as it would take for a paper check I would have never signed up for the card in the first place get Netspend their guaranteed early payment and I have heard chime was too now I have to wait 3-5 business days THAT I WAS NOT TOLD WHEN I FIRST SIGNED UP highly disappointed because I could have just waited for my paper check

title: Best card ever !!
review: Wow love this card ! if you are looking for a card to get you your check faster this is the one for you it’s better than a bank card as well your able to use on with after pay and on instant cart it’s great !! 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼

title: Why you should get current
review: I love my current card because I am able to use the virtual feature until I receive my card in the mail . And have access to my money from direct deposit 🤟🏽 super cool !

title: App updated and now I can’t log back in.
review: My phone number recently changed and now, after the app logged me out, I’m unable to log into my account. In order to update my phone number, I have to tell them my last 3 transactions. I have to way to know what my last 3 transactions were as I have to access to my account statement! My card was paused and now I can’t access my money. They play these games to hold your money hostage and do not work with you.
developerResponse: {'id': 23335852, 'body': 'Hey there! We apologize for the inconvenience and would be happy to update the information on your account so you can log back in! Please shoot us an email at reviews@current.com so we can resolve this issue asap!', 'modified': '2021-06-11T20:44:13Z'}

title: Terrible
review: Don’t believe the hype of this company, I never got paid early, they can’t never help you or find out any information on your account, they don’t give you no overdraft even thought I don’t need it, they didn’t cash my mobile check the first time, and the second time I tired it took forever to hit my account, they support people are rude, this company is all hype from these fake celebrities that don’t even use this bank you do better getting chime! Trust me

title: Better than anyone else
review: I am very grateful for the control of my debit card at any time in any moment any place with almost any type of internet connection. High quality service and card durability and appearance. (Black Card User)

title: The promise of better banking is a grand promise that’s distorted with smoke and mirrors
review: 7 unique interactions with customer assistance and not once did a single issue get corrected or a solution offered. I’ve felt like a little kid being told no, until I’ve finally given up hope on this having been a viable replacement for any form of convenient banking. It’s more or less a way to avoid up front fees in the form of death by a thousand cuts.
developerResponse:
{'id': 22753819, 'body': "Hey there, thanks for leaving a review & we're sorry to hear about your experience with our customer support team. We would be more than happy to look into what went wrong during your interactions & answer any questions or concerns you may have about your account. 

Please contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account for help. We look forward to your reply!

Sincerely,
Support@Current ", 'modified': '2021-05-11T22:12:55Z'}

title: The best pre paid card
review: Great for your budgeting and letting you know what your spending your money. I have never experienced something like this before. I’m so glad I purchased this card. Nothing is out like this. I’m telling everybody I meet to join.

title: 5 stars
review: The only bad thing about this is that there’s not actual in person banks in Miami so withdrawing money is hard and I’m always having to send to a friend sir why can aten it out cash for me . But I love getting paid 2 days faster ! Super user friendly

title: Current card
review: I love my current card my check comes early you can see how much your spending you can also save my and set it up for only a certain amount be spent! I recommend this card highly I love it

title: Best Bank Service In the whole world!!
review: I got my paycheck 2 days early and the service is amazing! The Current App is very very easy to use! I recommend this to everyone who is working and getting direct deposit to switch to current banking!

title: DOWNLOAD THIS APP
review: this app is super cute I love the fact that they said 2 days early pay and actually meant it. I was a little skeptical only because I didn’t know how to maneuver around the app but now that I know how to it’s definitely a great mobile banking app 10 out of 10

title: I’ve lost thousands using this app
review: Great Idea but definitely needs work. I lost $4,000 because the check was too much but it didn’t tell me until after I had written on the check. Now there’s $4,000 I cant use. I’ve lost hundreds when my ex used my account without permission and you wouldn’t process disputes quickly. And the staff/support are very rude.

title: Thankful
review: I am thankful for this online bank for helping a fella out. My crazy life has dictated that I must use online banking. The app and features are great and easy to use . I am able to operate like a normal person because of this Account. So it’s definitely for it for me.

title: IOS 14 update
review:
I loved this app for the time that I have had it but since the new update the app no longer works. I just upgraded to premium and got my black card in the mail and now I can’t even see anything in my account because the app doesn’t work!!
Please fix this issue!!

title: Digital Banking
review: The bank itself is wonderful. My only complaint is that the digital banking (check deposits especially) is an extremely long process. My 3-5 business day wait time for my check to be deposited has now turned into 10 days. I’m still waiting.

title: Super fast
review:
Most card companies advertise they will post 2 days faster, and I’ve used several, including delayed card, I’m sorry I meant RushCard.
I just received my first CURRENT direct deposit 2 1/2 days before payday. Finally a company that keeps there word.

title: Current Banking
review: Overall this is a GOOD banking option. I have had Wells Fargo, Bank of America, First Financial, etc., and Current blows them out of the water by far! If you need an account at a bank that you can count on then this is your bank.

title: This was amazingly fast
review: I received my card in the mail. I then signed up for Direct Deposit and my money was on my card the next day. I thought it would’ve taken longer to process. I’m loving this already!!

title: Review
review: Really enjoy current. I’ve used a lot of these kind of services and this is the first I’ve found that doesn’t change me a million fees just to be able to use my own money. Overall I’m very satisfied with current!

title: Really good app
review: To be honest I didn’t think I’d use the app besides just getting my checks deposited and to tell the truth it’s helped me save a lot while showing me what I have to work on with my spending habits so I really don’t have any complaints about the app

title: 5 stars.
review: The only problem i actually had was when i couldn’t sign in because i changed my number, so i freaked out. But somehow i just logged in and i can access the account on the app now. I love it. Highly recommend 😘😘😘😘😘

title: Love it
review: I really like this online company. I’ve had a few now an this one is far the best. I’m more then happy. The only problem I don’t like is how long they take to deposit a paper check. Other than that it’s one of the best you can get.

title: Current bank review
review: I have been with current since the beginning and I’ve seen so much progress with the app and bank itself over the years I will never choose another bank!

title: Customer support
review: I use to love Current I bragged and suggested to everyone but customer service isn’t good at all my account is locked for some reason and all my money was in there and I can’t even pay my bills because no one  will contact me this has been 9 hours now

title: Worst customer service ever
review: I updated my phone number and they accepted the number when I tried to log in it then tells me they don’t accept those numbers. Then began the worst customer service in my life first if you can’t get in the app there is 0 support. They wouldn’t let me reinstall my previous number and I’m just locked out of my account no one answers me I can’t log in with my email my old or new number so my money is just stuck. STAY AWAY!!!

title: On top
review: I love them. They are always on top of things when you go to the support team they are always available 24/hours a day. And direct deposit I never have any issues. It’s always early if anything.

title: Deposit
review: I have had two deposits go in at the time they were supposed to. I deposited $500 and it’s still not in my account. I’ve contacted customer service and they asked me if I was talking about a different bank instead of current. They straight up asked if I was contacting them about a whole different bank. Then proceeded to tell me they don’t know where my deposit is even though it says it was completed. Honestly worst bank I’ve had.
developerResponse:
{'id': 21807212, 'body': "Hi there, we're sorry to hear about your experience with us! Customer service is incredibly important when it comes to mobile banking & we strive to provide every customer with a seamless & satisfactory interaction. It sounds like we've done the exact opposite here & we sincerely apologize for this. 

Deposits normally take between 1-3 business days to settle as they have to go through the ACH network. If you still need help or have any questions please contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address associated with your account. 

Sincerely, 
Support@Current", 'modified': '2021-03-23T02:02:50Z'}

title: Awesome service
review: I love current always get my checks early and on time the only thing I wish it that there was someone to talk to if you have a problem other than that I truly recommend current

title: Current
review: This card is best, especially if you don’t have a bank account! It’ll tell you that you can earn points by shopping in certain stores, free atms and you can add people to your account like your children!

title: Current-ly awful
review:
The customer support has not gotten back to my via email on when or even if they are gonna open my account. It’s been like 2 months or so and they’ve still not gotten back to me to any extent. Do not use this bank.

Edit: did they even read what I sent? I emailed customer support and they didn’t respond. What makes them thing emailing again is going to work? I would like to know when my account is going to be opened.

title: Bad bank
review: Alot of the comments say good this good this but they have t experience currents down fall. They had stolen money out of my account and all they show me was a statement but fail to be assist the situation all i wanted to do was get a drink from the store and i look in my account im negative and now i have to wait time on time just to talk to someone who’s probably not gonna fix my problem 🤦🏾2021 of to a good start so far current thanks for making banking life harder not easier

title: Great way to save
review: This is a great mobile banking app especially if your wanting to save money they offer 3 saving pods that you can transfer money to & it won’t be touched unless you transfer it out of the savings into your account!

title: Money randomly taken out of my account
review: So I’ve had this app for about a few months for my son, and at first the app was very useful.  The only problem I had with the app was it taking 5 days to send 10$.  After my son added the card to his phone a random amount of money had been taken out of his account.  I would like help to now what the money was spent on and why was it taken out
developerResponse: {'id': 19678374, 'body': "We're sorry to hear this! We'd be happy to take a look into this for you, please contact us at reviews@current.com. Thank you. Sincerely, Support@Current", 'modified': '2020-12-10T17:37:25Z'}

title: Finally A Good Bank
review: I heard about you guys from my new girlfriend. She said your bank was a great one to her, so I decided to join. Got my $1 referral reward and so did my girlfriend. I'm looking forward to getting my first check through you guys. Thanks!!

title: Awfull
review: Me and my mother where trying to delete our accounts multiple times and the app will not let us i have contacted the company a few times and they don’t respond i also accidentally ordered a card and tried to cancel it and nobody has reached back out to my mother and i.we dont want to spend money on a card we dont need or have a app we want answers to our problems and have our accounts and information all deleted of this awfull app
developerResponse: {'id': 17874980, 'body': "We apologize for the trouble you've had with the app. We'd be happy to take a look into this for you, please contact us at reviews@current.com. Thank you. Sincerely, Support@Current", 'modified': '2020-09-14T18:01:31Z'}

title: Support is terrible.
review: When trying to cancel your account, you will not hear back from Current nor will you get your money back in a timely manner. Still waiting weeks later.

title: Instantly usable digital card!
review:
I’m fairly impressed. 

It’s user friendly, has great tracking and spending features, direct deposit, and much more. 

Having an immediately usable Apple Pay ready, debit card was nice too.

title: Good card
review: Been with them for over 3 years didn’t know they had so many perks I was sleeping on them when I signed up but I’m going back to current due to the people I have now have nothing current have

title: So far it’s been good
review: I have had them about a week now so far it’s been pleasant got paycheck 2 days faster as promised and can  deposit cash at pretty much any gas station will keep this updated if thing change

title: CURRENTLY CURRENT!¡
review:
CURRENT is most definitely the best online banking I’ve ever utilized. 
Individuals who don’t know how to use online banking no worries this app is extremely helpful and most importantly useful. 
Like savings pods in which allows one to set a goal on the amount that’s desired.

title: Worlds Best Bank Company
review: I have been looking everywhere for banks for kids and when I heard about current I went ahead to sign up and I tried it out and it is the best company I’ve ever seen I would rate it 5 stars 1 million times if I could.     :)

title: Fantastic service
review: My account had unauthorized transactions and Current immediately caught it and stopped it, only financial institution I have used that actually prevented fraud. They immediately canceled my debit card and sent me a new one. Great customer service!

title: Hacked my account
review: Some hacked my account and got thousands of dollars out it the customer service man seeing them take money out and took slow to reset my account he claimed he disputed the transacting he didnt instead he got my account under review i been sent my document for everything still no response my card is lock i cant get any money or anything i am frustrated and will no longer deal with current when i get my situation resolved

title: Direct deposit
review: Using current has been such a blessing and I’ve been able to get my money before anyone else. I would recommend to this to all my family and friends

title: A fantastic banking app
review: So far I’ve been using it for a couple day and really like it, haven’t had any issues and smooth all the way around really like it and would recommend it to everyone☺️☺️

title: Deposit
review: I went to the cvs pharmacy and made my deposit. It went great. It’s easy to deposit the money and it took a few minutes for it to get on the card it’s important to keep your receipt for proof of deposit.

title: Current Bank Card
review: They are always on time with deposits and they are always available to chat. They’ve answered all of my questions according and I’m always satisfied with the end results.

title: It’s great
review: Only problem I have is that I have a unauthorized charged  to google that I tried to dispute and their is no customer service number  to talk to a actual person and the automatic messenger takes forever ever..Also it would be nice to have a joint account feature of some kind for couples or business partners....but besides that it’s okay 😒
developerResponse: {'id': 21718653, 'body': "Hi there! We're sorry to hear about that! Our phone support is limited at the moment to ensure the safety of our support agents & we apologize for the inconvenience. Please reach out to us at reviews@current.com from the email address associated with your account for help regarding the unauthorized charge! \nSincerely, \nSupport@Current", 'modified': '2021-03-18T00:53:54Z'}

title: Best bank ever
review: I’ve had traditional banks for years. I love the fact that everything is so simple and straightforward with this bank! It’s easy to use, the customer service is great, and I never have to worry about over draft fees. I’m so done with traditional banks!

title: Direct Deposit
review: I was in a bad place my truck was down and needed my check. I checked today and it was there. Six days early before Thanksgiving I recommend this card to people who can use there money early!!!

title: Current works and it’s awesome
review: I didn’t think it would work but when I heard a friend of mine that had it I wanted to see it for myself because he said he gets paid 2 days earlier and it actually worked...

title: Worth It
review: I don’t typically write reviews unless I have a horrible experience or a above and beyond experience. This card, is worth a try. I am beyond pleased, can use anywhere, no hidden fees and the app itself is highly operational and easy to navigate.

title: Nothing special
review: They don’t offer anything that any other mobile bank doesn’t offer. Infact they have less to offer than most mobile banks. I would have to pay $5 a month just to add another debit card to my account to transfer money to. You can do that on PayPal, cash app, Venmo,chime and dozens of other accounts for no charge. I only tried this because a YouTuber I like advertised it but they have nothing to offer

title: Current
review: Greatest debit card out right now. If you’re bad with money they have spending limits where they’ll lock your card when you pass them. No atm fees. And it helps you save cash fast without even noticing.

title: I highly recommend
review: Current card has been very helpful for my business. Easy way to send and pull money from my account to pay my employees the same day. I recommend everybody get them an account!

title: BEST ONLINE BANKING APP!!!!!!!
review: This app is unbelievably convenient and easy to navigate. All you money is right there for you see. They Allow you to open a checking and savings account. Only $5 a month. And no fees for transferring money within you account

title: Awesome App
review: I see ads going around about other apps like true Bill which basically tracks your expenses and everything. But this apps is a bank and does everything any other app does.

title: TERRIBLE SCAM
review: The people that write the good reviews have to be people that work for current. I needed my money for an emergency cash situation and they told me I couldn’t take my OWN money off my OWN card and that there was nothing they could do. It’s for “teen” banking when really they try to use young minds to take their money by using internet influencers. Be smart they will make sure they take their money from you but they will not help you at all in anyway possible.

title: Current card
review: I absolutely loveeee the Current card!! I get paid days before payday. The customer service is great. Everything I need all in one card. If you don’t have this card yet what are you waiting for😄

It was great at first I mean NO Fee’s who don’t love 💕 that right but then it pops up and says to receive my incoming direct deposit up to 2 days faster on my future direct deposits to upgrade an Pay $$$. I guess my father was right Nothing is completely free.

title: This app needs major improvements
review: I think chime is great but Zelle needs to be a added feature on this app I also think when adding funds to our debit cards we shouldn’t be charged a fee I also think that current needs to have their own atm machines all over the United States including a way for customers to add funds be able to transfer money to loved one through Zelle and I also think that there should be a 24hrs Custumer Service Hotline.
developerResponse:
{'id': 21404038, 'body': "Hi there, thanks for leaving a review! Although you can find any of our 55,000 in-network ATMs using the map found in the Current app, we truly appreciate the feedback that you've shared. You can also add funds to your account from any funding sources that you've linked to Current, or by receiving money through our peer-to-peer transfer system, Current Pay. 

We will be happy to share your feedback with our team as we continue to iterate and improve the products and services that we provide. Feel free to share any additional feedback with our team at reviews@current.com. 

Sincerely, 
Support@Current", 'modified': '2021-03-02T17:40:03Z'}

title: Great App
review: This has been a great app to use. The Application is very straightforward to use. It makes saving and managing money effortless. I use this with Apple Pay and have never had a problem. Over all great app would recommend to others.

title: WON’T WORK AT ALL.
review: I have deleted the app and then reinstalled it, made sure it was up to date, everything I can possibly think of. Yet still, when I open it, I simply cannot do ANYTHING with it at all. The entire screen becomes non responsive, I have also tried opening from the widget, still completely no responsive. I have important things that need to be done with my bank account, and I have no way of doing those things. Not coooooooool.

title: Great Front End Less Back End
review: Everything about the display and feel of the app seems modern and light from the card to the app, but when it comes to barebones Current lacks in Customer Service and Communication. But still will some DIY you can get what you need.

title: No.
review: The only positive I see with this bank is it’s teaching my daughter financial responsibility. However this bank has been NOTHING but issues since I opened our accounts over a year ago and the customer service is AWFUL. I’m closing the accounts. I do not think it is worth the hassle. No one ever knows what they are doing. You can’t even speak to a person “due to COVID” — but reputable companies have employees that are working from home.... smh. Just no. I DO NOT recommend!

title: The best app
review: I have been using cash app and Greendale and I’ll kinds of other prepaid card services but this is by far the best one hands-down no questions asked the best user interface the best well everything I love current app

title: Holds on deposits are ridiculous.
review: My checking  accounts I use to transfer money into Current are verified. I’ve been using these cards for my teenagers for 4 years. We have never had an issue except deposits. Money comes from the same Navy Federal checking accounts. Deposits to my son are instant. Deposits to my daughter come out of Navy Fed immediately but are unavailable in her Current account for a full 5 business days. Ridiculous.
developerResponse:
{'id': 22986788, 'body': "Hi there, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review & we're terribly sorry for the inconvenience this has caused. 

It sounds like you may have had instant deposits enabled on your account which allowed you to instantly transfer money into your account & your teen accounts. However, we can temporarily disable instant deposits if we detect unusual activity on your account. 

When the instant deposits feature has been disabled on your account, your deposits will return to the standard timeframe of 1-3 business days to settle into your account. This is because we need to get confirmation from your bank that these funds are available and have fully cleared your account.

We understand how frustrating this can be & we'd be happy to further investigate this issue or address any questions/concerns you may have. Feel free to reach us at reviews@current.com from the email address associated with your account. 

Sincerely,
Support@Current", 'modified': '2021-05-24T22:03:33Z'}

title: Fantastic
review: This app and card is a very convenient. It has everything that you would want with a debit card. Leave all the hassle behind and grasp the future of debit cards. I recommend it for anyone.

title: THE BEST!!!
review: I use current to pay my kids allowance and to be able to transfer money to them .... they are young and it’s hard to get them debit cards but with CURRENT I can transfer funds to them and control their spending LOVE IT

title: Best banking app ever
review: I started using current for about 4 months maybe a lil more but i love it never had any problems with it i received so many direct deposit like 2 days before I actually got paid its crazy

title: DO NOT USE
review: I have had this account like 2 months I’ve had 6 cards sent to me and none of them can be used. My account is hacked and they don’t do anything to help. It takes 5 days for mobile deposit and an extra day to transfer funds. It’s garbage. I have already started the process to clear my account and close it.  PLEASE DO NOT MAKE THE SAME MISTAKE I MADE. DO NOT TRUST OR USE THIS COMPANY FOR YOUR FINANCES. Also had the kid card for 1 month was charged $35 and can’t use the account and can’t get a refund. RUN PEOPLE RUN!!!

title: Do not sign up
review: Doesn’t let you do anything with out actual card only allowed to make store purchases unable to send money unable to use Apple Pay can’t even use current pay and this is a current account toooooo many inconveniencing errors and messages when an emergency can only make online purchases and in store purchases I DO NOT RECOMMEND CURRENT CARD TAKES TWO WEEKS TO COME I HAD MY DIRECT DEPOSIT COME TO CURRENT ACCOUNT AND UNABLE TO ACCESS MY FUNDS ISSA NO FOR ME will never use current again !!!!!

title: Love It!!
review: I love the fact that if I don’t know where my card is I can pause it so it can be used by someone else but still able to use my money on a virtual card so I can still make my everyday purchases

title: Good back up
review: Current is very nice to use.. only thing is there no way to get your money off or spend your money if you lose the card you would have to wait until another comes... unless you transfer the money over.

title: Amazing!!
review: I’ve had current for about a month now. And it’s so awesome. I highly recommend this app, if your using it for money to spend and whatever else you wanna do with it .. again , a really good online bank

title: Current premium the best!
review: I love it! Not only the premium let’s me get my check two days early & I get notifications what’s been took out my account & available balance! I love it ❤️❤️❤️ and we can add cash on card now super excited!

title: Easy Secure
review: I love Current, it’s been so easy to access my account and make changes as needed. Very convenient. I’ve never had an issue with them since my switch and my only regret is that I hadn’t done it sooner! Thank you Current !

title: I LOVE THIS CARD
review: For so long I’ve tried many prepaid cards that cashapp does not accept and Current allows me to transfer funds from my cashapp account. You can use it anywhere just like a bank card. I recommend this card.

title: Great banking app and outstanding service
review: I had a problem with changing my number but I contacted support and it was handled quickly and professionally and I was able to login the same day! Great. Customer service in my opinion

title: The best little banking
review: Okay so I couldn’t log into my account and they fixed that issue for me you guys are the best I do wish u guys had a contact number instead of a email but you guys still are the best thank you

title: Current and Mr. Beast!! Thank you!
review: Thank you so much for everything today in setting me up. This was absolutely the easiest process I have ever gone through. I hope to move everything over to current:)

title: Super fast direct deposit!!
review: Normally my deposit arrives at 11pm with my previous bank but with current my deposit arrived at 5pm!!! Although both send deposit 2 days early current sent it even sooner!!

title: Best so far
review: Current has the best bank app. I’m so happy that I switched from Netspend to current I feel like I have more control over my money then I did. Customer service is so helpful as well keep it up current!

title: I am mind blown
review: I can’t believe how quickly I opened an account lol. Banks really do make things way to complicated. Plus the features are unmatched. I haven’t used any other online banks yet but thanks to Current I’m now a fan of them.

title: Trash
review: This service is terrible and they lie to you and hold your money until sometimes the next day in the morning. It starts off consistent and becomes unreliable and you won’t know what time you will receive your check. I suggest you use a secured bank only use this service if you really need it. Otherwise they play with your money until they are ready to give it to you.
developerResponse: {'id': 21718733, 'body': "Hi there. We're sorry to hear about your experience with us & we apologize for any inconvenience we've caused. Customer feedback is important to us as we continue to grow & improve the products & services we offer. Feel free to reach out to us at reviews@current.com if you have additional feedback or if you need help with your account! \nSincerely, \nSupport@Current", 'modified': '2021-03-18T01:00:57Z'}

title: Locked out with no help
review: I’ve been locked out of my account for a week all because I got a new phone number. The customer service number doesn’t direct you to a human and no one is responding to my email. My paycheck came in and I can’t even access my account . There is a global pandemic this is not the time to provide subpar customer service. I’m moving my money and direct deposit back to my other bank because this is ridiculous.

title: Wonderful Card
review: I love current I have had small issues but they took care of that in no time. Only issue is that there are no live customer service reps other than that good card!

title: Review
review: Current is great it’s even better then I thought it would be customer service is quick and fast and helps you with everything you need and want to know

title: Terrible
review: I’ve ordered a Current Card Months ago... it said you card should come with in 1-2 weeks.. I was willing to be lenient because of COVID-19 but now it has been around 4-5 Months..... I spent 37 dollars on this card... And still didn’t get it..Now I am waiting for a card that I will never get💢😡...Also I tried to get in contact with the and they just said “this card will come in 2/4 business weeks” I am disappointed and want my money back

title: Awesome
review: Current is such a good way to have money saved, or direct deposited which I’m starting to do starting today & enjoying the different things you can do with current like over draft till payday.

title: Won't let you talk to customer service
review: They are holding my money and will not let me speak with anyone at the store don't ever use this app they have no way to contact them you have to be at there mercy as to when you get a call back they are holding my money and will not give me access to it this is a scam app it's terrible I wouldn't wish this on my worst enemy please for the love of God don't use this app it is pure garbage if I could rate zero starts I would

title: It’s okay
review: It’s a decent bank app for a teenager or a child. To access real features you have to pay with doesn’t separate it from the big banks. In addition to that you’d probably be better off with cash app or chime. It’s faster and easier to move money. Current has no mobile check deposit service. But in the end like I said it is what it is.......and that’s a good beginner bank

title: HORRIBLE DO NOT USE!!!!
review: Current is not a secure bank. Do not open an account with them. $200 were stolen out of my account via the virtual card. I filed a dispute with them last month and I still haven’t received any money. This is the worse bank EVER. I’d also like to add that whilst this is going on. You can only reach them via email or the support chat room within the app. If you want to talk to them via phone... it’s not happening. A lawsuit should be coming soon.

title: Great banking
review: Needed a card for a deposit on a hotel room and I forgot I had signed up for current and it was super easy to transfer money in the moment and used my card for the deposit.

title: Quick
review: Really great! So far I’ve only recently started loading money but it’s been pretty instant that it shows into my account. An I’ve been getting complaints on the card.

title: Current is terrible
review: I had $200 stolen out of my account so I called customer service and guess what no response they said someone would get back to me within 24 hours it’s been over a week and I still haven’t heard from anyone and then I’ve never been able to do the $100 overdraft either this is bull because someone literally stole money from me and I can’t get it back because I can’t get in contact with anyone
developerResponse: {'id': 23140534, 'body': "Hi there, we're sorry to hear about your experience with us & we would be more than happy to look into this for you. Please contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account & let us know if you have any other questions or concerns! \n\nWe look forward to hearing from you soon!", 'modified': '2021-06-02T01:35:55Z'}

title: Good until now..
review: I loved using my current card but I decided to do direct deposit and get the new current card but now on the app I can’t even access my account because there’s no login option, only registering and no longer a sign in option. Can’t even find another way around it.

title: Great service
review: I’ve had no problems, love everything about this app and the current card is so cute lol . Love getting paid 2 days early and getting stimulus and taxes 5 days faster !!!! Definitely recommend!!

title: Best card hands down
review: Current give you all types of choices and options to choose that allows you to have your card setup the way you want it

title: Just like the majority of reviews...
review:
Support is absolute garbage. Everything they say is so scripted, deciphering a human from a bot is impossible. 

Aside from that, I loved the app & the savings pod features. Overdrive is a LIE!! DISREGARD this app if the Overdrive feature is why you are thinking of paying for the premium. 

My rating is a solid 1 star, due to how highly they promote themselves to be, compared to how poorly they operate. Support was seriously the worst, you'll spend less time on google i promise.

title: Wouldn’t let me request money
review: Wouldn’t let me request money from someone because i needed to activate my card but the card doesn’t deliver to me until 2 weeks (i just downloaded the app last night) personally, i need to do my business asap, i can’t wait 2 weeks for the card in order for me to do what i need to do. They need to let the user know beforehand so that they don’t waste people’s time and so people don’t rate them 1 star

title: Informative customer service
review: Customer service representatives are very informative regarding whatever I have a issue with. They guide and assist me until I fully understand them. So far new and my 16 year old daughter is really loving Current!😊

title: Best Account Ever
review: This is the best account and card to have! Especially if you have children it helps monitor their spending and teaches them about spending and saving! If you don’t have one get one and see for yourself!

title: Easiest banking app I’ve tried
review: Getting a new account set up was a a quick and seamless process, and using the app to pay has been really easy and intuitive. Highly recommend.

title: Current Situation
review: I love this new card I receive my deposits earlier than everyone else and I get a dollar for everyone of my friends who signs up. That’s pretty cool in my book. I just hope they get more ATM’s in my area. The fees are killing me!

title: Best bank ever
review: I was having problem with my bank so I switched to current it’s the beat mobile bank out there I got my direct deposit 2 days early I think if I could I would marry this card

title: Glitches
review: My dad , brother and I used the app for chores and etc . When we make a purchase to fast it seems to glitch current resulting in it not deducting the money giving us a false amount making it hard to know how much money we actually have usually ending in us in the negatives . Is there a way to fix this?

title: Transferring money to a different account
review: I love that you can move money from different banks to the current account. I don’t have to withdraw cash and then deposit it I can just transfer it over. I love that!

title: Current is trash
review: Today I got logged out of my account and literally could not get back in to save my life it just thought I was trying to sign up again and that was certainly not this case, I go to try and talk to someone about it but their customer service line is basically useless for something like this.. so after a year I have decided that this bank is not worth everything they say it is..
developerResponse: {'id': 23313119, 'body': 'Hi there! We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and would be happy to assist you further and update the info on your account to have this issue resolved asap! Please send us an email at reviews@current.com. Thanks!', 'modified': '2021-06-10T17:38:51Z'}

title: Current user for many years
review: I love current they are the best never ever had a problem with my funds never had to call them for anything thanks for protecting my money current

title: Been with Current for 2 year!
review: Current is the best! I just set-up my account with Current and it was so easy and smooth. I literally got my direct deposit two days earlier! I’m current customer for life!
developerResponse:
{'id': 16172777, 'body': 'We are pleased that you enjoyed the app. If there is anything we can do for you, just let us know at reviews@current.com! 

Sincerely, 
Support@Current

', 'modified': '2020-06-23T14:26:42Z'}

title: ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE
review: First off I’ve had Current for about a year and then all of a sudden I didn’t have money in my account for two weeks then they decided to CLOSE MY ACCOUNT FOR NO REASON. It’s a shame I was expecting money the week they closed my account. Reached out multiple times, sent them emails and they responded with a generic reason why they closed my account. I’m very disappointed I actually liked them when I had the account. Never again.

title: Love Current ❕
review: Been with them for about 5 or 6 months && I always receive my deposits early && at a decent time! Just know that they do deposits on the holidays it just comes later than usual!

title: Convenient
review: I like current because it keeps me intact with what I’m spending on a daily basis and alerts me on everything I spend on I like the fact I’m able to see my daily spending or as to say what I’m spending

title: Horrible .
review: They will make you pay 20$!!! For an expedited card that will take 5-7 business days! What the heck is a matter with you guys. I have yet to receive my card . This app is ridiculous. I am late in my rent and cannot pay it due to this app not having A single support to withdrawal or even send funds out immediately. I cannot wait to get my card so I can cancel this account.  The one star I rated I wish I could take it away.

title: Love This App!! Very user friendly
review: Card came super fast. Was able to add money easily using Venmo instead of bank transfer. Referee my friends and family hope it stays working as well for my direct deposit:)

title: So far
review: I got my direct deposit early that’s a plus and I don’t have my card yet but I’m still able to spend that’s also a plus,I really want this overdraft thing too work so far it hasn’t

title: Love Current ‼️
review: Love it best card I have so far I can easily transfer money back and forth and I love when im in need of money I can overdraft up to $100 with no fees it’s definitely a card I would recommend to any one definitely ‼️

title: DO NOT USE THIS BANK ACCOUNT!!!!
review: I got an insurance check in the mail for the damages to my vehicle from an accident and when I tried to deposit the check it got rejected and they were not able to tell me why. This bank is so low grade and does not care about their customers. How does a check from Progressive a billion dollar company get rejected. I’m convinced they just dont know what they’re doing and I would not recommend this bank.

title: George 2.0
review: Great card. Allows you to go over and I get my direct deposit at least 2 days early. I also like the fact that you can cut your card off and on from the app for security purposes.

title: Are you kidding me
review: I’m giving three stars due to the fact that you can’t log back in when it logs you out and customer support doesn’t answer in a timely matter. The get started ain’t good enough and have tried to log in but send me to support and there not very helpful when they ignore your requests

title: Current is AWFUL
review: I have had current for almost 2 years now. The customer service is terrible! I’ve been locked out of my account for over 24 hours with no way to login because I have a new phone number! I can’t use the login credentials I created to login with which to me is stupid and inconvenient! Now I have to wait on an email response from current which can take up to 72 hours. Definitely the WORST!
developerResponse: {'id': 23335723, 'body': "Hey there, we apologize for the issue you've experienced logging in to your account! We would be happy to update the information on your account and swiftly resolve this issue! Please shoot us an email at reviews@current.com for further assistance. ", 'modified': '2021-06-11T20:30:40Z'}

title: So Far So Great
review: I haven’t had the app long, but so far I love it. While waiting on my card to come in the mail they gave me a temporary one that you can actually go to common retail stores and load money onto and use !

title: Issues with atm finder
review: It’s a very amazing app don’t get me wrong but the only problem I have is trying it have access to the atm finder in the current app I would appreciate if current can fix this Thanks

title: Current
review: I like the card I just wish the money would be available being that it’s coming from my own checking account

title: excellent
review: It’s been one of the most important things in my life to be able to bank again and current is by far one of the easiest ways to do it

title: Dispute
review: I really liked this bank but I had a dispute and it took forever to get anything information just for them to close it and not contact me after we trying to figure out why I couldn’t get my money back from a week straight. I’ve called, emailed and talked to customer service and nothing.

title: Worst banking experience you will ever experience
review: II’ve been locked out of my account for two weeks with no access to my funds and impossible to talk to anyone if you have an issue everything through email and takes a very long time for them to get back to you for them to just keep telling me the same thing over and over and nothing gets done the worst bank you could ever use

title: I like it but
review: I like where you can getYour paycheck two days earlier but I’ve been a customer since July 2020 and I’ve only been able to overdraw $25 when it says I can overdraw up to $100 that’s only thing and I do have the premium where I pay $4.99 month to do that , buy everything else it’s OK and it works fine

title: Deposit
review: I’m a Current Member, this is my first time using this, I was nervous when it was said “Pending” even though it takes up 5 business days to go into the account! But I love this! Starting on here to save!!

title: Not satisfied
review: I had to dispute charges on my account. I was not made aware that there was a form that needed to be filled out in order to process the claim. When I brought it up to the representative, I just kept being told to “make sure I have the most updated version of the app.” At this point I just want to tell them to cancel the dispute and close my account with them.

title: Great
review: Wish they would make a way you can load your own cash onto the card and possibly a way to freeze or close your account there the app for quicker connivence, the 24 hour chat is very helpful tho if you ever have questions

title: Great Bank
review: I’ve had many banks with online features but none with this user friendly dashboard. If you are looking for an easy to use, fun, and interactive bank. Current is the one for you!

title: Current
review: Current is very good for teens and parents it’s acts like a joint bank. I have nothing bad to say about the app it’s easy to use easy access to everything. Customer service is ok but that can be fixed.👍🏾

title: 💡 THE SOLUTION IVE BEEN LOOKING FOR!
review: For some time I’ve been hoping to find a way to give my tweenagers cards of their own. To eliminate their need to carry cash around, and to be able to somewhat monitor their spending as they grow to become financially independent. THIS IS IT!! ☀️🙏🏾 THANKS CURRENT!

title: Current
review: This is great I absolutely love it I got paid 2 days early and I get a  charge free overdraft I also know exactly where my money goes I get alerts every time my card is used and it works with Apple Pay

title: Basically no customer service
review:
Good concept, but could not get the app to work on my teen’s phone, so he could not check the balance or use any other features. When loading the app, it said that his phone number was already used for a Current account…and then offered no further prompts.  

Customer service just pointed me to faqs on the website, then stopped responding after numerous follow up attempts.
developerResponse:
{'id': 22986800, 'body': "Hi there, we're terribly sorry to hear about your experience with our customer support team & we would be more than happy to look into what's going on here. Please contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account & let us know if you have any questions or concerns. 

We look forward to hearing from you soon!

Sincerely,
Support@Current", 'modified': '2021-05-24T22:05:54Z'}

title: WATCH FOR SCAMMERS
review: I love this app. I get my money early. But I’ve been premium for years get money direct deposit and a good amount. But have never got overdraft protection!!!!!!! This is a big issue for me. This bank is also not up for expirian credit reporting that’s an issue. And a lot of scammers are on Facebook posing as current bank trying to hack your account.
developerResponse:
{'id': 21571812, 'body': "We appreciate the feedback that you've shared! Overdrive qualifications are dependent on factors in addition to the amount you receive via Direct Deposit, like your account history and activity. 

Please do not share any account information with anyone you don’t know or trust. We will never reach out to you and ask you to provide us with your login details or any verification codes sent via text message, during a phone call or via social media private messages. These verification codes are meant for you to access your account on your own device only. If you’re ever contacted by someone using a variation of this name, please refrain from giving out information or engaging in a conversation. 

Sincerely, 
Support@Current", 'modified': '2021-03-10T16:46:44Z'}

title: STAY AWAY!!!!!!
review: This app was cool at first until I found out that if you don’t use their so called “free” atm. It’s going to charge you $6 to take money off. On top of that, they free atm ALWAYS don’t work. One time I withdrew $40 using their “free” atm to avoid paying $6. The atm took my $40 but NEVER dispense it to me. I put in a dispute well over 6 months ago to get my money. For 6months!!! All they tell me is “we’re looking into” that’s it! Yet to this day have I gotten my $40. PLEASE STAY AWAY FROM THIS CARD!!!!!

title: Current is AWESOME
review:
I love Current!!!! 
It’s easy to use, very convenient and so much more exciting for my kids being able to use their own debit cards and make purchases.... although I have full control 🤣!!!

Thanks !!!!

title: Awful
review: Terrible customer service. They’re incompetent and rude and they’re only available through text. The fact that they advertise “no hidden fees” but charge $3.50 to deposit any quantity of money is misleading more so when they don’t specify it on the card agreement. Overall I don’t recommend this at all. This is good if you have literally no other option available. Discover is far way better with debit and savings.

title: Review
review: I love this card , the only thing is it’s hard to get in contact with the people from the bank when you have questions or any problems!

title: Direct Deposit
