review: Omg...this is my first time using Current and I’m in love with it already. My direct deposit came faster than any debit card I’ve ever used. Don’t plan on going anywhere no time soon. My new way of banking.

title: Check
review: Other then my check from work not being able to be verified no problems. Somehow it was from work with that I was told from current app workers.

title: A new way to back with ease
review:
Login credentials are safe the app brings a lot of kool features that accommodate by daily banking needs. The card is not cheap and very nice design. Security features and fast deposits my type of virtual banking. 

Thanks and best of luck

title: Fix your log in process
review: Wish I could give a half of star because when I switch phone and kept the same number current will not let me log in but when I tried to swipe my card because of a large purchase current sent a notification to the old phone with no number instead of my new phone that has the same number I use to log into my account

title: Best foot forward
review: So far I’m astonished by the  way y’all think of your customers best interests I can tell from the level of self respect that y’all have for y’all selves in putting this business together I’m in a nice atmosphere with current

title: Very nice so far
review: The only issue I’ve seen so far about this app is that there are no FAQs when I try too look at them. Which isn’t a big deal since they do have a live chat option. The app has a good layout and is aesthetically pleasing to look at at.

title: Great Account
review: Money comes on time. Alerts you with a text when your money hits the card and has it perks when spend money using your card meaning you get rewarded.

title: Current Helped A lot !
review: I was having trouble opening a bank account, no one would accept me. Not only did current approve banking with them is easy and simple

title: Deposit 5 days EARLY
review: We had an amazing experience with our finances coming on direct deposit card in the midst of a crisis that saved us financially in a tremendous way.... That’s some much “Current “ for being #CurrentlyONit!!

title: I. Love. This. Bank.
review: The simplicity and features are absolutely amazing. Having a virtual card I can use even after losing my card is extremely useful. Couldn’t say more about how great it is

title: Best Bank Account
review: I love it ! I get paid Friday but with my CURRENT BANK. I get paid Wednesday . I get my full amount not half and also i can check everything with no problem and my card is nice and different .

title: This is so dumb, don’t use it
review: I was excited to get this and start using, I put in all my info and they were going to review it, a few minutes later I get an email saying they won’t be able to open an account with me!!! No explanation of why not or if I entered somthing wrong, which I didnt, but they didn’t tell me why and they said they weren’t going to disclose further details. Don’t get this, it’s unreliable and a waste of my time.

title: Wonderful App with Small Flaws
review:
The app does a stellar job at providing many means of banking.

 Having a manual option to enter the current location would be best whenever one wishes to turn off Location Services.

Pretty amazing concept overall!

title: Charli d’amelio
review: Omg I’m so in love with this I’m very happy with this app I rate this a 10/10 I’m glad I’ve used this card! Because I have so much money on this thank you so much and I think more people should use this app good luck keep up the good work:)!☺️

title: Worse card ever
review: It was fine for a while till someone got my information and bought some items...I called and hoped someone will help me. Will I had $108 in the account. This guy that was an employee took everything and sent my money to someone else. So I ended with nothing. I was not able to buy food or pampers for my kids. If you have this card just keep in mind your money is going to be taken away!!!!!

title: Gets job done
review: Very great app and all I love how they make easy. However I just wish they were more specific on how they claim their premium membership lets you overdraft up to $100 with no fee, I’ve been stuck on $25 max for the longest and they haven’t even increased my overdraft limit to 50 yet, other than that it’s great

title: Worst debit card service EVER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
review: THE ABSOLUTE WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE. My phone was stolen a month ago and I’ve been trying to get my email and phone number updated so I could activate my card and I get even get a response in my email. They tell you to call the customer service number just for you to get a automated message that says “Please chat with us in the app and your calls will be disconnected at this time” YOU CANT CHAT IN THE APP UNLESS YOU CAN SIGN IN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Please fix this.
developerResponse: {'id': 19653516, 'body': "Hi, sorry to hear that! Could you write to us at reviews@current.com? We'd love to help you troubleshoot. Sincerely, Support@Current", 'modified': '2020-12-09T18:27:32Z'}

title: Great
review: This card is so great it shows your monthly expenses your goals this month and if you’re a teen you can set up with your parents It can give you allowance set schedules for when you get paid oh my God I love it

title: My name is Jahvon Lassiter
review: Current is a good bank to have, you get paid faster and you can overdraft on your account.. I thought it was $100 but I only get $25 in my overdraft account is there someway I can get $100?

title: Online banking
review: This is the best online banking ever. Get checking and savings and budgeting tool. You can add teen accountsAs well as deposit cash at places that participate near you as well as deposit check with photo and so much more

title: Good app but wish I could delete my account
review: I mess up my account any would really like if current had the thing where u could delete your account and get a new card

title: 10-Oct
review: The app is so easy to understand and I love how I can get help without having to call a number I can just text on the app and they explain everything so well

title: Great Card
review:
I had this card going on two years now and I love it I  been to different states with it and it worked fine
Direct deposit at least 2 days faster

title: They don’t care about the customers and the app does not work
review: You get your money quick but that’s it I cannot get into my app now and customer always says they can’t help do anything and they don’t care what if you can’t get your money u will be waiting for months if you have a problem with your account they don’t care about the customers when they need help and no one speaks English I suggest go2 bank

title: My current card
review: I love the card I get paid two days earlier, but the only problem I have the current card, is that it won’t let me use it on cash app.

title: Awesome card!
review: This is by far the best card I have ever had. I get paid five days early. The overdraft fee doesn’t exist if you keep it within your limit. I recommend this card completely!

title: I love It
review: I love I get my paycheck 2 days earlier than I normally would and just in case I need it for gas Money, Lunch or whatever the case may be I can over draw my account Starting at $25 without a Fee.

title: It’s good
review: My first direct deposit came one day early so far it’s Been a good experience and I have yet to experience any problems as of now but unable to link it to my other accounts

title: Pals til the end!!
review: I’ve never been with an app so committed to ME! This app is amazing! Not only they offer me $25 overdraft, they help me budget my money & save whatever I can. I recommend this app to anyone with or without a job. I get my money 1/2 a day early.

title: Half to upgrade to get paid 2 days
review: Although they will tell you Wednesday night how much your check will be but you won’t actually get paid until Friday morning 6am-7am

title: Current Keeps Getting Better
review: After using Current I’m very impressed with the features it has.  Reloading cash is very easy and it’s posted real time.  Try it out you will like it.

title: Review
review: I just wanna thank you guys for everything and always making sure my money stays right I really appreciate it I’ve never had a good experience with the bank till I came across CURRENT #Teamcurrentallday!!!

title: Great app
review: This card is great! I can keep track of everything my daughters buy. I can also keep track of allowance. It helps them manage their money and realize the cost of things. It’s a great piece of mind app.

title: The Best!
review:
Im very satisfied. My direct deposit it is always 2 days before the date!! It is awesome! Im from Puerto Rico, and even in here, they have partners banks where i can have access to my funds without $ 0 fees.
Simply awesome!
Thanks a lot!
please guys dont change ever!

title: Amazing card
review: I love this card already I’ve had it about two months and it’s so much better then a lot I connected it to my Venmo account and I don’t have any problems with it thank you!

title: Best bank ever
review: I had got a new phone number and I was locked out of my bank account I emailed the current bank team and they solved my situation so quick it was like nothing never happened

title: The best
review: Love this bank app because everything goes smoothly I get everything right away my direct deposits are five days early don’t don’t get no better than that

title: Current Rocks!
review: So far it has been a great experience from the start. Easy to set up account, received debt card within days and easy use of the app. Plus I got a whopping dollar from Mr. Beast! Thank you kind sir.

title: Current
review: Great app/bank. Only knock off about current is that it’s hard to talk to someone on the phone. Customer service still get back with you in a timely manner.

title: Current
review: Love it!! I give it a A +++ Everyone should get a current account. I've been with them for a few years and it keeps growing and I've never had any problems.

title: Great app
review: The app works well and I easily manage and monitor my child’s spending. I would have given it a 5 star rating if it didn’t take so long to unlock instant deposit. Transfers from outside bank takes too long to go through.

title: This app is sooo useful and easy
review: I just got my premium card and is veryyy useful. I love the process to getting the card it’s super easy to set up and start using it right away, I have no problems on these sides

title: Actually satisfied
review: Deposits arrive early, all the percs they advertise are actually legit. I’ve only had the card for a week and I plan on making this my go to card. I highly recommend it.

title: Current
review: I honestly recommend to get the current app it’s very easy and it’s everything get payed two days before it’s awesome and the card comes quick easy to put money on. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND IT!!

title: I love this card
review: It reminds me of cash app I love how you can transfer money back and forth and to others with the same card and use the money instantly my new favorite card

title: Amazing 🤘🏽
review: Have to say this is better than any other bank or pay pal. I receive my direct deposit two days early👏🏼 thank you current for the amazing service!

title: Scam
review: Go to Instagram and follow currentisascamm if you’d like to see how these people are scamming and stealing from thousands of people all while purposely not have a costumer service so you aren’t able to complain. I tried to have a someone transaction verified by then but they said no as they are lazy and This company is just trying to sell your information please do not use this bank they are lazy and will steal from you.

title: Henrykane
review: This is one of the best apps for banking digitally and u can count on them helping you save and not to much over drafting my fav no overdraft fee that’s like one of the best card features I could of ask for

title: I love it!!!
review: Not only is one of the members Jimmy from Mr beast a genuine great guy and probably one of the most generous human beings on the planet this banking app is outstanding and so easy to use. Not only are you supporting a great buisness owner but your actually getting a great product as well!

title: Efficiency is 🔑
review: Absolutely the most easy and proficient banking app I’ve ever used. I received my direct deposit 2 days faster and never experienced that customer service with any large banking corporation.

title: Awesome
review: I absolutely love my current card/account. Super convenient, lots of bonuses like faster direct deposit, gas savings, fee free atms etc. i’ve had my account for alittle over 4yrs and dont plan on using any other .

title: Horrible card
review: Stay away from them you can never speak to a live person only chat with a bot you never get issues resolved with the chat couldn’t gets direct deposit issue resolved repeatedly messaged regarding sending back to the payor for them to issue payment another was they only kept rejecting it I would do ace flare before I recommend this card to any one please stay away
developerResponse:
{'id': 22154994, 'body': "Hi there, we're sorry to hear about this & want to apologize for your experiences with our support team. Our phone support is limited at the moment to ensure the safety of our agents & we apologize for the inconvenience this has caused. Rest assured, we're working on a solution that works for both our Current members & customer support agents. 

Please reach out to us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account so that we can look into what went wrong here & let us know if you have any questions or concerns. 

Sincerely, 
Support@Current", 'modified': '2021-04-09T19:07:33Z'}

title: Love it but
review: Card is great only thing I would change is the spending limit and atm limit of 500$ and the fact that you can’t get anyone on the phone when you do have any kind of problem

title: Current is pretty cool
review: I enjoy the ease of current also the ease of connecting to money transfer apps. It works with instant transfer which a lot of prepaid cards don’t. I give current 5starsxl

title: Great App and Company
review: I have nothing but good things to say about Current they always got my back and have never done me wrong, I hope it stays that way but so far outstanding service🙏🏼

title: Need Help logging Back In
review: I no longer have access to the number associated with my account but i still have the email and its not allowing me to log into the app need help asap !!!!!!

title: Great way to start off
review: I love the way this app is set up! It’s great for those who want a bank account without the preliminaries! Even tho i have main bank accounts i like this one. It more manageable!

title: Fast and easy.
review: This bank was so fast and easy for me to pick up. Getting around the app goes smoothly and you ear points at certain stores. Saving money while spending it? Yess please!!

title: Great
review: Current is freaking awesome it tells me  every time I need and want to kno where it’s what I spent and my balance it also tell notify me about my direct deposit and helps me save at my own convenience

title: Visa
review: I love that it connects with your bank account so if you forget your bank credit card at home or have to  share with your partner etc, current is a back up for me 😍🥳

title: App doesn’t work
review: It’s super glitchy. It was fine for about a month and now it freezes and I can’t access it any other Way. They should allow you to login via web- I have the newest iPhone and everything’s updated. Cant chat with them without the app working, either. Liked the account and getting paid faster, but too bad I can’t even see the amount in my account.
developerResponse: {'id': 19811469, 'body': "Hi there, we're sorry to hear this and would be happy to look into the issue that you're experiencing. Please contact us at reviews@current.com. Sincerely, Support@Current\n", 'modified': '2020-12-16T17:39:17Z'}

title: Wow
review: This Card is one of the very few prepaid cards that register as an actual bank account so you can do things like a normal account such as instant deposits and whatnot. Most prepaid cards can’t.

title: Early deposit
review: Got my check early like they promised. It’s great service so far, I love the virtual card I’m able to use it with Apple Pay before my card arrives plus I can use it at the train station. I love it.

title: Very bad.
review: I put money on my card and all of the sudden I’m getting money taken out from different things that I never purchased or authorized. I messaged customer service and they couldn’t help me. It’s not a safe thing honestly. I haven’t even used it, I put $100 it went down to$91 then to $80 the charges were from google. How if no one had the information of the card. Very upset.

title: Great app
review: My check comes early thru direct deposit and it gives u a 2,000 daily spending limit which isn’t bad at all. I can transfer money easily to my sons account. Thanx current.

title: Great app
review: I got the card within 2 weeks signed up for unemployment direct deposit got the money fast thank you current it’s easy to use and lovely user interface

title: Outstanding!!
review: I’ve moved around a lot in my life and have opened and closed accounts at multiple banks .. I really love the accessibility, style and ease of having a virtual banking account with Current! 2 👍🏾 Way up!

title: Current Fan 🙃
review: True to their word! Paid at least 2 days in advance! Last pay period I got paid 3 days early! Really easy to use and send money to other people. Really love Current!

title: They finally did it
review: After constantly going back and forth about a pending charge that shouldn’t have been on my acct, they finally fixed it

title: Great app good with adding money to my account so easy
review: I love how easy it is to add money and earn points to get money added back on my account would definitely recommend downloading it

title: They were ok
review: I really liked this bank until they took away my Overdrive, in which was only $25 overdraft protection, but still that came in handy every bow and then.. I haven’t got rid of them, however I am just waiting for another bank to catch my eye and I will be moving on... thank you
developerResponse:
{'id': 22921618, 'body': "Hi there, we're sorry to hear about this & we'd be happy to look into what's going on here. Once a user has qualified for Overdrive, the feature isn't disabled unless they've specifically requested we disable it for them. If you didn't request to have Overdrive disabled on your account, please contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account. 

Let us know if you have any other questions or concerns & we look forward to your response!

Sincerely,
Support@Current", 'modified': '2021-05-20T17:21:13Z'}

title: Great app
review: I love using current for purchases because it helps to not have monthly bills going to a card that I use only for purchases. Great app for saving money and love the design of the card!

title: The best
review: Always the best always have gotten my stimulus and tax refund super fast and also when I get paid it comes early as well I appreciate this app and the people working behind it thanks ✊🏾🙏🏾

title: Best Banking
review: Incredibly easy to set up and even easier to use! Really helped me get set up after having previous bad bank experiences. This way super easy and convenient!

title: Very Convenient
review: I love current card I never seen anything like it very convenient and helps you earn points for cash back and many more

title: Current card
review: I love my new current card it tells me right away when money has been spent and I love that money can be added on it no matter what store it is

title: BETTER THAN CHIME🤩
review: I was in need of a good card I can add money to plus receive points and free overdraft! I was denied for a Chime card due to stolen identity, so I decided to try this CURRENT card that I hear about in a whisper! Gotta try them!! They are easy and faster deposits and  trust me I have tried a few! KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK GUYS

title: I like current but I got logged out of my card and couldn’t log back in
review: I traveled and my phone was off so I had to reconnect the wifi and current logged me out my account so I couldn’t see the balance I had in my card

title: Great app!
review: Current is a great app I can link my venmo, cashapp, PayPal, google pay, etc. and it works absolutely fine with direct deposit and the free atms are great with the cheap $3.25 fee when deposit money, so a $5 minimum when depositing money

title: Awesome!
review: I can use current Apple Pay anywhere in the US. Just hope they’ll let me overdraft 20 bucks as well on a hurry type of deal but otherwise it’s by so far the best card issuer I’ve owned!

title: Fastest money deposit
review: This bank got my direct deposit the faster than the other cards I had. And it also tells you the time your deposit hits.I love it

title: Best app I’ve used
review: One of the first cards where I have complete control of my money. The early deposits, the multiple savings, and round up change, some of the best features.

title: Great
review: It is a great app and makes it very easy to see what ur kids are spending money on and blocks them from spending money in certain categories or even specific places

title: Amazing
review: They really get your Direct deposit faster !! They are such a amazing bank and they honestly have great benefits ! Nothing bad a to say about (Current) great App ! Definitely recommend it to everyone. Download now.

title: I’m a fan
review: It explains everything you spend your money on. Plus it makes it easy to pay for stuff and manage your bills and stuff.

title: The most useless customer service
review: My app logged me off and the app doesn’t even have a login page, it’s ridiculous. Now I can’t even access my account since I changed my number and I can’t change it. I called and customer service said they would reset it and allow me to login but guess what, it’s been 12 hours and I still have yet to receive an email. It’s stupid
developerResponse: {'id': 23335847, 'body': 'Hey there! We apologize for the inconvenience and would be happy to update the information on your account so you can log back in! Please shoot us an email at reviews@current.com so we can resolve this issue asap!', 'modified': '2021-06-11T20:43:54Z'}

title: Current keeps me current
review: I love using current it makes sure I’m never embarrassed will the fee less overdraft and my direct deposits are always ahead so I get to brag to my friends.

title: Never again ! Don’t bank with this company !!!
review: I’ve been locked out of my account for 3-4 weeks due to the app only giving an option to get started but not giving an option to log in.  someone else was able to log into my account ,  I contacted (Email) cause you can’t talk to anyone on the phone and I asked them to have the account canceled and I haven’t gotten a response back.
developerResponse: {'id': 23313250, 'body': 'Hi there! In order to log into your account, please click on "Get Started" and enter the number associated with your account to receive an sms verification code. If you need to update the phone number on your account, were happy to assist you! Please reach out to us at reviews@current.com.', 'modified': '2021-06-10T17:51:38Z'}

title: Banking for the future!
review: This bank is awesome! I am for sure investing more time with this bank because it’s very interactive and I really do feel that my money is growing with the help of this bank.

title: Amazing
review: I really do get paid two days early even when my deposit is over the thousand dollar mark !!! Love current it also connected to my cash app!

title: Their ok
review: I have my work checks deposited into my account with current and I was told if you have over $500 a month being deposited you will get the $100 overdraft fee. I still have not been granted that and I’ve been banking with current for almost 3yrs. I will be banking with another because current continue to false advertise.
developerResponse:
{'id': 22292132, 'body': "Hi there, thank you for leaving a review & we apologize for the inconvenience this may have caused. In addition to the required monthly $500+ direct deposit, we also take into consideration your account's spending history & other internal factors.

Sincerely, 
Support@Current", 'modified': '2021-04-17T00:59:11Z'}

title: Current Review
review: I love this app. At first I was really skeptical,but they came through. They deposited my check two days faster than they said and the card is so cute. Thanks Current 😘.

title: Great Card
review: I never seen a card that have such features as the current card. I absolutely love my card and recommend others to get one.

title: TSUNAMI
review: I love current so far and now I can do the over draft which will help a lot since I get paid every week I would recommend this card to everybody thank you so much

title: Not getting paid two days early
review: I’ve only been paid two days early once fix it please only problem

title: Makes having a teenager easy
review: Thank you current for allowing me to send my daughter her allowance or play funds until she is old enough to have an account.

title: DON’T DOWNLOAD
review: Horrible!!! I wish I could give this ZERO STARS!!  I had a deposit hit my account and I’m still new with current and I ACCIDENTALLY hit lost card and now I can’t access my BILL money. All they can say it sorry but you’ll have to wait for the new card to come in! Ridiculous. This “company” shouldn’t be aloud to run a banking service if they can’t even cancel an accidental report on a card from 3 HOURS AGO!!! I’ll be going else where.

title: Great app tbh
review: I was skeptical about banking online like this but it’s super simple I had my account the same day I was able to go to a 7-Eleven deposit money 10 out of 10 recommend

title: Excellent
review: I have tried quite a few debit cards and i saw an add for Current. So i told myself this will be the last try. And i couldn’t be more happy with Current Debit Card. This is the one!

title: Closed My Account for No Reason
review: My Disability check went into here and was stuck in a Savings pod for 3 weeks. Could never get a straight answer on what the problem was. Closed account for no reason at all. Terrible customer service as you cannot reach a person. Kept being told I’d get a response in 24 to 48 hours. Three weeks later I finally was able to access my money.

title: I love Current
review: This bank is amazing! I got paid 3 days before my pay date! There are so many amazing features! I highly recommend this mobile bank.

title: Am I loosing money?!
review: I woke up one morning and the app had completely deleted itself. I still can’t download it back. A similar thing just happened to my sister but they took her money. I’m unsure if my money will be taken as well. I had a great bit of money there as I was saving. Mind I’m a child and it took me a long time to save all the money I’d saved. IF it takes all the money I earned then I’d like to know how to get it back.

title: Best online bank card!!
review: I LOVE my Current account! I pay 4.99 per month for the premium card and it is well worth it. My favorite thing about the premium account is the free overdraft protection.

title: Better bank
review: I have never used a better banking system in my life. Well other than Navy Federal. But since we don’t have any where I live now. This is the next best thing.

title: I love my current account
review: I have had this account for 1 years now I get my direct deposit fast as well as they tell me every transaction done right away

title: Stress
review: Okay except it is always takin f too long to process and review stuff about your own money. Like they know the situation of the stuff that happens and doesn’t help you right away instead of prolonging the situation making it stressful on both ends

title: BIGGEST SCAM!!
review: I decided that i no longer wanted current and reached out to them multiple times i’ve still been getting charged monthly. I’ll reach out to someone tell them i want to close my account and then make it sound like their going to end my subscription and then i still get charged monthly, they also sent a new card a few days ago ?!
developerResponse: {'id': 21718758, 'body': "Hi there, we're sorry to hear this & want to ensure that you're satisfied with our service no matter the outcome. Please contact us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account for help & so we can look into what happened here. \nSincerely, \nSupport@Current", 'modified': '2021-03-18T01:04:13Z'}

title: Pretty good
review: Kinda upset my check don’t hit my phone until like 10 in the morning. My friend gets his direct deposited to his account on Wednesday. Other then that though current is pretty decent. Better then chime thats for sure.

title: Everything they said it would be
review: I literally get paid one day faster than everyone else to get strike deposit. This bank is amazing!

title: Deposite
review: What atm can I use to deposite money on to my card. It seems like the only way to put money on my card is via direct deposites from checks or sending money from another bank card onto it. It would be convenient if I could just go to a local atm and refill my card

title: Jarvis Davis Feedback
review: Hi, just wanna say I was a huge NetSpend fan but every since I switch I’ve completely see why it was a good decision to switch like I love current & will be using y’all for a long time. No cap 💯

title: Fraud
review: I just had a situation the girl stole 356$ out my account thru the current pay and I never even used current pay since I’ve had card I’m so mad I’m hiring a lawyer and bringing it to authoruties the girl stole transfered money from my savings and just took everything and then they called me sayin my card was compromised and the call hung up I need my money back before law gets involved you guys know her account so report her

title: Big mistake!!!
review: Firstly, the way they process “authorization funds” is ridiculous. It takes 15 business days for your funds to be released. 10 business days for refunds to show up. My check doesn’t come early. It’s actually showing up late. The issuing bank shows what day the funds are released but Current for whatever reason holds on to them. I have I ever even gave them a chance.

title: It’s a good concept just holds money way to long
review: I like the concept but the waiting days to get your money after it’s already cleared my bank account this card likes to hold it for 3 more days after you see it removed from the account you transfer money from

title: My opinion
review: I love how well you guys work with people, the $25 overdraft free of fee is pretty cool along with the stylish debit card , but there is one thing I’m not too fund of ... is there anyway I can receive deposits on Wednesdays instead of Thursday’s ?

title: So easy for my teens
review: My teens love this and it gives them an incentive to help out more for some extra funds. My oldest just got a job and has her check directly deposited in her account.

title: Great!
review: Current is teaching my teenagers how to manage their money at a young age.  It’s teaching them to be read the fine print and be responsible with their spending and I can monitor and guide them. Beyond happy with the app and the cards.

title: Great !
review: First time using current signed up last week got my card today and got paid 2 days earlier ! Highly recommend

title: 5 star service
review: They have great customer service being that there is no actual physical bank they always solve my problem in a timely fashion i love it

title: BEST EVER!!
review: Paychecks come before hand, can overdraft up to $25, returns come back in up to 3 days, and the savings pod is a good offer if you want to put some money aside. Definitely won’t regret it if you decide to download!!

title: Excellent Bank
review: So far I’ve been with this bank for about three months and I love it so far. No surprise fees, and it helps me manage my money by tracking my spending. 5stars so far

title: Best app for Direct Deposits!
review: I receive my paycheck/refund 2-4 days faster! There has never been a discrepancy on this app in regards to my balance like what happens on cash app. I’m glad my friend recommended Current.

title: It’s more of a preference
review: I love the availability of free atms and such. My only problem is how specific it is to be able to take a picture of a check I’m depositing. Otherwise perfect and 10 out of 10 would recommend!!

title: Best bank
review: Best online bank EVER . Not only is it easy for me to find free atms but I always get my deposit suuuper fast and efficient everytime with no issues! Glad I took a chance on current

title: Thieves
review: My account access has been blocked by this company.  I have tried to reach out to them through the website and through the customer service line but have not been able to receive any assistance.  However, I am still being charged the yearly service fee - for an account I have not used in years, can not access, and have no way of canceling.
developerResponse: {'id': 21694974, 'body': "Hi there, we're sorry to hear about this & apologize for the inconvenience this has caused. Please reach out to us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account for assistance. \nSincerely, \nSupport@Current", 'modified': '2021-03-17T00:54:24Z'}

title: Bank Deposits Take way to long
review:
I really the app and everything else the only complaint i have is your wait time on getting the money deposited into my premium bank instantly. 
NEED TO CHANGE THAT ASAP because if that continues I really wouldn’t want to use your bank at all

title: Why current is the best
review: Current has been my bank and I wouldn’t trade them for the world I love it I get my paychecks faster and they don’t charge you if you over draft

title: Direct deposit
review: Missing my direct deposit, my employer shows it’s been sent and gave me a tracking number and the company goes on to say they’ve never received it and I cannot get my wages to pay bills, very dissatisfied and upset due to my phone being cut off because I cannot receive my pay 0/10 would not recommend to anyone I feel as if it’s a scam to take advantage of people

title: 2 days early is a lie
review: You have two choices of accounts Premium and Standard. The 2 days early pay is for premium only and you have to pay every month for that. Standard is just regular pay. Such bull.

title: Very disappointed
review: This was recommended by a friend, so I a thought this would be a good fit for my teenage daughter. When we received the card and set it up it didn’t work no matter how many times we called Current to try to get the issue resolved. We subsequently canceled the account but we were still charge the annual fee every year even though the account was closed.
developerResponse: {'id': 19762392, 'body': "Hi there! We're sorry to hear about your experience. Can you please send contact us at reviews@current.com so that we can investigate further? Thank you! Sincerely, Support@Current", 'modified': '2020-12-14T21:14:36Z'}

title: I love this app
review: I love this app because even teens (like myself) can get cards and learn responsibility of keeping up with a card. It was also quick and easy to sign up. Me and my mom love it ! - Get this app

title: Great Service
review: I love the fact that my check comes early. It’s a great feeling knowing I’m getting my check days before the actual payday, especially during the pandemic.

title: Perfect
review:
Dependable account 
Paid on Wednesday instead of Friday 
I can pause the card when not using 
I can block popular brands if I need to
Free ATM 
Higher ATM withdrawal amount than a lot of banks 
Higher daily spending limit 
Chip enabled 
Compatible with apple wallet 
This account even save my change in a savings pod. I love it 
The only thing I wish is for the current team to send me a metal card. I have been a costumer of almost 2 years. This would be greatly appreciated

title: Current is the best of all I really can say that
review: I love current no other way to put it they make it where everything can work in your favor

title: Review
review: With current not only do you get your money on time but you get it early and also they let you know every transaction the security features on here are so great!!!

title: best so far
review: it work for cashapp that’s a plus cool to use just need to be able to upload money at Walmart money center not with cashier but same thing doesn’t matter really 🤷🏾‍♀️

title: Kinda disappointed
review: Even though it is stated at the bottom of the page that there are fees, I feel slightly jipped, more in the fact that the card they show on all there adds only comes with the $5 a month plan, and not all of them.

title: Must get this card ‼️
review: I’m a premium user and I absolutely love that I get paid two days earlier. If you haven’t already go sign up and bank with Current.

title: Awesome
review: I needed an easy way to get my teenage son money without him having to carry cash on him and it could be used in any store and online for purchases. I love this option.

title: You are amazing
review: You have helped me there a Horrible time in my life whether it’s from here Facebook post where are you TickTock’s or just even this cash app thank you so much

title: So far beyond impressed
review: I signed up because Mr Beast is giving away money and he’s beyond humble. I support everything he does. He even got me premium for life. I’m thinking of making this my primary banking.

title: This one of the best bank app for sending money to other people
review: Because it’s easy to send and you get paid two days faster.

title: Better than a Big Bank Cop.
review: Current is the best there is you will not regret it!!!!! You get paid on Friday? You’ll get your paycheck every Tuesday! :) highly recommended IMO Current is better than chime
Great card bad customer service but would recommend this card to family and friends

title: Direct Deposit
review: That literally have the fastest direct deposit over any other bank and trust me I have tried them all. It’s even faster than big mainstream banks like Wells Fargo etc.

title: Lamborghini goal
review: App is amazing, direct deposits couldn’t be faster. 5+ star. Makes it extremely easy to set and tracks spending and saving goals. Thank you current.

title: Account login
review: Very bad and poor customer service I lost my phone at Walmart I had my current account app, bought a new phone and installed the app again and tried logging in couldn’t log back in. Called the customer service number and only way to get them is by emailing them which was very bad experience for me, not have a voice customer service is very bad Irecommend  Varobank.

title: Great Company
review: I love all the in-app features, very user-friendly. I’ve never had a single problem with them I’ve I’ve had them for over a year and a half now.

title: Sorry company
review: This company is a joke I disputed a charge last year in august and it has been 6 months just for me to find out they closed it and didn’t even email me to tell me why so I’m out of 200$ and they have yet to speak to me about it I have to contact customer support and they tell me wait another week each time I contact them it’s sorry and I will be changing banks immediately

title: Super Clean & Easy
review: Wowww I’ve tried so many online banks and none of them actually are easy to sign up and start using. Sign up was easy. Excited to get my card!

title: You don’t get paid 2 days early
review: You do NOT get paid 2 days early, this so called bank is a joke .... Don’t use the mobile deposit service because it will take a lot longer then they say 3-5 business days is a lie ( it’s more 3-23 business days) an for you guys wondering what type of check it is ( it’s my worker’s compensation check ) . The 2 days paid early is NOT true.

title: Great
review: This is so great I wasn’t expecting this so I’m glad it came 3 days earlier you guys are awesome I just wish I could use overdrive quicker if I’m paying five bucks a month to use this card

title: Review
review: My deposits come Wednesday nights around 9:30, if you lose your card you can use virtual and I love how you can pause you card. And turn it on and off. Perfect Idea

title: More of a question
review: I’m thinking of getting an account for my younger siblings for Christmas but I need to know what kind of personal info would then need to put in to access the accounts. (SS#, SID,etc)

title: Currently pleased
review: Love love the feature of having a real checking account with the card. Unlike others.  Wish I could speak with a live agent though 🤔

title: Amazing
review: You guys are so helpful and always help when I have any issues which is very rare and usually to do with the other company or person. Best banking app out there
I’m very pleased with the functionality of the app and being able to send money to my daughter, and teaching her how to budget and SAVE!!! We’re both happy with Current!

title: Scam artist
review: I have transactions from grubhub that we’re suppose to be released back into my account sent them the evidence but they never gave me back my money do not trust this bank with your money they will just ignore your chat messages and never help you I’m only out a $100 but I’d hate to see anyone out more then that if someone did some real damage they will not help you
developerResponse: {'id': 17790574, 'body': "Hi, we'd be happy to see what happened with your account. Please contact us at reviews@current.com. Sincerely, Support@Current", 'modified': '2020-09-09T21:32:37Z'}

title: I recommend it. Great way to pay your siblings or child.
review: I like how the money transfers in seconds. I also like how you can add money to your current card on Apple Pay/Wallet. Super convenient.

title: Good for direct deposit
review: I love this card and app I just wish it had over draft protection but I get my direct deposit on time EVERYTIME it say you will get your money in 2 days and those are facts man I love this app 🙏🏾🤞🏾..

title: Can’t wait!
review: Newly divorced mom of two and just found a Current! Absolutely amazing and you won’t regret becoming part of the current family!

title: Awesome
review: It helps me save money helps me keep track of it. I tell all my friends about it. Y’all sponsor me id do more than tell lol id make videos, commercial, anything cause this bank helps.

title: The best bank
review: Never problems all ways my two or three days earlier sometimes I definitely recommend this bank 5 ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

title: AMAZING APP and SERVICES
review: this app is impressive. I’m very impressed with their banking system, and it is so much easier to use than Chase. I love this app and everything it comes with like the savings pods and points and even the fee free atms, it’s all VERY GOOD!

title: Glad

title: User for over about 2 years now.
review:
Pros- 
•Check deposit comes a day earlier then all my coworkers.
•My tax return came faster.
•My stimulus as well came through fast!
•When you go to a restaurant it lets you know what the 20% suggested tip is. 
•It’s a cute card I got the black prenium card.

Cons- 
•Can not deposit cash.
•Doesn’t work at sams club gas station.

✨As you see definitely more pros then cons. My bf has chime and i always tell him to switch over✨
Made an account and got my card pretty fast, I have a routing number and account number, hooked it up to my pay pal. All for free, would recommend!

developerResponse:
{'id': 22901948, 'body': "Hi there, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review & we're terribly sorry to hear about your experience with us. 

In order to link another bank account to your Current account, they must be able to support connections through Plaid. Once you've connected an external funding source, you can then initiate a transfer to fund your Current account. Once the transfer has settled into your account within 3-5 business days, you'll be able to deposit your check into your account. 

If you have any questions or concerns, we would be more than happy to assist you. Feel free to reach us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account. 

Sincerely,
Support@Current", 'modified': '2021-05-19T18:06:43Z'}

title: Constantly Bad
review:
I opened this account for my 16 year old daughter primarily because of the “No Hidden Fees” promise.  I quickly discovered that the promise was nonsense.

1.  When I move money from my linked debit card to my Current account I am charged a fee.  Assuming of course the transaction processes.  More often than not there is an issue.
2.  Depositing a check via the app is mind numbingly slow.  Have had deposits take 8 business days.  These were payroll checks from a huge retail clothing company.
3.  Whenever we have had an issue it is always someone else’s fault.

Pull your head out.

title: Works... mostly
review:
To;dr - use a real bank for check deposits 

App is ok, though a bit funky to navigate. I’ve been using with two teenagers for 6 months, and I still get lost in navigating screens. 

Forget about customer service, if you have a problem, though. You have to threaten to quit the service to get anything more than a re-read of the FAQ. 

My son started working. Got a work check, from a US bank, made out in his name. They rejected the check. Which is no fun, since you have to endorse to “Current”.

They cited the FAQ, for the rejection, but it didn’t make sense.

Disappointing

developerResponse:

Sincerely,

review:
Hi Guys! 
I’ll keep this short, I just want to say that if you want to actually spend or have access to the money that rightfully belongs to you, DO NOT BANK WITH CURRENT. They will return your direct deposits to sender for absolutely no reason and basically tell you “good luck contacting the sender to have them resend it to you!”
Trust me, it happened to me!

title: False Advertisement
review:
Love ads (seen within five minutes) promise 4% APY on savings account if you add your phone number to wait list. No fine print anywhere. No details.

After adding your number you’ll get a text saying “download the current app” with an App Store or google play link.

After signing up for an account you’ll find that the savings account they’re toting doesn’t exist.

Deceptive and manipulative marketing tactics aren’t a great start to a financial partnership.

Way better options out there.

title: *DO NOT DOWNLOAD*
review:
Never in my life have a gotten as frustrated as I do with this app! Any issues you have, don’t expect Current to solve them!!
1) there is no way to call and talk to anyone, just a chat room. They always tell you they will escalate the issue to a member of management. 
2) I’m convinced management doesn’t exists! Every issue that gets “escalated” is NEVER solved! I never hear anything from anyone, through email, mail OR the App 🤷🏽‍♀️

The only upside is that it is an easy to use app with no hidden fees. 

Deleting ASAP

title: This app is a scam
review:
Click on sort button and go to most critical, they try to hide all these bad reviews by getting all these fake a*s 5 Star reviews they most likely paid for so people go to their app, they have wayyyyyy to many problems with their app and have these lame automated support system that say the same thing “ sorry to hear your problem email us at blah blah blah” you email them and they take like 2 weeks to reply and say oh we can’t help you with that, if you are looking for a mobile banking app get Chime wayyyyy better and if your looking for something for teens just give them some cash or set them a checking account with a real bank because this app will do some weird things with your money. If it’s not one thing it’s another.

Edit: they assume I’m talking about a check still that mysteriously can get processed because of their weird procedure and refuse to help me with it and act like they can’t tell me why I can’t cash a check that’s payrolled through ADP I already emailed the dang email and it literally says the exact same thing as the this developer note i literally did all the things they keep repeating over and over “add a band blah blah blah” but it’s my bad for being too eager and cashing a check through them they still owe me a $36 refund that they were so quick to take for the teen banking account which was supposed to be taken out that account but taken of another card that was connected to the admin account and when I asked for a refund they said oh yeah and ten weeks later never refunded the money, but again my bad for being to quick and downloading random app 🤷🏾‍♂️, and I’m talking bout the hundreds of reviews saying money is either being taken out the account or the accounts being locked and or someone is accessing their accounts and is taking money out for the Little Developer note they keep leaving. 5 stars so people can avoid the problems that are happening that they drown out in these 5 star reviews 👍🏿👍🏿👍🏿👍🏿.

title: Disappointed Chime are way better
review: Let me just say that Chime cares about there customer these guys want to take 90 days to investigate i don't know what so i’m simply dons with them. PPP getting transferred over to Chime never Current get better customer service .
developerResponse:
{'id': 21959094, 'body': "Hi there, thank you for your review & we apologize for the experience you've had with us. The time frame of 90 days is in regards to any charges you want to dispute & we try to make it as clear as possible that our Fraud team may take up to 90 days to complete their investigation. This is of course is dependent on a number of other factors as well. We understand this isn't ideal, but rest assured we're working to resolve any of the issues you've encountered as quickly & efficiently as possible. 

Should you need help with your account, have any questions/concerns, or have additional feedback, please reach out to us at reviews@current.com from the email address linked to your account. 

Sincerely, 
Support@Current", 'modified': '2021-03-31T00:37:12Z'}
